description.zh: 稀土是高科技產品必備元素且應用廣泛。本課程主要介紹稀土元素在化工、生物科技、生醫工程、綠色能源、光電半導體、奈米科技、環境工程等諸多領域中的應用。除此，並探討台灣發展稀土產業因應對策。
description.en: Rare earths are essential elements in high-tech products and are widely used. This course mainly introduces the application of rare earth elements in chemical industry, biotechnology, biomedical engineering, green energy, optoelectronic semiconductor, nanotechnology, environmental engineering and many other fields. In addition, countermeasures for the development of Taiwan's rare earth industry will also be discussed.

name.zh: 稀土在化工暨生物科技中的應用
name.en: Application of Rare Earths in Chemical Industry and Biotechnology

description.zh: 反應工程是在商業規模之考慮下對化學反應開發利用之相關工程活動。其目的在成功的設計和操作化學反應器，並使化學工程在工程專業中成為一個獨特的支系。此高等反應工程是延續大學部己學習在均相中有關之簡單觀念及理論，並推展到非均相較複雜系統之設計及操作上。學生在修習此課後，對於較複雜之反應器有清晰及整體之概念。
description.en: Under commercial scale consideration, chemical reaction engineering is that engineering concerning the exploitiaton of chemical reactions Its goal is the successful design and operation of chemical reactors and it sets chemical engineering apart as a distinct branch of the engineering profession. This aduanced chemical reaction engineering is a continuative study of simple idea and principle for homogeneous systems and extended to heterogeneous and more complex systems for design and operation. After study in this course, the student can obtain clear and unified coucept of complex reactor systems.

description.zh: 為了訓練學生獨立思考與判斷能力，培養健全人格，提升人文涵養，延續通識教育六大向度的核心課程，在各向度均規劃了一系列的博雅選修課程，提供學生更多的選擇，以建立學生開闊的視野及達成全人教育的精神。
description.en: To train students have the abilities of independent thinking and judgment, develop the healthy personality and Humanities conservation, and keep the six fields of core curriculum in general education. this course will design a series of optional curriculum on Erudition & Refinement in each field, and develop students the broader sight and reach the spirit of the holistic education.

name.en: Elective Curriculum of Liberal Arts Education

description.zh: 本課程由學生與老師共同選定題目，在特定題目下對此專題之問題定義，分析，推理，設計，製作與解決方法進行研究，以完成該專題之成品，專題完成後需撰寫書面報告並公開展示成品，以培養實務工作之能力。專題範圍包含：1. 電子電路，2. 電子儀表，3. 控制與通訊系統，4. 電子視聽系統，5. 微電腦為基礎之計算機硬體（含軟體）製作，6. 軟體設計與製作（PC，工作站），影像處理與計算機視覺，多媒體製作（動畫、Video、Audio 及其整合），9. 其他。
description.en: In this course,students will conduct special project under the guidance of his advisor.The topic of this project,selected and decided by bath the student and his advisor,could be chosen form(but not limited to)1.Electronic circuits2.Electronic instrumentation3.Communication and control systems4.Microprocessor applications5.Multimedia system designs6.Computer networks7.Computer software desgin

description.zh: 本課程探討現代通訊的基本原理，內容重點放在類比通訊的調變技巧與雜訊分析．課程大綱包括：1. 簡介 2. 信號與系統 3. 機率、隨機程序與雜訊 4. 振幅調變：雙旁波帶、調幅、單旁波帶與殘旁波帶 5. 角度調變：頻率調變與相位調變 6. 脈波調變：脈幅調變、脈寬調變、脈位調變、脈碼調變與步差調變 7. 數位通訊簡介對於數位通訊有進一步興趣的同學可繼續選修『數位通訊系統』課程
description.en: Fundamental principles of modern communication will be investigated in depth in this course, with emphasis on analog communications.Basic modulation techniques will be introduced with nosie analysis.Contents include1.Introduction 2.Signals and Systems3.Probability ,Random Process,and Nosie4.Amplitude Modulations:DSB,AM,SSB,and VSB5.Angle Modulations:FMand PM6.Pulse Modulations:PAM,PWM,PPM,PCM,and DM7.Intorduction to Digital Communication Students who want to know more details sbout digital commmunication are encouraged to take the course Digital Communication Systems

description.zh: 1. 積體電路的分類，2. 積體電路晶片設計的流程，3.CMOS 元件的基本結構與佈局，4.CMOS 元件的設計規範技術，5.CMOS 元件組成各種數位電路，6. 以高階方法探討積體電路之設計，7. 系統分割，8. 設計問題之探討，9.IC 的構造， 10. 設計方法，11. 時序問題之探討，12. 鐘脈問題之探討，13.VLSI 之測試，14. 有助於設計與測試的結構化技巧探討，15. 專題製作。
description.en: 1.Classification of VLSI circuit 2.Flow of VLSI design 3.VLSI characterization 4.CMOS design methods5.CMOS digital circuit 6.High-level VLSI design7.System partiton 8.Time squence9.Clock10.VLSI testing 11.Special projects

description.zh: 介紹設施規劃，合理化的觀念、原理、方法步驟，舊規劃合理化的理由、重要性、方法及步驟。設施搬運系統及位置的遴選、及其考慮因素及決定方法
description.en: This course introduces the concepts, theories, and approaches of facilities planning.  Material handling and site selection are also included.

description.zh: 顧客關係管理主要目的是了解企業與顧客之關係，促使顧客滿意及忠誠回應而產生終身價值，進而提昇企業獲利，其內容包括顧客關係管理的概念與本質、顧客行為、顧客資料探勘、顧客關係管理系統、顧客關係管理專案之規劃與管理、顧客關係管理的績效衡量、顧客關係管理實務研討。商業智慧 (Business Intelligence, BI)，是企業利用現代資訊技術收集、管理和分析結構化與非結構化的企業資料與資訊，創造和累積企業知識與見解，以改善企業決策品質與採取有效的企業行動，進而提升企業各方面績效。由基本現場管理 (Shop Floor Control) 需求談起，然後介紹製造資訊分類與收集技術（包括 RFID），也將包括資料庫與資料倉儲觀念，最後介紹 BI 於顧客關係管理之應用。課堂中也將輔以目前市面上商用 BI 套裝軟體，並將其專業上相關資訊在此系統上實際應用，體驗 BI 對企業之重要性。
description.en: The objectives of Customer Relationship Management (CRM) are to study the relationship between corporation and customer, to increase the profit by customer lifetime value through customer satisfaction and royalty. The topics of this course includes concepts and context of CRM, consumer behavior, customer data mining, CRM system, planning and management of CRM projects, performance measurement of CRM. Business intelligence (BI) systems refer to applications and technologies which gather and analyze data about company operations. It then provides a comprehensive correlation of those factors, such as metrics on sales, production, internal operations, and helps managers to make better business decisions. This course focuses on applications of BI in CRM, with the introduction of shop floor control concepts and data collection techniques such as RFID, along with database and data warehouse concepts. Hands-on experience in BI software implementation is also emphasized.

name.zh: 顧客關係管理與商業智慧
name.en: Customer Relationship Management and Business Intelligence

description.zh: 以實務性專題提供管理組學生獨立研究、設計、實驗之機會。
description.en: This course provides the students the opportunity to do the practical project independently.

description.zh: 為加強學生設計實務能力，本課程規劃學生赴家具相關產業，至少為期 4.5 個月之校外實習，並於期滿後須由接受實習單位提具實習證明及成績考核。次一學期開學後，學生必須繳交書面或經口頭實習成果發表，由指導教師檢核實習單位成績考核，以給予實習學生最後評量成績。
description.en: For the purpose of enhance senior students' practical skill in design, the course is established to encourage students to intern in the industry for no less than 4.5 months. The student will then be evaluated by the industry, and by the lecturer through the examination of a written report and/or an oral presentation to demonstrate his/her effort.

description.zh: 本課程主要是讓學生在畢業之前即獲得車輛產業的職場經驗，此經驗包括有職場倫理外，也讓學生意識到學校教育與現實職場間的差異、產業對人才的選擇標準、自我能力基本要求的考驗、和未來可就業的相關企業。進而檢討自我的未來生涯規劃。學生需每週 40 小時於企業實習，並於期末繳交實習報告。
description.en: The course is designed to help students' career developments and to enhance their working experiences prior to their graduation. Students will work at a vehicle engineering related company. Students would learn the real-life operations of professional technology, acknowledge the differences between the school and working environments, understand the business needs, and develop their professional ethics. Through the program, students would be able to self-evaluate the gaps between their own capabilities and the professional needs, and establish or adjust their career development plans accordingly. A student would require to work full-time on-site the company and submit a full semester paper to fulfill the program requirements.

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意．煞車動力學，煞車性能之極限，液壓煞車系統及元件，鼓式煞車，碟式煞車，駐車煞車，真空輔助動力煞車，液壓輔助動力煞車，電動輔助動力煞車，防鎖死煞車系統．
description.en: Brake Dynamics, LImit of Braking Performance, Hydraulic-Brake-System Components, Drum Brake, Disc Brake, Parking Brake, Vacuum-Assist Power Brake, Hydraulic-Assist Power Brake, Electro-Hydraulic-Assist Power Brake, Antilock Brakes System。

description.zh: 本門課內容包括以下﹕能量與動力原理，燃料與燃燒簡介，鍋爐與熱交換器簡介，渦輪機與內燃機，核能與水力發電動力廠
description.en: This course is an introduction to the following topics﹔principles of energy and power, fuels and combustion, boiler and heat exchanger, turbine and internal combustion systems, nuclear and hydraulic power plants.

description.zh: 指導學生進行研究專題，以培育其研發能力。每一位學生必須經指導教授選定題目，獨立或數位同學成一組完成硬體或軟體專題，並書寫印製，經系公開展示與評分。
description.en: Teaching students to do the research work and to write the papers. Before graduation, the students have possessed the ability to do the R/D work. Each student must be through professor's instructions to select the topics of special project, personal or group work should be completed the project's hardware or software and issued the paper. An announcement has been made by the department, then get the grade and credit.

description.zh: 進階冰水主機實習、進階冷凍工程實習、進階中央空調系統實習、空調設備工程品質管理實務、進階空調工程實習。
description.en: Advanced practices and experiments of water chiller unit, refrigeration engineering, central air conditioning system, quality control of air conditioning facilities, and air conditioning engineering.

description.zh: 本課程主要目的為增進學生實務能力，學生利用整學期至各相關機構實習，參與校外合作機構所提供之訓練，觀摩學習專業工廠之實際運作。實習期滿後須由實習機構出具實習證明及成績考核；學生必須撰寫實習心得報告，彙交系上保存。
description.en: This course, off-campus practice, aims to provide practical training for undergraduate students through working in enterprise environments. During one semester, students go to enterprises or organization related to energy, air-conditioning and refrigerating industries and learn application-oriented skills. After completing the course, the organization for internship will provide training certifications and evaluate the score of students. The intern should write internship report and send the report to department office.

description.zh: 指導學生進行資訊與財金專題研究，以培育其研發能力。每一位學生必須經指導教授選定題目，獨立或數位同學成一組完成資訊與財金相關專題，並書寫印製，經系公開展示與評分。
description.en: Teaching students to do the research work on Information and Financial Management and to write the papers. Before graduation, the students have possessed the ability to do the R/D work. Each student must be through professor's instrution's instructions to select the topics of special project, personal or group work should be completed the project's hardware or software and issued the paper. An announcement has been made by the department, then get the grade and credit.

name.en: Special Projects on Information and Financial Management

description.zh: 提供本校四技學生在本行以外，對其他領域的認識，以彌補其只鑽研專業課程的偏頗，訓練學生整合知識，使不致在知識爆炸的時代中迷失，促進各種專材的溝通，培養共識；培育人文素養，啟發人文關懷，使具有完整的人生觀。
description.en: This course offers a good opportunity for four-year college students in this university to have an easier access to a completely different field of knowledge, in the hope that  students can add their individual professional knowledge and broaden their minds. The students will be furnished with integrated knowledge, discovering a better way towards professional communication, developing more common sense and never losing themselves in this information-explosive age. With a solid basis on humanity and liberal ideology, they are sure to find a more complete picture of human life.

description.zh: 本課程主要目的為增進學生之實務能力，學生須於學期中至相關機構連續實習 18 週，每週不得低於 2.5 天。實習期滿後須由實習機構出具實習證明及成績考核，學生應於校外實習完成後一週內繳交校外實習報告，由實習輔導老師評定實習成績。
description.en: This course is designed to enhance students' on-job practical experiences. Students will work at an engineering related company or research organizations for 18 weeks (20 hours per week) during the semester. Through the program, students would learn the hands-on professional technology. Each student would be required to submit a written report right after the end of the internship for grading.

description.zh: 1. 訊號時域與須域特性的量測  7.  類比訊號的取樣與重整 2. 比式濾波器的設計          8.  脈幅調變系統 3. 雙旁波帶 AM 調變系統        9.  脈碼調變系統 4. 單旁波帶 AM 調變系統        10. 數位通頻傳輸 5. FM 調變系統與解調          11. 訊號多工的傳送與接收 6. 鎖相迴路檢波器的設計      12. 通訊系統的設計與模擬
description.en: The lab course is designed for supplementing the lecture course'Communication Systems' and 'Digital Communication Systems'.sStudents can learn the principles and practive of analog and digital communication systems from laboratory experiments and projects.The cintents include1.measuremnts of signals in time domain and frequency domain 2.design of analog filters3.double sideband AM systems4.single sideband AM systems5.FM systems6.dessign of phase-locked-loop detectors7.sampling and regeneration of analog signals8.pulse amplitude modulation(PAM)systems9.pulse coded modulation(PCM)systems10.digital passband transmission11.multiplexing systems12.design and simulation of communication systems

notes: 五選三實習課，改下學期開【停開】

description.zh: 1. 集合，序列與函數 2. 基礎邏輯 3. 關聯式 4. 計數（排列，組合）5. 圖與樹（基礎圖論）6. 遞迴式與演算法 7. 有向圖
description.en: 1.Sets Sequences and Function2.Elementary Logic3.Relations4.Counting5.Graph and Tree6.Recursion Trees and Algorithms7.Digraphs

description.zh: 本課程內容包括邏輯閘的特性與功能測試，能利用積體電路完成各種基礎邏輯電路的組裝及設計，並能利用電子儀器進行量測、檢修。探討最佳化組合邏輯之演算法，可規劃邏輯元件，組合邏輯之 VLSI 設計，使用 MSI 與標準電路元件設計多層邏輯，使用閘陣列設計，循序邏輯之元件，循序邏輯之分析與合成，VLSI 之設計與測試技巧，各種 CAD 軟體工具介紹。基礎邏輯閘實驗、組合邏輯實驗、加法器及減法器實驗、組合邏輯應用實驗、正反器邏輯實驗、循序邏輯電路應用實驗。
description.en: 1.Properties and function tests of logic gates. 2. Implementations of and designs of basic logic circuits using ICs. 3.Algorithms for the optimization of combinational logic circuits. 4.Programmable logic devices. 5.VLSI design of combinational logic circuits. 6.Multi-layer logic circuits using MSI and standard circuit  elements. 7.Gate array design. 8.Sequential Logic components. 9.Analysis and synthesis of sequential Logic circuits. 10. Technologies of VLSI design and test. 11. CAD software tools. 12.Basic logic gate experiments. 13.Combinational logic experiments. 14. Adder and subtractor experiments. 15. Combinational logic application experiments. 16. Flip-flop experiments. 17. Sequential circuit application experiments.

notes: 職訓局已開課，停開【停開】

description.zh: 本課程之目的為使學生瞭解生產計畫與管制的基本概念，訓練學生對於生產計畫與管制的各項方法，制度設計及改善等具有基本認識，並應用管理科學及作業研究於生產計畫與管制之研究發展。本課程包括下列主題：生產計畫與管制概論、產品設計與發展、預測、來源需求規畫、生產排程、總排程、存貨管理、豐田式管理、專案規畫與管理等。
description.en: The main purpose of this course is to introduce the fundamental concepts of production planning and control.  In addition, applications of management science and operations research in production control and planning are also provided.  This course is consisted of the following subjects: introduction, product design and development, forecasting, resources requirement planning, production scheduling, total scheduling, inventory management, Toyota management, and project management.

description.zh: 本課程在二技為品質管理。使學生瞭解品質管理的觀念、原理、領域。品管部門的組織、功能，如何管理產品或服務的品質，品管的工具、方法，如何持續改善品質的方法，品質表示法，如何評估品質管理成效，相關法令，品質管理未來趨勢。
description.en: This course lets the students understand the concepts, theories, and areas of qualify control, organization and functions of quality department.  Besides, the way to manage the products or the service quality, tools and methods of quality control, the way to improve the quality, quality representation method, evaluation of quality control, related regulations and future trends are also included.

description.zh: 本課程的目的一，將藉由五個面向了解企業倫理的本質，分別為：從全球化角度認知社會可接受的商業行為，將待人和善深植於良好的企業中，企業形象再造，強化職業倫理以及投資於可持續發展和有社會責任的公司。本課程亦教導學生瞭解今日快速變化工商界，符合企業倫理的公司治理原則與方式。課程的教導將朝下列五個方向進行：（1）廠商的社會責任，（2）消費者的保護，（3）員工的權益，（4）員工對公司的責任，（5）雇主與員工關係。目的二，進一步教授 ESG 及聯合國 SDGs 指標的基本定義，藉由國、內外的個案討論來深根學生對於企業永續經營的觀念。
description.en: The first objective of this course is to appreciate the essential of Business Ethics through five main faucets: recognizing socially acceptable business conduct from the global perspectives, embedding good business in treating people nice and fair, reengineering corporate image, enhancing professional ethics, and investing in sustainable and socially responsible corporations. This course also discusses with the students the corporate governance that follows business ethics in today's changing business society. Five major categories will be covered: (1) Corporate social responsibility, (2) Consumer protection, (3) Employee's rights and benefits, (4) Responsibility of employee to the firms, and (5) Employer-employee relations.The second objective is to further explain the definitions of ESG and SDGs, and then to root the concept of sustainable management to students through local and international case studies.

description.zh: 本課程探討企業管理之基本課題，除了作業面外，也包含管理策略面。
description.en: This course discusses the fundamental issues regarding the business management.  Both the operational and managerial levels are covered.

description.zh: 排程主要在規劃與排定活動執行的優先順序，以使各項資源得到最佳的運用。本課程主要在介紹生產排程的基本理論與方法，使學生奠定排程研究與排程實務問題解決的基礎。
description.en: Scheduling consists of planning and prioritizing activities that need to be performed in an orderly sequence of operation. It is a tool that optimizes use of available resources. This course focuses on the basic concept on scheduling. The purpose of this course is to guide the students to learn the basic methodologies of scheduling, and to understand the scheduling application aspects.

description.zh: 為加強學生設計實務能力，本課程規劃學生赴家具相關產業，至少為期 4.5 個月之校外實習，並於期滿後須由接受實習單位提具實習證明及成績考核。次一學期開學後，學生必須繳交書面或經口頭實習成果發表，由指導教師檢核實習單位成績考核，以給予實習學生最後評量成績。
description.en: For the purpose of enhance senior students' practical skill in design, the course is established to encourage students to intern in the industry for no less than 4.5 months. The student will then be evaluated by the industry, and by the lecturer through the examination of a written report and/or an oral presentation to demonstrate his/her effort.

description.zh: 提供本校四技學生在本行以外，對其他領域的認識，以彌補其只鑽研專業課程的偏頗，訓練學生整合知識，使不致在知識爆炸的時代中迷失，促進各種專材的溝通，培養共識；培育人文素養，啟發人文關懷，使具有完整的人生觀。
description.en: This course offers a good opportunity for four-year college students in this university to have an easier access to a completely different field of knowledge, in the hope that  students can add their individual professional knowledge and broaden their minds. The students will be furnished with integrated knowledge, discovering a better way towards professional communication, developing more common sense and never losing themselves in this information-explosive age. With a solid basis on humanity and liberal ideology, they are sure to find a more complete picture of human life.

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意介紹運轉中的機械系統其各部零件在運動必須遵守的準則及力在零件間的傳遞。範例含連桿組，凸輪，齒輪，純滾動系統，鏈輪，皮帶，滾筒式傳動組等的介紹。
description.en: Introduction of the principles which all the members of a mechanical system have to obey in motion as well as the forces transmitted between the members． Examples include linkages, Cams, Gears, Pure rolling system, Chain drives, Belt drives, Friction drives, etc.

description.zh: 電之基本概念，直流基本電路，電場與磁場，電磁效應，交流之基本概念，交流基本電路，電機基本原理，變壓器，三相感應電動機，單向交流電動機，同步電機，直流電機之分類及特性，直流電機之控制，伺服電動機之分類及特性，電機之維護。
description.en: Introduction to Electricity, DC Circuit Analysis, Electric Field and Magnetic Field, Magnetic Effect, AC Circuit Analysis, Principles of electrical Machinery, Transformers, Three-phase Induction Motor, Single-phase Induction Motor, Synchronous Electric Machinery, DC Electric Machinery, Control of DC Motor, Maintenance of Electric Machinery.

description.zh: 先修課程：物理或負責教授同意不可壓縮流體，質量不滅，非黏性流體之運動，柏努力定律，線性及角動量定理及其應用，渦流與勢流，黏性流，納維爾－史脫克斯方程式及其應用，管中壓力頭損失及增加，邊界層與分離升力與阻力及雷諾方程式之應用。
description.en: Fundamental Concepts, Fluid Statics, Basic Equations in Integral Form for a Control Volume, Introduction to Differential Analysis of Fluid Motion, Incompressibility in Viscid Flow, Dimensional Analysis , Internal in Compressible Viscous Flow, External Incompressible Flow. Introductionto Compressible Flow.

description.zh: 先修課程：4402025 或負責教授同意底盤動力系統，行駛阻力、驅動力、煞車制動傳動等之計算車懸吊系統分析（懸吊系統、汽車垂直振動分析、系統參數調整），汽車轉向系統，ABS 煞車系統，整合系統。
description.en: Traction Force, Driving Resistance, Power Balance, Performance Test, Fuel Economy, Engine and Transmission Matching, Braking Performance, Handling, Steering and Ride Characteristics.

description.zh: 本課程主要是讓學生在畢業之前即獲得車輛產業的職場經驗，此經驗包括有職場倫理外，也讓學生意識到學校教育與現實職場間的差異、產業對人才的選擇標準、自我能力基本要求的考驗、和未來可就業的相關企業。進而檢討自我的未來生涯規劃。學生需每週 40 小時於企業實習，並於期末繳交實習報告。
description.en: The course is designed to help students' career developments and to enhance their working experiences prior to their graduation. Students will work at a vehicle engineering related company. Students would learn the real-life operations of professional technology, acknowledge the differences between the school and working environments, understand the business needs, and develop their professional ethics. Through the program, students would be able to self-evaluate the gaps between their own capabilities and the professional needs, and establish or adjust their career development plans accordingly. A student would require to work full-time on-site the company and submit a full semester paper to fulfill the program requirements.

description.zh: 提供本校四技學生在本行以外，對其他領域的認識，以彌補其只鑽研專業課程的偏頗，訓練學生整合知識，使不致在知識爆炸的時代中迷失，促進各種專材的溝通，培養共識；培育人文素養，啟發人文關懷，使具有完整的人生觀。
description.en: This course offers a good opportunity for four-year college students in this university to have an easier access to a completely different field of knowledge, in the hope that  students can add their individual professional knowledge and broaden their minds. The students will be furnished with integrated knowledge, discovering a better way towards professional communication, developing more common sense and never losing themselves in this information-explosive age. With a solid basis on humanity and liberal ideology, they are sure to find a more complete picture of human life.

description.zh: 計算機系統之基礎觀念介紹及應用。主要內容包括：計算機系統簡介，，資料的表示法、數字系統、邏輯，周邊裝置及儲存體，程式語言與程式設計，作業系統，檔案與資料庫。本課程引入程式設計的觀念與方法，於熟習基本程式語法後，再導入進階程式語言。著重邏輯思考與程式設計能力之訓練，同時輔以程式設計過程所應注意之程式結構、偵錯、可攜性、軟體工程的基本概念，使修習者得以奠定程式設計之基礎。
description.en: This introductory course covers the fundamentals and applications of computers, including: introduction to computer systems, data representation, number systems, and logic, peripherals and storage,  programming languages and programming, operating systems, files and database systems. This course introduces to the students the basic computer programming concepts. Syntax and semantics of the programming language.

name.zh: 計算機概論與程式設計
name.en: Introduction to Computer Science and Programming

description.zh: 由介紹基本熱傳有關現象，配合熱力守恆有關公式之應用，討論各種熱交換環境下應考慮之因素，分析熱傳導、熱對流、熱輻射及相變熱傳之計算方法。並將要更深入地探討在各不同熱傳導系統內所可能形成之熱力分佈現象，以期學習者能以淺入深地對相關熱傳導系統工程設計上培養出最佳能力。
description.en: Introduction of basic heat transfer phenomena, using thermodynamic conservation equations to discuss the parameters under different heat exchange circumstances, heat conduction, heat convection, heat radiation and phase change are analyzed, discussion in depth on the heat transfer problems in application to cultivate heat transfer design capability.

description.zh: 本課程主要目的為增進學生實務能力，學生利用整學期至各相關機構實習，參與校外合作機構所提供之訓練，觀摩學習專業工廠之實際運作。實習期滿後須由實習機構出具實習證明及成績考核；學生必須撰寫實習心得報告，彙交系上保存。
description.en: This course, off-campus practice, aims to provide practical training for undergraduate students through working in enterprise environments. During one semester, students go to enterprises or organization related to energy, air-conditioning and refrigerating industries and learn application-oriented skills. After completing the course, the organization for internship will provide training certifications and evaluate the score of students. The intern should write internship report and send the report to department office.

description.zh: 各種冷煤壓縮機簡介，容積式壓縮機效率分析，離心式壓縮機分析，各種送風機簡介，送風機應用，泵之應用分析。
description.en: Introduction to refrigerant compressors, efficiency analysis of volumetric compressors, analysis of centrifugal compressors, introduction to fans, applications of fans, and application of pumps.

description.zh: 介紹系統分析的基本概念及方法，深入熟悉開發一個電腦化資訊系統之方法及步驟。包含：系統分析、系統設計、系統建置、系統運轉、系統評鑑等之實施方式及步驟。
description.en: This course introduces the basic concepts and approaches of systems analysis including systems analysis, systems design, systems establishment, and systems evaluation and testing.

description.zh: 財務報表所反映的是企業的經營績效，不同的產業有不同的特質、不同的經營環境，即使在相同的產業中，企業若採行不同的競爭策略，在財務報表上也會有不同的表現。本課程的主要目的是要使學生了解如何透過財務報表，來評估企業的經營績效與價值。本課程將介紹以下內容：1) 基本財務報導與特別科目的報導與分析 2) 基本分析理論 3) 償債能力、獲利能力、經營能力、資本結構、現金流量的分析 4) 特殊行業的財務報表分析 5) 探討我國最近發佈的 7 號、34 號及 35 號會計準則公報對企業與投資人的影響。
description.en: The goal of this course is to help students evaluate the performance and measure the values of firms by financial statements. The topics of this course includes 1) financial reports and analysis of special accounting subjects; 2) basic financial statement analysis; 3) solvency, profitability, business performance, financial structure and cash flow analysis; 4) financial statement analysis of special industries 5) recent developments of GAAP.

description.zh: 本課程的目的一，將藉由五個面向了解企業倫理的本質，分別為：從全球化角度認知社會可接受的商業行為，將待人和善深植於良好的企業中，企業形象再造，強化職業倫理以及投資於可持續發展和有社會責任的公司。本課程亦教導學生瞭解今日快速變化工商界，符合企業倫理的公司治理原則與方式。課程的教導將朝下列五個方向進行：（1）廠商的社會責任，（2）消費者的保護，（3）員工的權益，（4）員工對公司的責任，（5）雇主與員工關係。目的二，進一步教授 ESG 及聯合國 SDGs 指標的基本定義，藉由國、內外的個案討論來深根學生對於企業永續經營的觀念。
description.en: The first objective of this course is to appreciate the essential of Business Ethics through five main faucets: recognizing socially acceptable business conduct from the global perspectives, embedding good business in treating people nice and fair, reengineering corporate image, enhancing professional ethics, and investing in sustainable and socially responsible corporations. This course also discusses with the students the corporate governance that follows business ethics in today's changing business society. Five major categories will be covered: (1) Corporate social responsibility, (2) Consumer protection, (3) Employee's rights and benefits, (4) Responsibility of employee to the firms, and (5) Employer-employee relations.The second objective is to further explain the definitions of ESG and SDGs, and then to root the concept of sustainable management to students through local and international case studies.

description.zh: 教導學生閱讀囊括全球議題的文章，並藉由文章的內容作技巧的訓練，字彙的建構，語言的解析，及思維的啟發。課中延展活動將閱讀內容與聽力、會話、寫作做進一步的連結，並引導學生將所學做有效的應用。
description.en: The course provides students with explicit skills-based instruction in learning how to process, and decipher the readings that serve as springboards for reading skills development, vocabulary building, language analysis, and thought-provoking discussions. The readings include a variety of viewpoints on global topics centered around social issues, the environment, psychology, business, and technology.  Extension activities are designed to encourage students to go beyond the reading text, and to put what they acquire from the readings into listening, speaking and writing practices.

name.zh: 進階英文閱讀與聽講練習

description.zh: 提供本校四技學生在本行以外，對其他領域的認識，以彌補其只鑽研專業課程的偏頗，訓練學生整合知識，使不致在知識爆炸的時代中迷失，促進各種專材的溝通，培養共識；培育人文素養，啟發人文關懷，使具有完整的人生觀。
description.en: This course offers a good opportunity for four-year college students in this university to have an easier access to a completely different field of knowledge, in the hope that  students can add their individual professional knowledge and broaden their minds. The students will be furnished with integrated knowledge, discovering a better way towards professional communication, developing more common sense and never losing themselves in this information-explosive age. With a solid basis on humanity and liberal ideology, they are sure to find a more complete picture of human life.

description.zh: 瞭解計算機之硬体組織與資料結構等基本原理及其應用，並介紹各種程式語言特性，內容包括：1. 計算機簡介：介紹計算機之演進及計算機之種類與特性，2. 計算機系統簡介：介紹計算機系統的組成及軟硬体系統所含概之內容，3. 資料的表示法與數字系統：介紹數系及文數字表示法，4. 輸出入裝置及儲存体：介紹各種輸出入設備及資料儲存体，5. 程式語言與程式設計：介紹各種程式語言結構，及撰寫之方法，6. 資料結構：介紹資料在記憶体內之各種排列方法以節省記憶空間及提高存取效率，7. 作業系統：介紹各種管理電腦資源的系統軟体及其作業方式，8. 檔案與資料庫：介紹各種檔案的類型及資料庫之基本架構，9. 資料通訊與計算機網路：介紹資料通訊之種種特性及電腦網路之結構與類別，10. 人工智慧：介紹人工智慧基本概念及基本功能。
description.en: This introductory course covers the fundamentals and applications of computers. Contents include: 1. Introduction to computer 2. Introduction to computer system 3. Data representation and number system 4. Input/Output and storage device 5. Programming language and design 6. Data structure 7. Operating systems 8. File and database systems 9. Data communication and computer networks 10. Artificial intelligence.

description.zh: 本課程主要目的為增進學生之實務能力，學生須於學期中至相關機構連續實習 18 週，每週不得低於 2.5 天。實習期滿後須由實習機構出具實習證明及成績考核，學生應於校外實習完成後一週內繳交校外實習報告，由實習輔導老師評定實習成績。
description.en: This course is designed to enhance students' on-job practical experiences. Students will work at an engineering related company or research organizations for 18 weeks (20 hours per week) during the semester. Through the program, students would learn the hands-on professional technology. Each student would be required to submit a written report right after the end of the internship for grading.

description.zh: 瞭解工程系統中常用數學之原理及應用，內容包含：1. 常微分一階、二階及高階方程式之解法，2. 拉普拉斯 (Laplace) 變換及其在電路上之應用，3. 向量分析及其在電磁學上之應用。
description.en: 1.Ordinary differential equations of the first order2.Linear ordinary differential equations of the second order3.Laplace transforms4.Vector analysis and its application to electormagnetics

description.zh: 瞭解電路元件之基本特性及其組合電路之分析方法，內容包含：1. 電路元件：電壓及電流源，主動元件，2. 電路特性：歐姆定律，柯希荷夫電壓與電流定律等，3. 一階及二階電路：電路之微分方程描述及各種輸入信號之響應，4. 穩態分析與頻率響應：分析電路之頻域，5. 電腦輔助電路分析：如使用 SPICE 工具。
description.en: 1.Introduction to linear circuit analysis2.Resistve circuit 3.Kirchhoff laws4.Thevenin and Norton theorem5.First and second order circuit6.Node and loop analysis7.Steady state response and analysis8.SPICE tool

notes: 職訓局已開課，停開【停開】

description.zh: (1) 半導體二極體特性曲線；(2) 半導體二極體之應用：整流器，濾波器，剪波器，箝位器，倍壓器；(3) 發光二極體驅動電路；(4) 齊納二極體穩壓電路；(5) 雙極接合面電晶體之辨別與參數量測；(6) 雙極接合面電晶體輸入及輸出特性曲線；(7) 雙極接合面電晶體直流偏壓電路；(8) 共射極放大電路；(9) 射極隨耦電路；(10) 共基極定電流源電路；(11) 場效電晶體之辨別與參數量測；(12) 場效電晶體轉移及輸出特性曲線；(13) 場效電晶體直流偏壓電路；(14) 場效電晶體放大電路；(15) 整流及濾波電路；(16) 偏壓分析與設計；(17) 基本放大器 (共射，共基，共集模式，共源，共汲，共閘等); (18) 串級放大器；(19) 差動放大器。
description.en: (1)The characteristic curve of PN diode; (2)The applications of PN diode : Rectifier, Filter, Clipper, Clamper, and Voltage-doubler; (3)Light Emitting Diode drivers; (4)Zener diode for voltage regulation; (5)The identification of BJT's leads and the measurement of b parameter; (6)The input and output characteristic curves of BJTs; (7)DC biasing circuits for BJTs; (8)Common-Emitter(CE) amplifiers; (9)Emitter-follower(EF) circuits; (10)Common-Base(CB) constant current sources; (11)The identification of FET's leads and the measurement of device parameters; (12)The transfer and output characteristic curves of FETs; (13)DC biasing circuits for FETs; (14)The amplifying circuits of FETs; (15)Retifier circuit and Filter; (16)Bias analysis and design; (17)Common Emitter amplifier, Common base amplifier, Common collector amplifier; (18)Differential amplifier.

notes: 職訓局已開課，停開【停開】

description.zh: 教導學生閱讀囊括全球議題的文章，並藉由文章的內容作技巧的訓練，字彙的建構，語言的解析，及思維的啟發。課中延展活動將閱讀內容與聽力、會話、寫作做進一步的連結，並引導學生將所學做有效的應用。
description.en: The course provides students with explicit skills-based instruction in learning how to process, and decipher the readings that serve as springboards for reading skills development, vocabulary building, language analysis, and thought-provoking discussions. The readings include a variety of viewpoints on global topics centered around social issues, the environment, psychology, business, and technology.  Extension activities are designed to encourage students to go beyond the reading text, and to put what they acquire from the readings into listening, speaking and writing practices.

name.zh: 進階英文閱讀與聽講練習

description.zh: 這個課程設計的目的，在於讓學生熟悉專業人員應具備的相關倫理與法律議題，學生不僅將重新思索在專業職涯與生活中倫理所扮演的主要角色，並且探索專業人員在面對道德與人際關係兩難時的倫理運用與法律原則。
description.en: The main purpose of this course is to make students re-think the main character between professional jobs and living ethics, and discover the principles of ethics and laws when the professional faces the dilemma of morality and interpersonal relationship.

description.zh: 探討家具製造之最新技術，側重量產設備及其與產品工程的關係。介紹木材加工原理及最新量產設備之性能，以便依據家具特徵如組件形狀，材料性質，及產量多寡等考量，提出有效率的加工計畫（製造流程）。講授家具製造作業程序（從原料接受、備料、細作、裝配以迄塗裝、包裝、發貨等其間之種種細節），特別是以計量的觀點來看家具製造問題，以避發生瓶頸，製造系統整体概念之培養，尤為重點。
description.en: Survey of furniture manufacturing technology emphasizing mass production equipment and its relationship to furniture product engineering. This course provides students with an understanding of the principles of wood machining processes and the capabilities of modern production woodworking equipment. Students learn to develop efficient process plans (machining sequences) based on product characteristics such as part geometry, material composition, and production volume. Emphasis is on operations, and the integration of many types of equipment into a manufacturing system. This course specially requires the students to view the manufacturing process in quantitative terms.

description.zh: 本課程著重介紹電腦輔助製造技術的概念與實作。內容包括 NC 基本概念，一般機械零件之 NC 與 APT 程式製作，複雜曲面零件之 NC 程式製作，CAM 系統實習，群組技術電腦輔助製程規劃，電腦輔助製程規劃系統實習，電腦輔助生產規劃。
description.en: This course has been prepared for the comprehensive of Computer-aided manufacturing, with emphasis on the essentials of CNC technology and programming. Through the projects practice, the students are able to adapt to the techniques of CAM.

description.zh: 本課程品質管理之目的為：使學生瞭解品質管理的觀念、原理、領域。品管部門的組織、功能，如何管理產品或服務的品質，品管的工具、方法，如何持續改善品質的方法，品質表示法，如何評估品質管理成效，相關法令，品質管理未來趨勢。
description.en: This course lets the students understand the concepts, theories, and areas of qualify control, organization and functions of quality department. Besides, the way to manage the products or the service quality, tools and methods of quality control, the way to improve the quality, quality representation method, and evaluation of quality control, related regulations and future trends are also included.

description.zh: 本課程講授參數式 3D 模型建模之技能，透過 3D 參數建模軟體將家具各零組件繪製，及組裝圖的繪製，目的在於培養學生具有數位化表達能力，以利於家具設計時造型之編修、工程檢討與設計管理。
description.en: The course is introducing the 3d modeling skill. Through learn the furniture part and assembly design drafting to develop the ability of digital design. It can take advantage of a Digital Prototyping workflow to design and build better furniture in less time.

name.zh: 電腦輔助 3D 家具設計

description.zh: 探討家具成本之構成要素：原料、人力、製造及銷管費用等項目。介紹損益平衡之計算分析並控制家具之製作成本，此外也將論及工程經濟之分析，以便對於各種製造資源能有較佳之決策。
description.en: This course will acquaint the student with the techniques of pricing a piece of furniture including materials, label, overhead, and administrative express. To calculate "break-even" points, to analyze and control cost elements of furniture manufacturing, with special emphasis of economic utilization of materials, manpower and machines.

description.zh: 本課程之目的係在教導學生有關家具包裝，包裝材料之特性與運用、 包裝之結構與試驗方法及包裝之標準化、運輸、管理等基本知識以及設計要領。
description.en: The aim of this course is to familiarize the students with the basic technology of furniture packaging,packaging engineering and packaging management and to train them in the techniques of protectional package design and managment so that they may continue their advanced study or apply what they learn to practice.

description.zh: 介紹家具產銷體系從原始概念、產品發展以迄賣到最後消費者手中所 涉及之種種。課程內容包括行銷研究、產品開發、標價計畫、配銷、廣告促銷以及行銷計畫等。
description.en: An introduction to furniture production and marketing systems. Emphasis is on the role of marketing in a managerial context. Areas studied include: Product development, marketing research and information systems, pricing, adverising, promotion, distribution and inventory management.

notes: 設計館 B01 演講廳

description.zh: 照明設計基本原理之介紹，以期學生能獲得照明設計之正確觀點與知識，內容含燈具與光源之關係、光的材料特性與色彩、測光法與光源資料之解釋，以及照明對人生生理與心理上的影響。
description.en: The main purpose of this course is to introduce the softwares and hardwares of lighting. (including lightion equipements. lighting design, transmission system, and distribution system) and how to maintain these equipments.

notes: 設計館 B01 演講廳

description.zh: 教導學生閱讀囊括全球議題的文章，並藉由文章的內容作技巧的訓練，字彙的建構，語言的解析，及思維的啟發。課中延展活動將閱讀內容與聽力、會話、寫作做進一步的連結，並引導學生將所學做有效的應用。
description.en: The course provides students with explicit skills-based instruction in learning how to process, and decipher the readings that serve as springboards for reading skills development, vocabulary building, language analysis, and thought-provoking discussions. The readings include a variety of viewpoints on global topics centered around social issues, the environment, psychology, business, and technology.  Extension activities are designed to encourage students to go beyond the reading text, and to put what they acquire from the readings into listening, speaking and writing practices.

name.zh: 進階英文閱讀與聽講練習

description.zh: 先修課程：無。本實習內容為汽車引擎實習，包含汽油及柴油引擎拆裝，引擎實驗，引擎量測與調整，點火、燃油、冷卻及潤滑系統之檢測及故障排除，定期調諧保養及引擎排氣檢測。
description.en: Automobile Engine Service Shop Practice ,Gasoline & Diesel Engine Assembly, Engine Test, Engine Tune-up and Repair, Trouble-shooting and Instrument Adjustment on: Ignition System, Fuel System, Cooling System, Lubrication System, and Starting System, Routine Engine Tune-Up and Engine Exhaust Emission Check .

description.zh: 汽油引擎 - 工具及量具介紹、燃料系統、冷卻系統、潤滑系統、引擎本體、汽油噴射引擎、汽車排放污染氣體控制系統，汽車底盤 - 傳動系統、剎車系統、懸吊系統、轉向系統，汽車電系 - 基礎電學與基本電子學、電瓶、點火系統、起動與充電系統、汽車儀錶與燈路系統、電子控制裝置、車身電系與其他附屬裝置。
description.en: Gasoline Engines include Fuel systems, Cooling systems, Lubrication systems, Engine construction, Fuel injection engines and Emission control systems; Automotive Chassis include Transmission systems, Braking systems, Suspension systems and Steering systems; Automobile Electrical and Electronic Equipment include Basic electricity and electronics, Battery, Ignition systems, Starting and charging systems, Instrument and lighting systems, Electrical control devices, Body electrical systems and Accessories.

description.zh: 先修課程： 無。本實習內容為汽車底盤實習，包含底盤綜合保養檢修、轉向懸吊及煞車系統元件拆裝調整檢修、檢修調整汽車前輪定位、拆裝輪胎總成及校正平衡、操作使用底盤動力計、煞車及偏滑實驗儀器。
description.en: Automobile Chassis Service Shop Practice , the basic inspection, adjustment and repair of Automobile Chassis System, Include the Automobile Suspension systems, Steering systems and Braking systems, Tire Repair and Balance practice, Wheel-Alignment practice , Chassis dynamometer Experiment , Brake performance and Slide Test .

description.zh: 先修課程：無。本實習內容為汽車電系實習，包括：引擎電系，起動系統及充電系統檢測，點火系統檢測，電池之檢測與換裝，電腦控制系統檢測，電腦診斷系統，檢測車輛新式電子設備，檢修汽車空調系統。95 學年度前入學者適用下列實習內容：結構力學分析與實習。學生將學習使用套裝電腦應用軟體，了解並學習如何做常用的結構力學前處理、分析及後處理。 課程著重學生實作練習。
description.en: Automobile Electrical System Service Shop Practice , Include Service of the Engine Electrical System , Starting and Charging System, Ignition System, Battery inspection and replacement, Computer Control System, Computer Diagnostic System, New Electronic Equipment Inspection , Air Condition Test and Repair.For those students who enter the school before 2006 Fall Semester , this class is to utilize computers to do the experiments on different vehicle/engineering problems. Student will learn the basic concept of Finite Element Method (FEM), learn how to utilize FEM in Vehicle Engineering to solve problems. Classes include Geometry modeling, creating FEA models, learning different analysis types (such as Statics, Normal mode, Buckling, and Optimization).

description.zh: 先修課程：無。本實習內容為汽車傳動系統及車身鈑噴實習，包含汽車車身及機車車架拆裝調整檢修，傳動系統元件拆裝調整檢修，車身測量，車身研磨、焊接及液壓施力設備之操作，金屬鈑金件之維修，車架及車身之校正及調整，門緣、車頭、玻璃及防潮條之更換，碰撞損壞之維修；塗裝及噴漆設備，塗裝及噴漆材料，配色技巧，車輛之塗裝及噴漆實際操作，完成品之品質檢驗。95 學年度前入學者適用下列實習內容：車輛電系和可程式控制器，包括：引擎電系，充電系檢測，點火系檢測，電池之檢測與換裝，電腦控制系檢測，電腦診斷系統檢測，其他電控系統檢測；可程式控制器系統規劃，可程式控制器之整合與評估，可程式控制器應用。
description.en: Automobile Drive Trains , Body Refinishing and Painting Service Shop Practice , Include the Repair, Overhaul and Trouble-Shooting of Automobile Transmission and Chassis, Automobile Body and Motorcycle Frame Assembly, Basic Dimensional Measurements, Inspection and Adjustments. The practice of automobile body sanding, welding and hydraulic straightening equipment; repairing of the sheet-metal panels; frame and body alignment; door trim, headlinings, glass and weatherstripping replacement; repairing of the collision damages ; Automobile refinishing and painting equipment, refinishing and painting materials , color matching, the practice of refinishing and painting of the vehicle , painting quality testing .For those students who enter the school before 2006 Fall Semester , the practice contents are :Electrical and Electronic System, Battery, Starting System, Charging System, Ignition System, Computer Control System, Computer Diagnostic System. Programmable logic controller (PLC) combi

description.zh: 實習氣銲設備使用及檢漏操作，基本銲道練習，平銲、橫銲、立銲對接，仰銲、填塞銲及銅銲，切割，CO2 銲接以及電阻點銲。
description.en: Students will practice the following subjects: Using welding equipment and learning leak detection, Basic welding, Performing welds in various positions on vehicles, Overhead welding, filling welding and brazing, Cutting, CO2 welding, and Resistance spot welding.

name.en: Auto Body Repair and Refinishing Workshop (I)

description.zh: 實習剪切操作，延展、彎曲、平整，車身板金零件拆裝、車體板金切換、以及車身小變形矯正。
description.en: Students will practice the following subjects: Cutting, Pulling, stretching, bending, and straightening, Body sheet metal parts disassembly and installation, Body panel replacement and sectioning, and Small deformation mending.

name.zh: 汽車板金及塗裝實習 (二)
name.en: Auto Body Repair and Refinishing Workshop (II)

description.zh: 實習噴槍及噴塗操作，補土與研磨操作，一、二、三層塗裝操作，全車塗裝操作，以及補修塗裝操作。
description.en: Students will practice the following subjects: Using painting gun and paint spraying, Applying filler and sanding, Base coat, clear coat and tri-coat finishes, Full vehicle painting, and Refinishing and painting.

name.zh: 汽車板金及塗裝實習 (三)
name.en: Auto Body Repair and Refinishing Workshop (III)

description.zh: 教導學生閱讀囊括全球議題的文章，並藉由文章的內容作技巧的訓練，字彙的建構，語言的解析，及思維的啟發。課中延展活動將閱讀內容與聽力、會話、寫作做進一步的連結，並引導學生將所學做有效的應用。
description.en: The course provides students with explicit skills-based instruction in learning how to process, and decipher the readings that serve as springboards for reading skills development, vocabulary building, language analysis, and thought-provoking discussions. The readings include a variety of viewpoints on global topics centered around social issues, the environment, psychology, business, and technology.  Extension activities are designed to encourage students to go beyond the reading text, and to put what they acquire from the readings into listening, speaking and writing practices.

name.zh: 進階英文閱讀與聽講練習

description.zh: 提供本校四技學生在本行以外，對其他領域的認識，以彌補其只鑽研專業課程的偏頗，訓練學生整合知識，使不致在知識爆炸的時代中迷失，促進各種專材的溝通，培養共識；培育人文素養，啟發人文關懷，使具有完整的人生觀。
description.en: This course offers a good opportunity for four-year college students in this university to have an easier access to a completely different field of knowledge, in the hope that  students can add their individual professional knowledge and broaden their minds. The students will be furnished with integrated knowledge, discovering a better way towards professional communication, developing more common sense and never losing themselves in this information-explosive age. With a solid basis on humanity and liberal ideology, they are sure to find a more complete picture of human life.

description.zh: 冷凍空調概論、基礎知識與定義、空氣熱力學、基本冷凍循環與應用分析、壓縮理論及壓縮機性能分析、冷凍空調系統組成 - 壓縮機、冷凝器、冷媒控制器、蒸發器、冷凍介質－冷媒、二次冷媒吸收劑及冷凍油、冷媒管路及配件、空調處理過程及空調維護分析。
description.en: Refrigeration & air conditioning Introduction Fundamentals & definitions Psychrometrics Basic refrigeration cycles & application analysis Compression cycle theory & performance of compressors Compression system compositions- compressor, condenser, refrigerant controls Cooling mediums- refrigerants, secondary refrigerants, absorbents, refrigeration oils. Refrigerant piping & accessories. Air conditioning processes & cycles analysis.

description.zh: 1. 瞭解電路元件之基本特性及其組合電路之分析方法，內容包含： (1) 電路元件：電壓及電流源，主動元件， (2) 電路特性：歐姆定律，柯希荷夫電壓與電流定律等， (3) 一階及二階電路：電路之微分方程描述及各種輸入信號之響應， (4) 穩態分析與頻率響應：分析電路之頻域， (5) 電腦輔助電路分析：如使用 SPICE 工具。 2. 瞭解線性與非線性電路的組成與分析法，內容包含： (1) 交流激勵電路：交流穩態分析，功率計算及相電路， (2) 三相電路：Ｙ與△型轉換及功率分析， (3) 變壓器電路：互感應及電壓電流的變換， (4) 頻率響應分析：極點與零點，轉移函數， (5) Fourier 級數，轉換及應用， (6) Laplace 轉換及應用。
description.en: The course covers the synthesis and analysis of bath linear and nonlinear circuits.Contents include: 1.Introduction to linear circuit analysis, 2. Resistive circuit, 3. Kirchhoff laws, 4. Thevenin and Norton theorem, 5. First and second order circuit, 6. Node and loop analysis, 7. Steady state response and analysis, 8. SPICE tool, 9.AC circuit :AC steady-state analysis, phasor analysis, 10. Three phase circuits, 11. Transformer circuits, 12. Frequency response, 13. Fourier series, Fourier transformation and application, 14. Laplace transformation and application.

description.zh: 內容包括熱力學第二定律、熵產生率、各種動力循環以及冷凍循環。
description.en: The second law of thermodynamics, Entropy generation, power cycles, refrigeration cycles and heat pump cycles.

notes: 暑假 7/5~8/30 開課 每周六上課六小時，三教 402

description.zh: 本課程將介紹工程上、物理上系統解析的相關數學工具，內容包括：1. 常微分方程式：一階，二階，及高階常微分方程，2. 拉譜拉斯轉換，3. 特殊函數。
description.en: This course intends to introduce the mathematical principles and practices that today's engineers need to know. The course contents are 1.Ordinary Differential Eqs: 1st order, 2nd order and higher order ODEs. 2. Laplace transform, 3. Special function.

description.zh: 本課程主要目的為增進學生實務能力，學生利用整學期至各相關機構實習，參與校外合作機構所提供之訓練，觀摩學習專業工廠之實際運作。實習期滿後須由實習機構出具實習證明及成績考核；學生必須撰寫實習心得報告，彙交系上保存。
description.en: This course, off-campus practice, aims to provide practical training for undergraduate students through working in enterprise environments. During one semester, students go to enterprises or organization related to energy, air-conditioning and refrigerating industries and learn application-oriented skills. After completing the course, the organization for internship will provide training certifications and evaluate the score of students. The intern should write internship report and send the report to department office.

description.zh: 碩士學位論文寫作
description.en: A student must write a thesis to fulfill the partial requirements for the Master degree.

description.zh: 本課程將邀請專家學者以專題演講方式，介紹電力工程、電力電子工程之最新科技與應用。研究生亦被安排報告其研究計畫與進度。參與者透過密集討論、書面報告、及舉行口頭發表等方式，可以有效率地交換意見，獲得更深入而廣泛的認識。
description.en: This course will introduce the latest technologies and applications to the power and power electronics engineering. Speakers are the Well-known scholars and specialists. Graduate students will also be arranged to report their graduate studies. The participants are encouraged to have intensive discussion, written reports, and further oral presentation. Efficient opinion exchange would be also expected to derive more extensive interest.

notes: 綜科 216A (階梯教室), 電力及電力電子組學生

description.zh: 本研究討論課程之目的在使研究生學習控制工程、通訊工程、計算機工程之最新科技。受邀演講之著名專家學者透過廣泛的討論分享其研究結果與經驗，選修此課程之研究生亦須就其研究主題進行正式報告。
description.en: The seminar course is designed for graduate students to learn the latest technologies in the areas of control, communications and computer engineering. Renowned researchers and scholoars are invited to share their research results and experience through extensive discussion. Furthermore, all students in this course are required to make formal presentations on their specialized topics.

notes: 綜科 318, 控制、計算及 AI 組學生

description.zh: 神經網路之簡介、直傳式神經網路、監督式學習、非監督式學習、回傳式神經網路、神經網路之結構分析、學習方式分析神經網路之應用。
description.en: Introduction to Networks, Feedback Neutral Networks ,Supervised Learning, Unsupervised Learning, Recurrant Neural Networks, Structure Analysis of Neural Networks, Analysis of Learning Methods, Applications of Neural Networks.

description.zh: 1. 二極體電路分析與設計 2. 電晶體電路分析與設計 3. FET 電路分析與設計 4. 放大器頻率響應分析及頻率補償 5. 功率放大器分析與設計 6. 回授放大器分析與設計 7. 差動及運算放大器分析與設計 8. 震盪器分析與設計 9. 主動濾波器分析與設計
description.en: 1. Diode circuit Analysis and Design2. Transistor circuit Analysis and Design3. Transistor circuit Analysis and Design4. FET circuit Analysis and Design5. Amplifier Frequency response Analysis and Componstaion6. Power Amplifier Analysis and Design7. Feedback Amplifier Analysis and Design8. Differential and Operational Amplifier Analysis and Design9. Oscillator Analysis and Design10. Active Filter Analysis and Design

description.zh: 1. 電力系統品質項目與定義 2. 電壓降與停電 3. 電壓不平衡 4. 電力諧波 5. 頻率變動 6. 電壓閃爍 7. 暫態過壓 8. 電力品質監控
description.en: 1. Terms and definitions of power systems quality2. Voltage sags and interruption3. Voltage unbalance4. Power harmonics5. Frequency deviation6. Voltage flicker7. Transient overvoltages8. Monitoring of power quality

description.zh: l 本課程所為研究所課程，內容包括狀態控間分析，頻域分析，現代數位控制理論分析及控制器設計，應用實例介紹。
description.en: l This course is designed mainly for senior-graduate students. The objective of this course is to introduce some fundamental concepts of digital control, such as state space approach, frequency domain approach, and modern control theory. The design and applications of the digital controllers are also included.

description.zh: 1. 離散時間訊號與 Z - 轉換 2. 取樣原理 3. 離散傅式轉換與快速傅式轉換 4. 數位濾波器系統設計 5. 同位訊號處理 6. 時變訊號處理 - 短時域傅式轉換 7. 離散時間隨機程序 8. 離訊與訊號估測
description.en: 1. Discrete-time signal and Z-transform 2. Sampling theorem 3. Discrete Fourier Transformer(DFT) and Fast Fourier Transformer(FFT) 4. Digital Filter Design5. Homomorphic Signal Processing 6. Time-varying signal Processing-short-term Fourier transformer 7. Discrete-time Random Process8. Noise and Signal

description.zh: 1. 需求面管理與節約能源 2. 負載管理策略與成效評估 3. 負載監控與需量控制管理 4. 汽電共生及其他能源應用 5. 配電自動化與配電管理實務
description.en: 1.Demand-side Management and Energy Conservation2.Load Management Strategy and Impact Evaluation3.Load Control Technology and Demand Control Management4.Cogeneration and Other Energy Applications5.Distribution Automation and Distribution Management Technologies

description.zh: 電控技術在現代工業應用中扮演著不可或缺的角色。因此，本課程的目的在使學生了解電控技術，其內容包括 Matlab/Simulink 軟體平台介紹、電控系統建模、分析與設計。
description.en: Electrical control technology plays an important role in modern industrial applications. Therefore, the purpose of this course is to introduce the technology to the students. The content includes Matlab/Simulink software platform, and electrical control system modeling, analysis and design.

name.zh: 計算機在電控技術之應用
name.en: Computer Methods for Electrical Control Technology

notes: 綜科 511，電機所與自動化所合開

description.zh: 專題報告專題演講 研究小組討論
description.en: Case Study.Seminar.Group meeting.

description.zh: 碩士學位論文寫作
description.en: A student must write a thesis to fulfill the partial requirements for the Master degree.

description.zh: 深度學習探討如何能利用深層類神經網路，由觀測到的資料中自我學習，自我進化，而能有效進行預測，分類，偵測，辨認與決策，以建立人工智慧。本課程為進階的機器學習課程，將會花相當多的時間深入探討各種不同的訓練方法不同結構的類神經網路。包括深層類神經網路，卷積類神經網路，遞迴類神經網路等等網路架構，與監督式學習，非監督式學習，強化式學習，對抗式學習等等訓練方法。本課程並會要求學生實現各種不同類型的類神經網路，將其著應用在解決多種人本人工智慧服務設計問題。包時間序列預測，物體偵測與辨認，語音訊號處理、影像訊號處理、自然語言處理，音訊訊號處理等多種人本資訊處理。
description.en: Deep learning is a branch of artificial intelligence that focuses on how to use deep neural networks to self-learn and self-evolve from observed data, as well as to effectively predict, classify, detect patterns and make decisions.This course is an advanced machine learning course that delves into different neural network structures and training methods. Students will be asked to implement different neural networks to solve various human-centered artificial intelligent service design problems (e.g., time series prediction, object detection, image recognition, speech signal processing, video signal processing, natural language processing, audio signal processing, etc.).

name.zh: 深度學習與類神經網路

description.zh: 碩士學位論文寫作。
description.en: A student must write a thesis to fulfill the partial requirements for the Master degree.

description.zh: 讀書報告、專題討論、機電系統產品介紹與討論、Seminar 心得等。可重覆修習。
description.en: Case Study, Mechatronics in Industry, Seminars.

description.zh: 機構與機械元件設計基礎，古典動力學基礎，近代機械加工，電機機械，電機驅動與設計，光電及感測基本原理，機電系統匹配，專題實作及實驗等機電相關課題
description.en: Mechanisms and machine elements, classical dynamics, modern machining methods, electric machines and drivers, sensors, special topics and labs of machatrocics system.

description.zh: 銲接冶金課程深入研究金屬銲接技術與冶金過程，培養學生在材料處理和銲接技術方面的專業能力。課程包括銲接方法、銲材選擇、熱影響、金屬結構與性能及銲接缺陷等內容，並結合實際案例，使學生能理解並應用於工程實務。
description.en: The welding metallurgy course in the graduate program delves into metal welding techniques and metallurgical processes, cultivating students' expertise in material handling and welding technologies. The curriculum covers welding methods, selection of welding materials, heat-affected zones, metal structures and properties, welding defects, and incorporates real-world cases to enable students to comprehend and apply them in engineering practice.

notes: 職機電所、職製科所合開，限 14 人

description.zh: 碩士學位論文.
description.en: Thesis for master degree's partially requirement.

description.zh: 專題報告，專題演講，研究小組討論 Case Study, Seminar
description.en: Case Study, Seminar

description.zh: 碩士論文寫作
description.en: A Student must write a thesis to fulfill the partial requirements for the Master degree.

description.zh: 碩士學位論文寫作
description.en: A student must write a thesis to fulfill the partial requirements for the Master degree.

description.zh: 本課程之目標為增進研究生之英文閱讀能力與寫作技巧。介紹英文科技論文的慣用語法、用字與閱讀技巧，並分析撰寫英文報告與學術論文之章法與組織要領。
description.en: Objective of this course is to improve reading ability and writing skill for graduate students.  This course introduces grammar, terms and phrases that are frequently used in English technical articles.  Structures of English essay and thesis will also be explained.

description.zh: 本課程主要目標為將數學方法應用在工程問題，課程內容有常微分方程，線性代數，向量微積分，及偏微分方程式等之簡介，訓練同學數學應用於工程計算及研究。內容包括數值方法，機率理論及數學機率等。
description.en: The main target of this course is to intoduce mathematical methods ot engineering applications; the course will cover areas in differential equations and vecto calculus. This course will also train students in applying mathematics to engineering calculations and research, such as unmerical methods and statistical methods.

description.zh: 控制理論基礎，冷凍控制系統方式簡介，冷凍系統控制元件認識，冷凍循環運轉控制系統規劃，冷凍應用環境溫溼度及污染控制，除霜、防溼及防凍控制設計，冷凍應用節能控制系統規劃設計
description.en: Fundamentals of control logic, introduction to refrigerating control methods, controlled devices and controllers, control circuit design for refrigerating cycle operating, schematic design of space temperature, humidity and contaminants control, Defrost, frost and moisture control design, energy saving control system design

description.zh: 現代能源工程技術，決定製程成本，故如何統合有效率的能源管理技術是決定產品競爭力之關鍵，本課程主要內容為︰1. 能源成本控制 2. 區域型電力能管理策略 3. 能源系統的經濟性設計概念 4. 冷暖系統的檢測與分析 5. 總合能源操作的工程化資料收集 6. 新能源系統的生態模組化設計
description.en: At the completion of this course, students will be able to several factors:1. Compare and contrast the various forms of energy conversion.2. Examine the technologies used to convert chemical energy into mechanical energy.3. Apply the concepts of electrical converters.4. Evaluate the major types of energy storage.5. Determine how human values affect the success of energy conservation.6. Design of new energy system modules with ecology considerations.

description.zh: 介紹空調系統節能的理論與實用技術。內容包括：空調元件能源秏損分析，系統搭配之操作性能及總體熱效率評估，耗能因素改善方法與技術，節能設備之原理與設計技術。
description.en: The course is prepared for the theory and technology of ventilation energy conservation. The topics are: energy loss analysis of system components, survey of system cop and overall efficiency, improving methods and technology, and the fundamentals and design technology of energy conservation devices.

description.zh: 本門課主要簡介各項再生能源系統之原理與未來發展，內容包括以下﹕各種再生能源系統之應用與分析，燃料電池之應用與分析，生質能之應用，及新能源之應用效益分析。
description.en: This course is an introduction to the principles and future development of renewable system that includes the applications and analysis of different types of renewable energy, fuel cells, and bio-energy, analysis on the benefits of new energy applications.

description.zh: 中文概述：碩士學位論文寫作
description.en: A student must write a thesis to fulfill the partial requirements for the Master degree.

description.zh: 中文概述：專題報告、專題演講、研究小組討論。
description.en: Case study. Seminar. Group meeting.

description.zh: 本課程為訓練學生具有敏銳的觀察能力及細密的思考能力，以發現技職教育的相關問題，並擬定完善可行的研究計畫，遂行研究工作，經客觀分析程序，並作成研究論。課程內容括技職教育研究概論、研究設計、研究方法、取樣與量測、資料處理、報告撰寫。
description.en: This course is a survey of research methodology that is relevant to the technological education. It discusses how to design quantitative research, collect, and report the data. It also highlights the difference between quantitative research and qualitative research.

description.zh: 研究生提出應用科技領域有關的個人構想計劃書，經由個別化指導，可以深入探討新的發現並提出研究心得報告。
description.en: An individualized study program is planned for graduate students and guided by a professor. Analysis of current issues and conclusion/implications underlying major research in applied technology through independent, directed study.

description.zh: 本課程訓練學生熟悉電腦系統並應用電腦套裝軟體，作為研究分析之基礎，以進行教育研究工作，包含 SPSS、ERIC 及其他相關軟體。
description.en: This course emphasis the applications of computer in the educational research.

name.zh: 電腦在教育研究的應用

description.zh: 本課程在探討技職教育行政理論包括組織、領導、決策、溝通、效能研究等及其相關實務之研究。期培育學生分析當前技職教育行政問題，並研訂技職教育的改善措施。
description.en: The aims of the course are to explore the theory and practice of educational administration, especially the educational organization, leadership, decision making, communication, etc. Students are expected to apply related theory to analyze VTE issues after the class.

description.zh: 探討網路教學與學習之相關原理，以及實務應用。內容包括有網路學習之優點、特性、限制、科技、媒體、平台、教材、教師角色與管理、學生角色與任務、實際案例、未來趨勢等。
description.en: To explore theories and practical application Web-based instruction and learning including WBL advantages, characteristics, limitations, technology, media, platforms, materials, teacher roles and management, student roles and tasks, practical cases, and future trends etc..

description.zh: 課程內容包括：技職教育的理論基礎、能力本位、建教合作、生計教育、職業輔導、技職課程與教學等理念與實務。
description.en: Course content include: theoretical foundations and developmental trends of technical and vocational education, competence-based instruction, cooperative education, career education, vocational guidance, technical and vocational education curriculum.

name.en: Theory and practice of Technical-Vocational Education

description.zh: 為了使訓練資源的更有效運用，本課程希望讓學生了解，企業內部在實施訓練之前，應客觀、嚴謹的加以評估，並追蹤其實施後的成效，以正確評估訓練的效益。
description.en: To make better use of the training resources, the curriculum expects to make students understand that any enterprise should objectively and carefully evaluate the training program before its employment, and keep track of its effect after its employment to make sure the effectiveness of the training program.

name.zh: 教育訓練實施與績效評鑑

description.zh: 本課程將探討數位學習國內、外發展現況和不同領域進行分析包含數位學習新興趨勢，並就國內外發展狀況、我國現階段的推動及發展策略進行介紹。
description.en: The course is designed to examine future trends and research in e-learning. It will also explore the issues on the development of e -learning and practical issues.

description.zh: 探討網路學習社群之相關原理，以及實務應用。內容包括有網路學習社群之理論基礎、優點、特性、限制、科技、媒體、環境、形成要素、成員角色與任務、線上討論與知識分享、成功因素、經營管理、實際案例、未來趨勢等。
description.en: To explore advnced issues on Web-based learning community (WBCL)including WBCL theoretical fundamental, advantages, characteristics, limitations, technology, media, environment, formed factors, member roles and tasks, online discussion, successful factors, operation and management, practical cases, and future trrnds etc..

name.zh: 網路學習社群專題研究
name.en: Special Topic on Web-Based Learning Community

description.zh: 管理心理學係運用行為科學的方法，事實及歷程，以處理人們在工作中的行為及心理的一門科學。本課程希望讓學生了解管理心理學如何影響他們的生活與工作，並能有效地運用管理技巧來處理企業中的人與事。
description.en: Administrative psychology is a science, which makes use of the method, fact, and process of the behavior science to handle people's behavior and minds in their work. This curriculum is expected to make students understand how administrative psychology affect their life and work, and how to use the management skill to effectively deal with the personnel and matter in the enterprise.

description.zh: 本課程將透過每週專題演講方式，讓學生了解有機材料之最新開發成品或最先進之研究成果。演講者之安排將以校外知名專家學者及校內各計畫執行者為主。
description.en: This course will provide important information regarding to the latest development or application on the organic materials. Speakers being invited are well-known scholars in organic area.  Graduate students or thesis advisors will also be invited to report any in interesting result from their graduate studies.

description.zh: 學生與教授討論擬定之研究題目，在教授個別指導下，進行實驗之研究，以培養學生尋找相關資料，文獻及獨立研究的訓練，並將其研究成果撰寫成碩士論文。
description.en: To make students able to carry out independent study in master level.  Students will be assigned a research topic.  An independent experimental design, data analysis, and final master thesis are necessary for this course.

description.zh: 本課程主要探討高分子在溶液及固態時的物理化學現象及其應用。內容包括輔 G 熱力學？高分子的微結構及定性。輔 G 熱力學探討統計熱力學、晶格理論、Flory-Huggin 理論、Flory-Krigbaum 理論、相分離、θ- 溫度、滲透壓、GPC 測分子量、高分子膠體。? 高分子之微結構包括有高分子之形狀、自由旋轉分子鏈距離、光散射、中子散射、排拒體積、碎形、霍氏光譜及核磁共振儀在高分子微結構之分析。
description.en: The course is to investigate the physical phenomena of macromolecules in the solution and solid state. It includes the solution thermodynamics and chemical microstructure of polymer chains.The solution thermodynamics is to study lattice theory, statistical thermodynamics, Flory-Huggin theory, Flory-Krigbaum theory, phase separation, θ-temperature, Osmometry, GPC, and polymer gels.Light scattering and Neutron scattering are used to characterize the polymer microstructure. Polymer radius of gyration, freely rotating chains, excluded volume, fractal, and scaling are also discussed. Finally, spectroscopy methods are used to study polymerization models and microstructure.

description.zh: 本課程包含材料的結構鑑定和材料的性質分析。材料的結構鑑定方法有：元素分析、吸收光譜法、振動光譜法、核磁共振光譜法、質譜法、x - 射線光譜法和電子顯微鏡法。材料的性質分析包含：材料熱性質 (DSC, TGA, TMA,DMA) 和材料機械性質 (伸張、壓縮、剪力強度等)。
description.en: The materials of the course include structure identification and property analysis of materials. Methods of structure identification  of materials are : elemental analysis, absorption spectroscopy, vibration spectroscopy, nuclear magnetic resonance spectroscopy, mass spectrometry, x-ray spectroscopy and electron microscopy. Metheds of property analysis of materials are : thermal properties of materials (DSC,TGA,TMA,DMA) and mechanical properties of materials (tensile, compression and shear strengths).

name.en: Analysis and Identification of Organic Materials

description.zh: 本課程主要探討各種高分子之聚合方法及動力學之研究，如逐步聚合、遊離基連鎖聚合、乳化聚合、離子連鎖聚合、連鎖共聚合反應、開環聚合、立體規則高分子之合成，未終止的游離基聚合方法。從分子量的分佈，結構物性之關係，作高分子聚合之最佳化設計，並且探討這些聚合方法如何應用在最新的科技上，如光電材料、複合材料。
description.en: This course is to elucidate the polymer synthesis and Kinetics studies. The synthesis includes step polymerization, free radical chain polymerization, emulsion polymerization, ionic chain polymerization, chain copolymerization, ring opening polymerization, sterospecific polymerization and living free radical polymerization. The synthesis scheme is optimized with the structure-properties relationship and molecular design. The potential application of these methods in high-tech materials, such as optoelectronics, and composites, will be elucidated.

description.zh: 此課程屬於高等無機化學特論，針對研究所學生有志於從事應用研究或投入化學工業而開設，有機金屬不只是化學家重要的研究工具也是化學工程師在設計反應的利器。課程內容包括：主族有機金屬、過渡元素之有機金屬化合物、硼族有機金屬、銅銀金之有機金屬、18 價電子原理、s, p 受體予體、有機錫
description.en: The advanced course for inorganic chemistry is designed for graduates who plan to initiate their academic research in the chemical field or work in chemical plants. Organometallics provides not only the powerful tools for chemist in their research but also for chemical engineers in the design of their reactors.  The course covers the following topics: (1) Main-group organometallics (2) Organometallic compounds of the transition elements (3) Organometallics of the boron group (4) Organometallics of Copper, Silver and Gold (5) The 18-Valence-Electron (18-VE) Rule (6) s, p donors and acceptors (7) Organotin

description.zh: 本課程主要目的在提供學生開啟個人對於建築與都市設計領域相關議題的獨立研究能力。因此，本課程將包含如何建構研究設計、寫作與參考文獻的能力。
description.en: The aims of this course are to provide students with opportunity to initiate personal research into architecture and urban design related topic. Therefore, the course includes a training of developing research, writing and bibliographic skills.

description.zh: 本課程主要在論述計畫於都市發展過程的干預以及維護環境永續發展之分派與管理角色，其內容包括：    一、 規劃、規劃師與計畫    二、 1800 年到 1900 年的都市發展    三、 都市計畫的先驅著    四、 戰後規劃的開創    五、 國土與區域計畫    六、 都市與都市區域計畫    七、 歐美的都市計畫    八、 未來聚落的都市規劃
description.en: This course is mainly to discuss the role of planning as a form of intervention in the development process, and introduce the role of planning in the allocation and management of a sustainable environment. Thus the course including:    1. Planning, planners and plans    2. The origins: urban growth from 1800 to 1940    3. The seers: pioneer thinkers in urban planning, from        1880 to 1945    4. The creation of the postwar planning machine, from        1940 to 1952    5. National/regional planning from 1945 to 1990    6. Planning for cities and city regions from 1945 to        1990    7. Planning in Western Europe, United States since 1945    8. Settlements into the 21st century

description.zh: 本課程為台灣傳統建築文化系列課程之一，其主旨在介紹台灣傳統建築的理論與原則，藉由已有的研究案例與成果，使同學能擴展其對台灣傳統建築研究的視界，並就傳統建築中特定建築類型與空間文化議題進行研討，除了經由地方志等文獻的解讀，以了解建築所屬的特殊空間文化意涵外，並由同學進行特定建築的實地調查，以供印證。本課程期使修課同學除了對傳統建築的意義有所瞭解外，亦對特定建築類型的社會文化意義有所體認。
description.en: This course is one of the series of Taiwan traditional architectural culture courses. Its main purpose is to introduce the theories and principles of Taiwanese traditional architecture. With the help of existing research cases and achievements, students can expand their horizons in the study of Taiwanese traditional architecture and learn from traditional architecture. Discussions on specific architectural types and spatial culture issues in architecture, in addition to reading local chronicles and other documents to understand the special spatial cultural meaning of the building, and students conduct field investigations on specific buildings for verification. This course enables students to not only understand the significance of traditional architecture, but also understand the social and cultural significance of specific architectural types.

name.en: Traditional architecture of Taiwan in Special Topics

description.zh: 為追求「永續發展與人本健康」之目的，使既有與新建的居住環境，配合我國「室內空氣品質管理法」規範下運作，提昇民眾居住環境健康品質效益，針對病態建築之環境問題，其涵蓋醫療、法律、建築、化學、生物等領域，綜合診斷以進行改善。本課程為第一階段之系列課程，其內容包括： 一。健康環境概念：說明何謂「病態建築」，探討室內空氣與健康之關係。 二。建築物污染源：探討來自各建築材料的化學物質逸散及其對人體健康之影響，並提出室內污染物質濃度減低對策。 三。生物性污染源：探討黴菌、蹣、白蟻及寵物等帶來的室內空氣污染。 四。診斷技術：說明室內空氣品質診斷方法及病態建築改善之專業技術，配合案例介紹探討新、舊建築物室內環境品質的設計預防、診斷改善技術。
description.en: The main goal of this class is to pursue sustainable development and human health. In order to enhance the quality of residential and living environment in both existing and new-build dwellings, the course will cover important principles and topics in sick building environment, including medical, regulation, and architecture, chemical and biological. Specific contents include: (1)Conception of healthy environment: To explain the "sick building" and explore the association between indoor air and health.(2)Pollution source from buildings: To investigate the chemicals emission from building materials and their effect on human health, and get the countermeasures on reduce the indoor pollutants.(3)Pollution source from Biological: To investigate the indoor air pollution that cause by the mold, mites, termites, and pets.(4)Diagnostic techniques: To improved indoor air quality and sick building by diagnostic methods, with the case studies to prevent indoor environmental quality on new and old

description.zh: 同學們在修過第一年所開的所有的必修課之後，從第三個學期開始，在指導老師的引領下，必須開始著手準備碩士論文的撰寫：選擇論文題目，收集資料，通過論文大綱審查，開始撰寫論文. . . 等等的步驟。從第三個學期開始須修二期之「論文」課程。在論文口試委員們接受該論文並在文件上簽名後，同學們可同時拿到六個學分，完成本碩士課程 "論文" 這一項的要求。
description.en: After completing all the required courses in the first year, every student is encouraged to initiate the working process toward the completion of his/her MA thesis under the supervision of an advisor. Starting from the third semester, it is required for the student to register for "Thesis" for two semesters.  The "Thesis" courses aim to lead graduate students through the process of preparing, writing and completing an MA thesis.  After the committee members agree on the acceptability of the thesis and sign the official document, the student will get a total of 6 credits for "Thesis," fulfilling part of the requirement for a MA degree.

description.zh: 本課程將使學生熟悉專業筆譯的重要概念與原則。學生將習得翻譯學領域中各種跨學科的理論觀點（例如語言學與功能主義取向、言談與語域分析、翻譯規範、文化轉向、翻譯社會學以及翻譯科技等），並將理論知識運用於中英／英中翻譯實務上。學生將深入探討各種翻譯論點，並以此為基礎進行文本分析、釐清翻譯問題，以及構思合適之翻譯策略與技巧。
description.en: This course will acquaint students with fundamental concepts and principles of professional translation. Students will acquire a solid grounding in a range of ideas within translation studies (e.g. linguistic and functionalist approaches, discourse and register analysis, translation norms, cultural turn, sociology of translation, and translation technologies) and apply the theoretical knowledge to various English and Chinese translation activities. This course will also enable students to critically discuss the basic postulates of translation theories and use them in text analysis, the identification of translation problems, and the formulation of suitable strategies and techniques.

description.zh: 不同文化之間的對話需要故事的講述。了解一種文化的故事有助於人們了解這種文化並與其人民交談。有時，一種文化會借用另一種文化的故事，或者寫一個關於彼此文化碰撞的故事。(例如，關於亞洲的美國故事，或關於美國的亞洲故事)。為了幫助學生與來自其他文化的人們談論重要的思想，本課程研究跨文化共享故事以及一種文化講述其他文化的故事。
description.en: Conversation between different cultures requires the description of stories.  Knowing a culture’s stories helps one to understand that culture and talk with its people. Sometimes a culture borrows a story from another culture or writes a story about its encounter with that other culture.  (For example, American stories about Asia or Asian stories about America).  To help students talk about important ideas with people from other cultures, this course examines stories shared across cultures and stories one culture tells about another.

description.zh: 碩士學位論文寫作
description.en: A student must write a thesis to fulfill the partial requirements for the Master degree.

description.zh: 專題報告、專題演講、研究小組討論
description.en: Case Study, Seminar, Group Meeting.

description.zh: (1)「田口方法」介紹 (2) 完整的「田口方法」，包含以下三個主題：(a) S/N 比之理論基礎及進階應用；(b) 直交表之理論基礎及進階應用；(c) 變異分析。(3) 應用「田口方法」進行專案研究，並繳交專案主題與報告。
description.en: (1) The course gives step-by-step to explaining the "Taguchi Method" for the students.     (2) The course gives the fully "Taguchi Method" for the students during a short time, which including three topical subjects:  (a) The basic theory of S/N ratio and its advanced applications.  (b) The basic theory of Orthogonal Arrays and its advanced applications.  (c) Analysis of Variance (ANOVA)  (3) Students will use the "Taguchi Method" to proceeding a project study, and hand over their theme and report of project.

name.en: Taguchi Method on the Quality Design

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意表面現象，介面反應等與近代高科技技術，如鍍膜工程，表面處理，腐蝕，磨潤，微機電，感測器，半導體技術等息息相關，且日益重要。表面分析是原子層次的相關研究，它包括振動，電子或離子頻譜分析，微技術等之應用。主要的項目包含，表面形貌觀察 (SEM, BSEM, AFM), 成份分析 ( 光譜分析，質譜分析，EDX ), 結構分析 ( XRD, AES, ESCA, XPS ), 鍵結分析 ( Raman 光譜，FTIR ), 表面粗糙度，膜厚，附著力，內應力等膜之特性分析。
description.en: Surface phenomena and processes occurring at interface are becoming increasingly important in a wide variety of industrial applications including the areas of films coating surface treatments, conclusion, triobology, microelectronics, sensors and semi-conductor technologies.  Accompanying this is an ever-growing need for surface characterization allowing better definition of processes occurring at a microscopic level.Surface analysis is the use of vibration, electron or ion spectroscopic and microscopic techniques for the study of material at the atomic level, it includesSEM, AFM, XRD, EDX, ESCA, XPS, AES, Raman Spectrum, and FTIR analysis.

notes: 限 20 人；綜科 110-1 上課

description.zh: 本課程之目標為依人力職能需求，參考國內外之先行經驗，整合智能化生產所需之知識與技能訓練，以淬鍊出一套務實之智能化生產課程。本課程將涵蓋工業 4.0 - 智能化生產所需相關基礎技術之教學與實作課程，包括物聯網基礎技術與應用實例、雲端服務系統與資訊安全技術、巨量資料管理、分析、及應用實例、智慧化企業與工廠管理系統與應用、自動化與機器人技術及應用等等。
description.en: The goal of this course is to meet the needs of the manpower function, with reference to the previous experiences from domestic and abroad groups. This course will cover the topics related to the basic technology required for intelligent production, including the basic technology and application examples of the Internet of Things, the cloud service system and information security technology, the huge amount of data management, Intelligent enterprise and factory management systems and applications, automation and robot technology and applications, and so on.

description.zh: 本課程主要內容包括：（1）生產策略（2）產品設計與規劃（3）製程設計與規劃（4）廠址選擇（5）產能規劃（6）資源需求規劃（7）品質管理（8）物料管理（9）存貨管制。
description.en: The course mainly includes following topics：（1）operation strategy, （2）products planning and designing, （3）process planning and designing,（4）location strategy, （5）capacity planning, （6）material requirement planning, （7）quality management, （8）material management,（9）inventory management.

description.zh: 本課程主要在介紹人力資源與組織管理的進階理論與實務，內容包括了 (但不限於) 人才任用、訓練與發展、績效評估、薪酬管理、組織設計、領導、工作激勵、以及工作團隊運作等等重要議題。課堂上並討論上述理論對於管理實務上的意涵。
description.en: This course introduces many advanced topics of human resource management, organization theory, and organization behavior. Topics include (but not limited to) staffing, training and development, performance appraisal, compensation, organization design, leadership, work motivation, workgroup functioning. Implications for managerial practice will be discussed in this class.

description.zh: 主要內容包含：企業研究的本質、研究流程、研究問題與假設、文獻評論、資料收集、操作性定義、測量、理論架構模型化、研究設計、量化與質化研究、個案研究法、資料分析與解釋、研究報告撰寫。
description.en: The course mainly discusses concepts of business research methods. The contents will include following topics：（1）the nature of business research, （2）elements of research and research process, （3）research problem and hypothesis,（4）literature review, （5）research design, （6）research proposal, （7）case study, （8）analysis and the interpretation of data, （9）quantitative and qualitative research,(10) research report.

description.zh: 論文寫作
description.en: Thesis writing.

description.zh: 建立學生對各類顧客關係管理相關議題之基礎理論架構觀念，奠定學生日後從事顧客關係管理分析研究工作時之需。課程中將以個案實例為主，並配合各種資料探勘套裝軟體，以應用的觀點使學生更容易接受了解線上分析、資料倉儲與資料探勘分析的功用。
description.en: This course includes the fundamental theory of data mining techniques and the various applications in different enterprises. These techniques will include classification, association rule, forecasting, pattern recognition, etc.

description.zh: 設計相關專題，以文獻研讀，邀請專家專題演講，及論文討論為重點，參與者透過密集討論、書面報告、或舉行口頭發表等方式，可以有效率地交換意見，獲得更深入而廣泛的認識。
description.en: Topical studies in history, theory, and criticism of design. Under the above goals, inviting addresses for special topics will be arranged though the courses. The Participants are encouraged to have intensive discussion, written reports, or further oral presentation. Efficient opinion exchange would be also expected to derive more extensive interest.

description.zh: 在各指導教授的指導下，從事環境規劃與管理等相關領域的論文寫作，其宜包括研究方法或實驗方法、理論分析及研究結果﹙含結論與建議﹚。
description.en: A thesis of Ms. Degree should be proposed by all students associated with the agreement of their instructor professor. The thesis focuses on the fields in "Environmental Planning and Management", and includes research methodology, theory background and conclusive result or findings.

description.zh: 永續發展是妥善規劃與管理自然資源之最高指導原則，因此本課程﹙一﹚依此宗旨討論水資源保育、固廢管理與空氣污染控制；更將以實際例將面向擴及科技與社經整合層次，以期落實理論於實際應用之中。
description.en: This is intented as a brief introduction to the subject of the substainable development of natural resource. Main subject are water conservation, solid waste management and air pollution control. Many overall regional case studies will be discussed. It must be technologic, economic and social environmental change or a new factural data are developed

description.zh: 這門課著重在探討奈米科技之基本原理與應用範疇，以及環境應用與安全相關主題，內容包含奈米之基本特性、各種量測方法、結構控制、以及 "納米" 對環境應用與安全問題。此外並包含奈米微粒之產生、收集、測量以及微粒動力學等主題。
description.en: This course will investigate the definition and theories of nanotechnology. Including basic properties, measuring methods, structural control, environmental, and safety issues of "Nano-". Topics about generation, collection, measurement and dynamics of nano-particle will also be covered.

name.en: Special Topics on Nano- Technology and Environment

description.zh: 政策研究能檢視理論和實務的切合程度。本課程將帶領大家認識環境政策的經濟分析方法，學習經濟的思維觀點，以及如何運用經濟方法瞭解解決環境問題。除此之外上課內容並與法律結合，探討環境法的經濟分析觀點和傳統思維有何不同，尤其是對環境行為上之改變效果。希望學生能夠具體瞭解經濟分析方法幫助政府解決環境問題及規劃環境政策時所扮演的角色。
description.en: There is a significant trade-off between economic growth and environmental quality.  From this course, students will learn fundamental concepts in Environmental Economics and how to analyze environmental policy issues by using economic tools.  In additions, this course combines economic analysis to law, especially shows students how regulations affect people's behavior.  After this class, students not only know how economic approaches help the government deal with environmental issues and the differences between theory and practices.

name.en: Environmental Economics and Environmental Policies Analysis

description.zh: 本課程目的為使學生認識資源處理之各種物理選別及濕式冶金技術，包括破碎、粉碎、篩分、比重選別、浮游選別、磁力選別等物理選別技術，以及吸附、離子交換、溶媒萃取、晶析、沉澱分離等濕式冶金技術，並熟悉其理論基礎與使用時機，進而活用各種技術於實際之資源回收再生工作上。
description.en: This course will introduce the theory and application of various resources processing technologies, including the physical separation technologies such as crushing, grinding, sieving, gravitation separation, flotation, magnetic separation, etc., as well as the hydrometallurgy technologies such as adsorption, ion exchange, solvent extraction, crystallization, precipitation, etc.

description.zh: 碩士學位論文寫作。
description.en: Master  thesis  studying  and  writing .

description.zh: 專題報告，專題演講，研究小組討論。
description.en: Seminar  report ， seminar  speech ， seminar  discussion。

description.zh: 本課程主要探討本課程主要探討智慧生活科技相關議題。這是一門整合不同領域的新興課程，透過最新論文的閱讀與研討，學習智慧生活科技。
description.en: The goal of the course is to provide students with topics related to smart living technologies. In this course, we will take an interdisciplinary look at smart living topics and ubiquitous computing by reading and discussing recent literature.

name.en: Research Topics in Smart Living Technologies

description.zh: 中文課程概述：本課程將介紹如何使用工程軟體解決數值分析的相關問題。除此之外，本課程將培養同學在相關專業科目其工程軟體設計的技巧，並利用工程軟體所學之技巧解決各種工程問題。
description.en: How to solve the numerical analysis problem via engineering software will be introduced in this course. Students will be familiar with the programming engineering software in this course. Besides, students will learn how to utilize the software to solve the different engineering problems.

name.en: Application and design of engineering software

description.zh: 本課程涵蓋嵌入式工業視覺系統完整的開發內容，從機器視覺系統流程與演算法設計、嵌入式系統實作、函式庫封裝、人機介面設計、工業相機取像及實際案例分析。其中包含: 1. 嵌入式系統軟體實作：Linux 環境介紹與基本程式設計 2. Qt 人機介面開發 3. 工業用機器視覺演算法 / 系統開發，並提供相關設計概念 4. 實際應用案例與設計流程介紹。學生需要先有 C/C++ 程式語言及影像處理之基礎。
description.en: The goal of this course is to learn the basic tools and techniques required to implement Machine Vision on small, embedded, portable platforms. The primary focus will be on the design of industrial vision system based on specialized embedded hardware, with a little less focus on machine vision algorithm. The course will involve: (1) Linux embedded software development; (2) Qt GUI development; (3) development of embedded industrial machine vision algorithm; (4) application practice on the embedded platform, with an industrial camera, to demonstrate real time vision processing. The only pre-requisite for the course is to know C/C++ and image processing.

description.zh: 本課程之目標在於從科學哲學層次、研究方法層次、與實際操作層次探討設計研究的本質，內容包括界定設計研究問題、選用適當的量化或質性研究方法與特定工具、研究結果詮釋、案例解析、以及論文寫作等，俾使同學具備研究之基礎觀念以及進行創作或理論論文寫作之能力。研究方法一強調量化研究，課程內容包含研究的基本概念、文獻探討、研究問題、研究變項、研究假設、研究設計、資料蒐集與分析、研究工具、研究樣本、研究倫理與研究論文撰寫等。教學以課堂講授與論文研討與發表為主要方式，並以隨堂測驗、報告與分組討論與發表為評量依據。
description.en: The aims of this course are to explore the nature of design research at the three various levels of scientific philosophy, research methods, and pr92tical execution. The contents involve the introduction of defining the design problems, selecting the quantitative or qualitative research methods and specific instruments, interpretation of research results, case studies, as well as writing a thesis. This research methods one focus on quantitative research that content details includes fundamental concept of research, literature review, research problem, research variables, research hypothesis, research design, data collection and analysis, research instruments, research samples, research ethics and writing up.
