The te92hing methods include lectures, paper discussion and presentation based on the course assessment of assigned project, panel discussion and individual/group presentation.

notes: 排進修部教室，限本系生 14 人修

description.zh: 本課程規劃的目標為以互動設計的理論為基礎，實務導向為原則，使學習者能將學術界的理論與產業界的實務加以結合以充實對於互動設計具有全面性的了解。學習的內容包含互動設計系統構成要素、理論與實務基礎、互動設計方法與技術、科技支援與應用、認知心理、情境設計以及電腦支援協同合作等單元，各單元並包含不同互動設計個案的研討，使理論能與實務進行驗證。課程亦安排至相關領域業界的參訪，以加深對於互動設計實務的印象與了解。
description.en: The course aims to develop broad understanding on interaction design for students, based on theory and practice course structure. Course topics include essential factors of interactive system, interaction design theory and practice, interaction design methods and techniques, technical support and application, cognitive psychology, scenario design and CSCW. Course also incorporates case studies and company visits to enhance the understanding of integrating theory and practice.

notes: 排進修部教室，限本系生 14 人修

description.zh: 本課程之目標在於研討互動設計、互動媒體、互動藝術之相關研究專題，以文獻研讀、論文研讀討論以及個案研究為重點，藉由密集討論、書面報告以及設計專題之之研究與實作，學生可以有效率地交換意見，獲得更深入而廣泛的體驗，並具備研究、分析、實作之能力。本所以結合電子資訊、機電、人文、設計與藝術等各領域的學生，以整合培育互動媒體設計專業人才，因此，本課程之另一主要學習目標為建構一多元領域交互學習的環境，以專題導向式為學習模式，可分別組合具設計、藝術、資訊、機電等專長的研究生，協同完成互動媒體設計專題的研究，或是透過互動媒體設計個案研討、互動媒體設計專題創作的方式進行。教學將以課堂講授、論文研討與發表以及專題實作為主，並以報告、分組討論與發表以及實作作品為評量方式。
description.en: This course is to explore the fields of interaction design, inter92tive media and interactive art and focus on the literature study, paper discussion and case studies. With panel discussion, research report and design practice, graduate students can be able to learn the ability of research, analysis and pr92tice by effectively exchange opinions and personal experience. The aim of graduate of interactive media design is to integrate different disciplines from computer science, mechatronics, human-culture and design and art so as to foster the professional of interactive media design. Therefore, one of the aims of this course is to construct multi-disciplines learning environment which perform a topic-oriented study model. This study model formulates the graduate students of design, art, information and mechatronic disciplines to collaborate an interactive media design project. It may execute interactive media design by working with the form of case study or design creation.

name.en: Special Topics on Interactive Media Design (I)

notes: 排進修部教室，限本系生 14 人修

description.zh: 互動設計可視為三大傳統設計領域：平面設計、工業設計，與建築設計的延伸。在許許多多延伸出來的新設計領域如 UI、UX、響應式網頁、互動產品、智慧空間等等，圖像依舊是所有設計在發想、討論，與實現設計上所仰賴的根本工具。本課程以圖像為設計語言的架構下，介紹由圖像所發展出來的數位生產線，以模組技術介紹互動設計在設計發想、原型製作，以至到設計討論與提案所需要之圖像技術，並鼓勵學生以一設計提案來總結課堂之所學。
description.en: Interaction design can be considered as an extension of the long-established fields of architectural, industrial, and graphical design. Regardless what types of the recent emerging field of interaction design such as UI, UX, responsive website, tangible interaction design, or smart environment, the image remains as the visual language for design ideation to realization. This course introduces the concept of digital pipeline which is mediated on wide range of image related digital technologies. Through those modularized technologies, we can form a working pipeline to create a prototype for an interaction design proposal.

notes: 光華 409, 限本系生，預選限碩一 10 人，請自備 MAC 筆電

description.zh: 這們課程主要是討論人工智慧 (AI) 的理論基礎與相關應用，課程內容包含： 1. AI 問題的解題方法（搜尋技巧） 2. 知識表示的方法 3. AI 程式語言：LISP 與 PROLOG 4. 推論方法 5. 進階研究主題
description.en: This course provides a thorough discussion of AI's theoretical foundations and advanced applications. These are the following : 1. the fundamentals of problem solving (search algorithm) 2. knowledge representation 3. AI algorithms and data structure in LISP and PROLOG 4. algorithms for reasoning 5. advanced topics for AI problem solving

description.zh: 由於雲端運算的快速發展，大量資料收集與儲存技術已成瓶頸，大數據技術與管理提供一套具延展性與容錯能力的分散儲存與計算架構，能有效處理大量複雜數據資料的儲存與運算。 本課程除介紹現有的大數據生態與趨勢，並針對目前軟硬體架構的處理瓶頸，提供系統組態與部署、服務層級協定、監控與管理等系統性規劃的解決方案，並導入跨領域的工程管理科學知識。課程簡扼論述大數據技術與管理的重要，並在 Hadoop 生態系統中，以 Cloudera Hadoop 為應用範例，實作說明其重要性。 課程內容包括：大數據的概念、應用生態與趨勢、Hadoop 硬體規格與基礎架構規劃、叢集組態與部署、叢集服務層級協定、叢集監控與管理、相關生態技術、及概略介紹 Hadoop 認證與準備。
description.en: The course will introduce Apache Hadoop core technologies and administration with its major including: Big Data (BD) in demand and its application trend, Core technologies of Hadoop for BD management, Hadoop Administration and management tool, Hadoop cluster deployment,YARN applications plus MapReduce, Hadoop cluster hardware and software, Introduction of Hadoop ecosystem projects, HDFS configuration for high availability (HA), Hadoop security, Cluster resource scheduling and configuration, and Hadoop certification program, etc.

description.zh: 該課程涵蓋數據和信息的組織和人際關係。您將開發必要的技能和知識，以使用數據和分析來告知管理並做出更好的決策。通過案例和課堂討論，您將學習研究設計，內部諮詢，變更管理，數據解釋和演示的技能。
description.en: This class covers the organizational and interpersonal sides of data and information.  You will develop the skills and knowledge necessary to use data and analytics to inform management and make better decisions.  Through case examples and classroom discussion you will learn skills in research design, internal consulting, change management, data interpretation and presentation.

description.zh: 1. 網路協定、2. 消息理論和資料壓縮與視訊標準、3. 錯誤更正碼：迴旋碼渦輪碼低密度同位檢查碼 BCH/RS 碼、4. 無線視訊傳輸的抗錯、5. 跨層資源分配、6. 無線區域網路、7. 隨意網路和感測網路、8. 無線個人 / 大都會 / 體域 / 網狀網路、9. 物聯網等最新發展
description.en: 1. Network protocols 2. Information theory, source coding and Video standards 3. channel coding: convolutional codes/turbo codes/LDPC codes/BCH/RS codes 4. Error resilience in wireless video transmission 5. cross layer resource allocation 6.802.11 7. ad hoc and sensor network 8. WPAN WMAN WBAN WMN 9. IoT and other recent advances

description.zh: 這門課程主要是討論人工智慧 (AI) 的理論基礎與相關應用，課程內容包含：1. AI 問題的解題方法（搜尋技巧） 2. 知識表示的方法 3. AI 程式語言：LISP 與 PROLOG  4. 推論方法 5. 進階研究主題
description.en: This course provides a thorough discussion of AI's theoretical foundations and advanced applications. These are the following : 1. the fundamentals of problem solving (search algorithm) 2. knowledge representation 3. AI algorithms and data structure in LISP and PROLOG 4. algorithms for reasoning 5. advanced topics for AI problem solving

description.zh: 資料科學為最熱門的職業之一，各行各業對於數據分析的人才需求正在蓬勃發展，本課程在於培育從事資料科學或機器學習的人員來發展相關知識和技能。課程內容以線性代數、機率、統計學等工程數學為理論學習基礎，操作 Python 作為資料科學的實作工具，包括其相關 Python 基礎語法、各種資料型態、數據 可視化、開源工具等。接著學習利用 Python 取得數據資料，進而操作各種迴歸 分析來手動分析數據資料，並實作梯度遞減，決策樹等最佳化演算方法。最後則是介紹機器學習、深度學習等最新的 AI 演算方法來分析大數據並輔助決策。
description.en: Data Science has been ranked as one of the hottest professions and the demand for data practitioners is booming. This course is designed to develop people engaged in data science or machine learning to develop relevant knowledge and skills. You will understand how data science works based on mathematics, such as linear algebra, probability and statistics. Python is the best tool to learn how to conduct data science analyze data. Learn the basic language skills, common data types, visualization tools and extended modules for data grabbing and regression analysis. Gradient decent and decision tree for optimization will be covered. Finally, AI algorithm, machine learning, and deep learning, are introduced how data help in decision making.

description.zh: 本課程主要在介紹高階管理的理論與實務。將透過學校老師與企業高階管理者與學生一起探討當前管理重要議題。本課程以哈佛個案教學方法進行，在每個個案討論當中，同時由行銷管理、財務管理、科技管理、生產管理領域老師教授。可以讓學生在學管理工功能之外，還可以學習這些管理功能的整合，學期末並有分組個案競賽，促進團隊互動與學習。
description.en: This course focuses on the introduction and discussion of theories and practices of contemporary management topics. Besides university professors, renowned top manager will be invited to share the best practice experiences of the workplace in the lecture. The Integrated Management Case Studies would be taught by case methods from Havard Business School’s cases. Every case will be taught from Marketing, Financing, Technology Management, and Operation Management areas faculty. This course focus on the integration of management functions. The case contest will be hold on the final week to encourage team building and learning.

name.en: Advanced Management Practice and Integrated Management Case Studies

description.zh: 在管理決策中，要如何做行銷管理才能使得公司的產品賣得出去並增加公司收入。要如何做資金管理才能使得公司可以正常營運並將資金做適當的管理決策配置。透過國內外相關公司案例的討論，讓學生可以瞭解消費者行為、市場區隔、產品策略、通路、數位 (含 AI) 行銷等議題，以及對財管的投資、融資、營運資金、公司理財等議題有進一步的理解，讓高階經理人可以有更全面的策略營運方針。
description.en: In management decisions, how should marketing management be conducted to ensure that a company's products sell and increase company revenue? How should financial management be handled to ensure the company operates smoothly and makes appropriate management decisions regarding the allocation of funds? Through discussions of relevant domestic and international company cases, students can gain an understanding of topics such as consumer behavior, market segmentation, product strategy, distribution channels, and digital (including AI) marketing, as well as develop a deeper understanding of financial management topics like investment, financing, working capital, and corporate finance. This will enable senior managers to develop more comprehensive strategic operational guidelines.

description.zh: 本課程主要在介紹高階管理的理論與實務。將透過學校老師與企業高階管理者與學生一起探討當前管理重要議題。本課程以哈佛個案教學方法進行，在每個個案討論當中，同時由行銷管理、財務管理、科技管理、生產管理領域老師教授。可以讓學生在學管理工功能之外，還可以學習這些管理功能的整合，學期末並有分組個案競賽，促進團隊互動與學習。
description.en: This course focuses on the introduction and discussion of theories and practices of contemporary management topics. Besides university professors, renowned top manager will be invited to share the best practice experiences of the workplace in the lecture. The Integrated Management Case Studies would be taught by case methods from Havard Business School’s cases. Every case will be taught from Marketing, Financing, Technology Management, and Operation Management areas faculty. This course focus on the integration of management functions. The case contest will be hold on the final week to encourage team building and learning.

name.en: Advanced Management Practice and Integrated Management Case Studies

description.zh: 本課程旨在針對營運模式與供應鏈管理作探討，其中包含: 1. 電子化企業概論 2. 經營模式 3. 企業再造 4. 企業資源管理 5. 中小企業電子化 6. 商業電子化 7. 供應鏈管理 8. 需求鏈管理 9. 協同預測管理 10. 個案研究。
description.en: The purpose of the course is to discuss the business model and supply chain management. The contents of this course will include: 1. General concept of e-business management 2.The business model3. Business reengineering 4.Enterprise resource planning 5.Small enterprise e-business management6. Channel e-business 7.Supply chain management 8.Demand chain management9.Collaborative management10. Case Study.

name.zh: 營運模式與供應鏈管理
name.en: Business Model and Supply Chain Management

description.zh: 本課程主要在介紹高階管理的理論與實務。將透過學校老師與企業高階管理者與學生一起探討當前管理重要議題。本課程以哈佛個案教學方法進行，在每個個案討論當中，同時由行銷管理、財務管理、科技管理、生產管理領域老師教授。可以讓學生在學管理工功能之外，還可以學習這些管理功能的整合，學期末並有分組個案競賽，促進團隊互動與學習。
description.en: This course focuses on the introduction and discussion of theories and practices of contemporary management topics. Besides university professors, renowned top manager will be invited to share the best practice experiences of the workplace in the lecture. The Integrated Management Case Studies would be taught by case methods from Havard Business School’s cases. Every case will be taught from Marketing, Financing, Technology Management, and Operation Management areas faculty. This course focus on the integration of management functions. The case contest will be hold on the final week to encourage team building and learning.

name.en: Advanced Management Practice and Integrated Management Case Studies

description.zh: 此課程旨在說明決策理論之基本觀念，及其在真實世界裡相關決策問題之分析。使學生具備了解並建構決策問題，建構並推估決策之不確定性，以及建構並評估效用模式之能力。
description.en: This course provides an overview of the basic concepts of decision theory and their applications on the real-world decision problems. Students will learn about the problem identification and modeling, the modeling and estimation of the associated uncertainty, and modeling and evaluation of the utility function.

description.zh: 介紹概念和解決問題的技術在生產管理和運營管理中的重要性。主題包括需求預測、容量管理、資源配置、庫存管理、供應鏈管理、品質控制和專案管理。
description.en: Introduction to concepts and problem-solving techniques important in production management and operations management. Topics include demand forecasting, capacity management, resource allocation, inventory management, supply chain management, quality control, and project management.

description.zh: 論文寫作
description.en: Thesis writing

description.zh: 本課程旨在深入介紹統計技術和最佳化概念，藉以輔助管理之決策。課程涵蓋統計學及最佳化相關主題，包括描述性統計、相關分析、抽樣和估計、概率分布、假設檢驗、回歸模型、實驗設計和線性規劃。通過課程學生還將獲得統計和最佳化軟件（如 LINGO 和 Excel）的實際操作經驗。修習課程之學生將具備應用統計和最佳化工具處理實務問題之技能和知識，使其能夠基於數量方法之做出決策及管理。
description.en: This course aims to offer an in-depth understanding of statistical techniques and optimization concepts for making informed management decisions. The course provides a comprehensive overview of key topics in statistics, including descriptive statistics, correlation analysis, sampling and estimation, probability distributions, hypothesis testing, regression models, design of experiments, and linear programming. Students will also gain practical experience in statistical and optimization software such as LINGO and Excel through interactive tutorials. On completion of this course, students would be able to equip with the skills and knowledge needed to apply statistical and optimization tools to real-life situations, allowing them to make informed decisions based on quantitative methods.

description.zh: 本課程的目的一，將藉由五個面向了解企業倫理的本質，分別（1）廠商的社會責任，（2）消費者的保護，（3）員工的權益，（4）員工對公司的責任，（5）雇主與員工關係。目的二，進一步教授 ESG 及聯合國 SDGs 指標的基本定義，藉由國、內外的個案討論來深根學生對於企業永續經營的觀念。最後，透過對於 ESG 與市場機會、責任投資原則、環境足跡 (碳足跡、水足跡等) 盤點等，來訓練製作永續報告書的基礎能力
description.en: The objective of this course is to appreciate the essential of Business Ethics through five main faucets: (1) Corporate social responsibility, (2) Consumer protection, (3) Employee's rights and benefits, (4) Responsibility of employee to the firms, and (5) Employer-employee relations.The second objective is to further explain the definitions of ESG and SDGs, and then to root the concept of sustainable management to students through local and international case studies.Finally, through ESG market opportunities, principles for responsible investment, inventory of environmental footprint (carbon footprint, water footprint, etc.), we expect to build up students the basic ability to generate the ESG report.

description.zh: 強調現代人力資源管理理論與實踐的戰略視角。主題包括人力資源規劃，人員編制，培訓和發展，薪酬，績效評估和勞資關係。
description.en: Emphasizes strategic perspective of modern human resource management theory and practice. Topics include human resource planning, staffing, training and development, compensation, performance appraisal, and labor and employee relations.

description.zh: 國際商務市場行銷管理。包括在國際環境中的市場研究、定價、促銷和分銷。審查市場的問題出現不同程度的外資參與（出口，許可證，外國分公司）。先修課程：MARK5311 市場行銷。
description.en: Management of marketing in international business. Includes marketing research, pricing, promotion, and distribution in the international environment. Examines marketing problems arising from various degrees of foreign involvement (exports, licensing, foreign subsidiaries). Prerequisite: MARK 5311 (MARKETING).

description.zh: 戰略管理使用綜合管理視角去解決相關的制定和實施企業和企業級戰略的問題。該課程包括開發識別問題的能力，評估戰略選擇，並瞭解戰略的形成和執行的組織過程。它建立在功能區課程所獲得的知識，並使用案例研究和項目，以提高學生的分析和決策能力。前提：必須參與上學期的課程或與得到研究生導師的許可。
description.en: Strategic management uses a general management perspective in addressing issues related to the formulation and implementation of corporate and business level strategy. The course involves developing the ability to identify issues, evaluate strategic options and understand the organizational process by which strategies get formed and executed. It builds on the knowledge gained in functional area courses and uses case studies and projects to improve students' analytical and decision-making skills. Prerequisite: Must be taken in last semester or with permission of the Graduate Advisor.

description.zh: 介紹管理會計的概念、目的、問題、方法和術語。先修課程：ACCT 5301（會計分析 I）與 C 級或更高階的會計課程
description.en: Introduction to concepts, purposes, problems, methodology, and terminology of managerial accounting. Prerequisite: ACCT 5301 (ACCOUNTING ANALYSIS I) with a grade of C or higher.

name.en: Measurement and Analysis for Business Decision Making

description.zh: 本課程以哈佛個案教學方法進行，在每個個案討論當中，同時由行銷管理、財務管理、科技管理、生產管理領域老師教授。可以讓學生在學管理工功能之外，還可以學習這些管理功能的整合，學期末並有分組個案競賽，促進團隊互動與學習。
description.en: The Integrated Management Case Studies would be taught by case methods from Havard Business School’s cases. Every case will be taught from Marketing, Financing, Technology Management, and Operation Management areas faculty. This course focus on the integration of management functions. The case contest will be hold on the final week to encourage team building and learning.

description.zh: 公司治理已成為廿一世紀企業組織架構調整之重大議題，如何經由管理策略及法制設計使台灣企業經營回歸股東長期價值及利益，為政府、交易所與公會等自律機關、及企業經營者必須面對之問題。在法制上，獨立董事監察人、審計委員會之設置、公司自律守則之擬議、股東會之運作，均衝擊我國公司法、證券交易法及交易所規則現行管理架構及規範；在實務上，上市櫃公司如何順利接受公司治理之理念及管理規範，以提昇公司營運的外在評價與體質。
description.en: The corporate governance had been the enterprise framework adjustment of the main issue of the 21 century. How do the manage the corporate strategy and system of the law to make the profit for the shareholder, government and enterprise. The main purpose of the course to help the learner to understand the law of corporate and the practice of the enterprise.

description.zh: 本課程上半學期以 R 語言為工具，處理分析金融交易資料於股票期貨與選擇權等商品，包含理論模擬與實務分析。
description.en: In this course, we use R language as a tool to deal with the analysis of financial data in the stock, futures and options and other commodities, including theoretical simulation and practical analysis.

description.zh: 本課程以哈佛個案教學方法進行，在每個個案討論當中，同時由行銷管理、財務管理、科技管理、生產管理領域老師教授。可以讓學生在學管理工功能之外，還可以學習這些管理功能的整合，學期末並有分組個案競賽，促進團隊互動與學習。
description.en: The Integrated Management Case Studies would be taught by case methods from Havard Business School’s cases. Every case will be taught from Marketing, Financing, Technology Management, and Operation Management areas faculty. This course focus on the integration of management functions. The case contest will be hold on the final week to encourage team building and learning.

description.zh: EMBA 最重要核心精神為領導力與團隊合作能力，本課程希望培養在企業競爭激烈的環境之下，如何領導企業轉型，並以團隊合作模式加以執行的能力。課程設計為兩天的內容：包括創新與創業的精神、跨領域團隊建立、藉由活動達成團隊學習與互動、團隊凝聚力建立、領導力的訓練與培養、EMBA 應具備的四到 (學到、交到、做到、玩到)。
description.en: The core value of Taipei Tech’s EMBA program is leadership and teamwork. This course is to develop the ability to lead business transformation and team building in the dynamic economic environment. There are six parts in this course: 1. Entrepreneurship 2. Team building with cross-fields 3. Team learning and interactions 4. Leadership 5. Four must-do in EMBA( to Learn, Make friends, play, and make it)

description.zh: 讓學生瞭解製造業與服務業行銷的觀念和趨勢。主要包括以下課題：（1）消費者行為（2）市場區隔（3）產品策略（4）行銷通路（5）網路行銷（6）促銷（7）關係行銷。
description.en: The course teaches the student marketing concepts and trends. The topics will be covered: (1) consumer behavior, (2) marketing segmentation, (3) product strategy, (4) marketing channels, (5) online marketing, (6) relationship marketing.

description.zh: 策略管理主要是幫助製造業與服務業高階管理者作決策。一般而言，這門課程主要協助學員們具有策略思維與整合能力。學員可在策略管理學習過程活學活用，更能融合所學應用於管理決策中。此門課也採用適當的製造業與服務業個案研討來幫助學員學習、研讀與熟悉策略管理的運作，以達成此門課的目標。授課主題包括研討策略管理的本質與整體架構，瞭解組織所處環境 ， 分析外部環境之時機和危機， 剖析內部組織之優劣勢 ， 探討企業不同層次之應對策略，整合策略的執行與治理等。
description.en: Strategic management deals with the decision making in manufacturing and service industry at the top management level. Generally, this course provides students with strategic thinking and knowledge integration. With case studies in manufacturing and service industry, this course also helps students learn, study, and understand the process of strategic management well to achieve the goals of the course. Topics in this course include the essence and whole framework of strategic management, in what circumstances an organization has been, analyses on the opportunities and threats of external environment, the strengths and weaknesses of internal organization, application strategies of companies at different levels, implantation on integration strategies and so forth.

description.zh: 本課程設計為讓初學者了解並能分析在現今市場環境下，企業所面臨的財務問題。課程涵蓋企業資本評價的基本模型，包含企業金融資產的定價模式、實體資產評價與投資專案分析、資本結構分析，以及其他企業在資金管理與財務規劃預測的相關議題。目的在讓參與者對『財務決策對公司表現和價值的影響』有更深刻的認識。
description.en: The course develops theoretical framework for understanding and analyzing major financial problems of modern company in market environment. The course covers basic models of valuation of corporate capital, including pricing models for primary financial assets, real assets valuation and investment projects analysis, capital structure and various types of corporate capital employed, derivative assets and contingent claims on assets. It provides necessary knowledge in evaluating different management decisions and its influence on corporate performance and value.

description.zh: 本課程之目標在於建構產業分析之思維架構及洞悉市場發展之研究能力，以因應市場之快速變遷，並介紹學生瞭解總體經濟與產業景氣分析，公司經營財務報表分析，投資標的評價與技術分析。透過研究方法之介紹及預測手法之教導並輔以個案實作以達其效。
description.en: The objective of the course is to construct the infrastructure of industry analysis and to build up the research capability for changing market development. The fundamental analysis of macro economy and business cycle, financial statement analysis and investment valuation methods are also studied. By introducing the methodologies and forecasting tools, the case study is implied in this class.

description.zh: 本課程主要在介紹領導的藝術，以使學員瞭解中華傳統文化的觀點如何能增進組織治理的領導績效。課程主要涵蓋的內容包括：(1) 領導的基本概念；(2) 中華傳統文化的領導法則；(3) 領導的案例研究；(4) 領導的實踐。
description.en: This course introduces the art of leadership to the students helping them to understand how the concept of Chinese traditional culture can enhance the performance of leadership in organizational governance. Four major topics will be covered: (1) The basic concept of leadership; (2) the leadership principles of Chinese traditional culture; (3) case analysis of leadership; (4) leadership practices.

notes: (群組 2) 組織領導與人力資源管理

description.zh: 1.	建立企業經營管理的基本認知 2.	企業管理的經營模式認知 3.	導入運用的方法與案例 4.	提升學生經營管理能力
description.en: 1.	Establish basic understanding of business management2.	Cognition of business model of enterprise management3.	Methods and cases of introduction and application4.	Improve students' management ability

notes: (群組 1) 經營與策略管理 (聯輔會)，台北上課

description.zh: 本課程教導學生對製造業與服務業進行精實化管理的策略與技巧。課程內容包含：造成大型企業倒閉的商務環境改變與組織內的問題；科技提昇與電子化管理對企業的衝擊；精實化企業中有效及具競爭力營運管理的要素；精實化管理的發展策略與技巧。探討競爭優勢與生產服務系統模式、經營模式之關連，包括大量客製化、競爭優勢階段性、 發展競爭優勢作為、 豐富顧客價值。本課程將使學員熟習各項品質管理的理論基礎與發展趨勢，強化理論研究與實務應用能力。首先，課程涵蓋基礎統計使學員具備研究方法與分析技術能力，了解收集、統整和分析資料。其次，討論量化的六標準差管理相關工具及專案推行流程，以系統化思維探討問題並提出有效可行的解決對策，持續提升品質及客戶滿意。最後，介紹制度面及組織管理面的全球品管概念，闡述創造魅力品質之重要理論模型及影響服務品質關鍵因素。
description.en: This course covers the strategies and techniques of managing a lean business in manufacturing and in service. The linkages between competitive advantages and production systems, competitive advantages and business models will be discussed first. Then, topics include mass customization, competitive advantage stages, developing competitive capability and maximize customer value. This class will help students familiarize themselves with the trend of theoretical basis of the quality management and strengthen their ability in both theoretical research and practical application. First, the course covers basic statistics so that students will be acquainted with research methods and analysis techniques. Second, the six sigma management tools will be reviewed and the process for its implementation will also be addressed. Finally, the system- and the organization-level quality as well as the Kano Model for attractive quality will be discussed.

name.zh: 企業精實與全球品質管理
name.en: A Lean and Mean Business and Global Quality Management

description.zh: 隨著新冠肺炎的疫情，電子商務迅速地蓬勃發展，經營數位行銷的需求，已經是每個公司所必需的。從新產品的開發、行銷、到售後服務均受影響。網路電子商務已經成為傳統行銷實體通路以外的一個新興通路。使得電子商務明顯的成為未來商業發展的主流。因此，如何經營數位行銷已是現代企業具有競爭力重要課題。這個課程幫助企業在充分瞭解顧客信息的基礎上，針對客戶喜好，針對性地進行產品行銷，幫助企事業單位在激烈的市場競爭中取得競爭優勢。
description.en: Digital marketing is the conducting of business on the internet, not only buying and selling but also servicing customers and collaborating with business partners. This course will introduce the digital marketing by the way of concept, theory and case study. This course will study how to develope the business on the internet.

description.zh: 本課程將介紹大數據分析緣起與理論基礎，大數據分析與企業經營間之獲利關聯，並輔以大數據分析案例讓學員對於大數據應用有更深層的認識與啟發。
description.en: The big data opportunity, extracting insight from an immense volume, variety and velocity of data, in context, beyond what was previously possible, will be addressed in this course. Applications for big data analytics could include smarter healthcare, multi-channel, finance, computer log analysis, homeland security, traffic control, telecom, search quality, manufacturing, trading analytics, fraud and risk, retailing, among others.

name.en: Big Data Analytics and Industrial Applications

description.zh: 這門課程將深入探討 ESG 概念及其在國際趨勢中的地位，包括 CBAM、CCA、TCFD 等法規，亦將闡述國際評比、CSRD、IFRS S1/S2 等要求，以及國內主管機關的法規，尤其關於公司治理藍圖的要求。透過工作坊形式，我們將聚焦氣候變遷和財務相關揭露的重點，並以案例分享產業實務。從國際法規如 SB253、CBAM 到國際標準 ISO 20400，我們也將討論供應鏈管理和永續採購的趨勢。此外，將涵蓋人權相關議題，如 TIFD 和 DEI，以及永續報告書撰寫注意事項。最後，我們將介紹永續金融和責任投融資，並討論金融業永續法規對企業的影響。
description.en: This course explores ESG concepts and global trends like CBAM, CCA, and TCFD. We'll cover international ratings, CSRD, IFRS S1/S2, and domestic regulatory requirements, focusing on corporate governance. Through workshops and case studies, we'll highlight climate change and financial disclosures. We'll discuss supply chain management trends, ISO 20400, and human rights issues like TIFD and DEI. Additionally, we'll cover sustainability reporting guidelines and introduce sustainable finance and responsible investment, examining their impact on businesses and financial regulations.

name.zh: 永續發展與綠色金融管理
name.en: Sustainable Development and Green Banking Management

notes: (群組 6) 財金管理，台北上課

description.zh: 本課程專注在探討全球組織經營策略與領導決策之關鍵議題，聚焦在不同時空的國際經營環境中，企業經營者如何因應政府的政策與財經情勢改變，能夠快速回應與彈性應變的領導思維與決策。透過本課程將能夠理解高階主管面對政經環境的調整能有效因應變化，並且提升領導才能與創造市場優勢之創新能力。
description.en: The course focuses investigate the global organization's management strategies and leadership decision of the key issues. It is focusing in the different time frames and fierce international environment, how changes in policy of governments and situation of economic. Business executives will be able to quick to respond with the elastic strain of the global strategy perspective and leadership thinking. This course will be able to understand top managers can achieve the decision making of leadership, and improve the leadership knowledge and innovation capabilities in market competition.

name.zh: 全球組織經營策略暨領導決策
name.en: Global Organization's Management Strategies and Leadership Decision

notes: (群組 1) 經營與策略管理 (關聯群 2)

description.zh: 本課程主要在介紹人力資源與組織管理的進階理論與實務，內容包括了 (但不限於) 人才任用、訓練與發展、績效評估、薪酬管理、組織設計、領導、工作激勵、以及工作團隊運作等等重要議題。課堂上並討論上述理論對於管理實務上的意涵。
description.en: This course introduces many advanced topics of human resource management, organization theory, and organization behavior. Topics include (but not limited to) staffing, training and development, performance appraisal, compensation, organization design, leadership, work motivation, workgroup functioning. Implications for managerial practice will be discussed in this class.

notes: (群組 2) 組織領導與人力資源管理

description.zh: 由於產業環境辦化及科技創新速度，影響企業之營運模式。本課程旨在針對因應產業 / 工業 4.0 調整，課中會針對企業經營模式變革與產業 / 工業 4.0 產業生態鏈變革探討。 除了理論解析外，本課程並輔以企業實務個案研討。
description.en: Due to the change of industry environment and the speed of technological innovation, the business models of enterprise are impacted. The purpose of this course will study the transform of business model and the impact of Industry 4.0 on the ecosystem of industry. In the course, besides the theory will be included, the business practices case will be also covered.

name.zh: 經營模式與智慧化企業

description.zh: 新創事業面臨許多的挑戰，包括：避與大企業競爭，找到存活的依據、從無到創立強勢品牌、創立或擴張自有市場 / 消費者據點等。本課程旨在啟發修課同學創業的興趣並協助修課同學思考新創事業如何平衡有限資源以迎向挑戰。 新創企業已發展成熟的企業是不一樣，主要是因為新創事業的資源有限，創業家必須同時兼顧許多面向並回應顧客所需。本課程旨在協助修課同學思考創建企業應注意的各種面向評估自己的創能力。 課程包含了三大部份，第一部份為創新與創業概念啟發；第二部份在辨別市場機會與發展市場；最後第三部份為新創事業行銷管理。行銷活動能夠將企業的產品及服務傳遞給顧客；並將產品、服務及企業本身的資訊帶到市場上；將顧客資訊回饋給企業。創業行銷管理能夠幫助創業者向潛在投資者及企業夥伴銷售創意以獲得資源，也讓創業家透過創新的商業手法來充分利用稀少的資源。
description.en: Managers must have excellent leadership skills in order to A start-up company has lots of challenges, such as: niche market located and brand diffusion. The course intends to encourage the participant to become an entrepreneur and handle with these challenges. A start-up company is different from well-developed one due to limited resources. Usually, to response customer’s requirement, the entrepreneur must take multiple criteria into consideration simultaneously. The course includes three parts. Part I build students’ concept about innovation and entrepreneurship. Part II is about market identification. Part III is about marketing management of a start-up company. The efficient marketing activities enable business to approach customer’s requirement, to bring their customer product (or services) and get customer’s feedback. Also, the marketing management helps entrepreneur to reach their potential investor to obtain more resources.

description.zh: 本課程的主旨在研討資訊管理的發展及新趨勢，內容包含資訊策略管理、資料庫管理、網路管理、電腦硬體技術、系統分析、軟體工程、管理資訊系統、決策支援系統、商業智慧、資訊倫理、資訊安全、知識管理、社會網絡等。
description.en: The focus of this course is on research and discussion of the developments and novel trends of information management. The topics include information strategy management, database management, network management, computer hardware developments, system analysis, software engineering, management information systems, decision support systems, business intelligence, information ethics, information security, knowledge management, social networks, and so forth.

description.zh: 課程重點：(1) 藉由適合其程度的教材加強學生必備的基礎文法觀念和句型結構；(2) 使學生確切把握閱讀要領以及充分瞭解寫作的各種技巧，重心在生字、片語、句法的解釋和基本寫作技巧的分析；(3) 熟悉英語人士日常生活情境及與學生將來就業環境相關之會話及適當之應對方式；(4) 透過練習加強聽、說、讀、寫的知能及表達。
description.en: This course is designed (1) to strengthen students' previously required knowledge in English with basic grammatical ideas and sentence patterns reviewed through reading materials appropriate to their levels; (2) to develop reading skill by giving explanation of difficult words, phrases, and syntax, as well as analysis of basic writing skill; (3)to  familiarize students with useful expressions in conversation and build up their confidence in cross-cultural communication; (4)to reinforce the competence and performance of listening, speaking, reading and writing by practice.

description.zh: 本校科技大學的國文課程，以能力及素養之培植為導向，並以精深致用為授課標的，方能不負大學國文課程之名，並符合本校重視實務應用的優良傳統。依授課教師之取擇，課程可概分為兩大類。一、文學類：著重在文學品味力、語文敏感力、文學創意力與實作創造力等能力的深化。二、思想類：著重在批判思辨力、邏輯推演力、決斷力、組織整合力、論述力與品格實踐力等能力的提升。期盼藉由這兩大方面的磨礪，為學「生」未來的「生」存、「生」活與「生」命，開展出璀璨的「三生」有幸。
description.en: The Chinese language curriculum of the University of Science and Technology of this university is oriented to the cultivation of ability and literacy, and is taught with intensive application. Only then can it live up to the name of the university's Chinese language curriculum and conform to the school's fine tradition of emphasizing practical application.Depending on the choice of the instructor, the courses can be divided into two categories.1. Literature: Focus on the deepening of literary taste, language sensitivity, literary creativity and practical creativity.2. Thinking category: Focus on the improvement of critical thinking ability, logical deduction ability, decision ability, organizational integration ability, discussion ability and character practice ability.It is hoped that through the cultivation and training of these two aspects, we will develop a brilliant three lives for the future survival, life and life of students.

description.zh: 本課程希望在一學年中，能使學生對微分及積分有充分的瞭解、培養邏輯推理、啟發思考創造、強化計算演繹並注重應用與作圖，以建立同學未來學習工程數學及相關專業課程之數學基礎，充分達到學以致用的目的。課程內容包括：1. 極限與連續，2. 導數及其應用，3. 不定積分與定積分，4. 超越函數及其反函數，5. 積分法則，6. 不定型與瑕積分，7. 定積分的應用，8. 空間幾何與向量微積分，9. 偏導數，10. 重積分。
description.en: This course aims at developing comprehension of Derivation and Integral、activating capabilities of Logic Inference and Induction、enlightening confidence and independence、strengthening calculating abilities with an emphasis on its application and diagram、furnishing a sound basis for future specialty. The content includes: 1.Limits and Continuity, 2.Derivative and Application, 3.Indefinite and Definite Integral, 4.Transcendental Functions and their Inverses, 5.Techniques of Integration, 6.Indeterminate Forms and Improper Integral, 7.Application of Integration, 8.Basic Vector Analysis, 9.Partial Derivative, 10.Multiple Integration.

description.zh: 本校之普通物理課程專為工程科系背景之同學設計，主要的目的是鼓勵同學參與大自然運行奧秘、法則之探索，並供給爾後修習專業課程之堅實基礎。本課程之內容包含力學、熱力學、聲學、電磁學、光學及近代物理。教授者可按每週三小時、二個學期的時間設計、再參酌各系不同之需求、加強或節略某些章節。
description.en: The course is designed for the students with engineering background. The theme of this course is to encourage students to participate in the discovery of laws and wonder of nature, and to solidate the foundation for the particular courses of study for different departments. The contents of this course include mechanics, dynamics, thermodynamics, electromagnetics, optics, and foundation of modern physics, etc.. The lecturers will emphasize or abridge certain contents based on the individual needs of departments. For this course, there will be 3 credits for each of two semesters,  and 3 lecture hours per week.

description.zh: 瞭解組合邏輯與序向邏輯電路之分析，設計及簡化之方法，內容包含：１. 數系：數位系統所使用之各種數系及其轉換之方法２. 布氏代數：了解布氏代數的基本運算法和定律，及認識基本邏輯   及邏輯閘３. 布氏代數之簡化：介紹各種布氏代數之簡化方法４. 組合邏輯：據布氏代數及邏輯閘，計分析各種組合邏輯電路５. 可程式邏輯陣列：介紹ＰＬＡ，ＰＡＬ，ＦＰＧＡ等之設計方法６. 正反器：介紹各種正反器電路及了解其基特性７. 同步與非同步序向電路：介紹各種同步與非同步序向電路分析與   設計之方法 ８. 遞迴網路：介紹遞迴網路之設計方法９.ＶＨＤＬ：介紹如何使用ＶＨＤＬ語言設計數位電路
description.en: The course covers the analysis,design and simplification of bath combinational and sequential systems.Contents include:1.Number systems and codes2.Booolean algebra3.Simplification of Boolean algebra4.Combinational logic5.Programmable logic array6.Flip-flops7.Synchronous and asynchronous sequential circuits8.Recursive networks9.VHDL

description.zh: 瞭解各種數位邏輯閘，基本數位電路之特性及設計和應用，內容包含：1.TTL，CMOS 邏輯閘之特性實習，2. 組合邏輯電路設計實習含：算術電路，比較器，解碼器，編碼器，多工器，解多工器等，3. 序向邏輯電路設計實習含：正反器，計數器，記錄器，及移位暫存器等，.D/A 和 A/D 之轉換實習，5. 利用 ASM 圖之電路設計實習，6.PLD 設計實習，7.ORCAD/VST，PSPICE 數位電路模擬實習，8. 專題實作。
description.en: Experiments with various logic gates and basic digital circuits.Contents include:1.TTL and CMOS lab.2.Combinational logic circuit design lab.3.Sequential logic circuit design lab.4.D/A and A/D converters lab.5.PLD design lab.6.Digital circuit design lab.7.Special projects.

notes: 訓練場代開課，上學期限 A 組選

description.zh: 瞭解程式語言的基本結構，並以 C 語言為主要實習對象，其內容包含：1. 程式語言簡介：介紹各種程式語言及其特性，並對 C 語言之發展沿革架構及持點詳加討論，2. 資料型態：介紹 C 語言之資料型態及各種運算子，3. 基本輸入：介紹各種輸出入函數及輸出入實習，4. 流程控制：介紹指定指述，選擇敘述及迴圈敘述，並做實習，5. 前置處理：介紹前置處理觀念及程式實作，6. 函式：介紹主副程式及實作，7. 陣列與字串：介紹各種陣列之特性及字串與陣列之關係，並做實習，8. 結構型態：介紹結構，列舉及同位資料型態及應用實習，9. 指標：介紹指標之觀念及應用實習，10. 位元運算：介紹位元運算及應用實習，11. 檔案處理：各種檔案之介紹及檔案輸出入函數，12. 鍵盤與游標控制：介紹鍵盤、游標之控制及字元之特性，並作相關實習，13. 繪圖與音樂：介紹文字模式及繪圖模式函數，並作實習，14. C 語言與物件導向：介紹 C++ 與物件導向之關係，及物件與類別之基本定義，並作相關實習。
description.en: Understand the basic structure of programming languages. C language is used for the practice. The course includes: 1. Introduction to programming languages: introduce various programming languages as well as their properties and discuss the history, the structure and advantages of C language. 2. Data types: introduce the data types and operators of C language. 3. Basic Input and Output: introduce various input and output functions and work on their practices. 4. Processes Control: introduce assignments, select statements and loop statements and work on their practices. 5. Preprocess: introduce the concept of the preprocess and work on the programming practice. 6. Functions: introduce the main program and subroutines. 7. Array and strings: introduce the properties of various arrays as well as the relations between strings and arrays and work on their practices. 8. Structure data types: introduce structure data types and work on the practices. 9. Pointers: introduce the concept of pointe

name.en: Understand the basic structure of programming languages.

notes: 訓練場代開課，上學期限 B 組選

description.zh: 1. 資料表示法：定點系統 (Fixed Point System)，浮點系統 (Floating Point System)，2. 運算工作：定點之加減乘除，快速之運算，浮點運算，3. 指令與控制：各種指令介紹，中斷，硬體控制單元設計 (Hardwired Control)，微程式控制單元設計 (Microprogramming)，4. 記憶系統：記憶體之層次 (Memory Hierarchy)，虛擬記憶系統 (Virtualmemory)，快速記憶 (Cache Memory)。
description.en: 1.Data representation 2.Logic operations3.Command and control4.Memory organization5.Processor organization

notes: 訓練場代開課，上學期限 A 組選

description.zh: 1. 程式語言類別介紹 2. 物件導向與資料抽象化 3. 類別與方法 4. 訊息﹐實例與初始化 5. 繼承 6. 靜態與動態繫結 7. 多型性 8. 發展環境及工具 9. C++ Java Smalltalk 簡介 10. 應用程式實例介紹
description.en: 1.Programming Language Paradigms  2.Object-Orientation and Data Abstraction  3.Classes and Methods 4.Messages, Instances, and Initialization 5.Inheritance  6.Static and Dynamic Binding7.Polymorphism  8.Environment and Tools  9.Introduction to C++, Java, and Smalltalk 10.Case Study

notes: 訓練場代開課，上學期限 B 組選

description.zh: 1. 印刷電路板介紹 2. 線路圖繪製 3.PCB 佈局基本觀念介紹 4. 印刷電路板設計工具介紹 5. 高速數位 PCB 佈線設計的流程與基本原理 6. 阻抗特性、反射現象、串音現象的介紹 7. 高速數位 PCB 的量測技術介紹 8. 案例說明
description.en: 1.Introduction to PCB. 2. Introduction to Schematics Circuits 3. Introduction to concepts of PCB layout 4. Introduction to PCB Design tools 5.Flow and Fundamentals of High-Speed Digital PCB Layout Design 6. Introduction to Impedance Characteristics, Reflections, and Crosstalk 7. Measurement Technology of High-Speed Digital PCB 8. Case Study

name.zh: 高速數位 PCB 設計導論
name.en: Introduction to High-Speed Digital PCB Design

notes: 訓練場代開課，上學期限 B 組選

description.zh: 課程重點：(1) 藉由適合其程度的教材加強學生必備的基礎文法觀念和句型結構；(2) 使學生確切把握閱讀要領以及充分瞭解寫作的各種技巧，重心在生字、片語、句法的解釋和基本寫作技巧的分析；(3) 熟悉英語人士日常生活情境及與學生將來就業環境相關之會話及適當之應對方式；(4) 透過練習加強聽、說、讀、寫的知能及表達。
description.en: This course is designed (1) to strengthen students' previously required knowledge in English with basic grammatical ideas and sentence patterns reviewed through reading materials appropriate to their levels; (2) to develop reading skill by giving explanation of difficult words, phrases, and syntax, as well as analysis of basic writing skill; (3)to  familiarize students with useful expressions in conversation and build up their confidence in cross-cultural communication; (4)to reinforce the competence and performance of listening, speaking, reading and writing by practice.

description.zh: 本校科技大學的國文課程，以能力及素養之培植為導向，並以精深致用為授課標的，方能不負大學國文課程之名，並符合本校重視實務應用的優良傳統。依授課教師之取擇，課程可概分為兩大類。一、文學類：著重在文學品味力、語文敏感力、文學創意力與實作創造力等能力的深化。二、思想類：著重在批判思辨力、邏輯推演力、決斷力、組織整合力、論述力與品格實踐力等能力的提升。期盼藉由這兩大方面的磨礪，為學「生」未來的「生」存、「生」活與「生」命，開展出璀璨的「三生」有幸。
description.en: The Chinese language curriculum of the University of Science and Technology of this university is oriented to the cultivation of ability and literacy, and is taught with intensive application. Only then can it live up to the name of the university's Chinese language curriculum and conform to the school's fine tradition of emphasizing practical application.Depending on the choice of the instructor, the courses can be divided into two categories.1. Literature: Focus on the deepening of literary taste, language sensitivity, literary creativity and practical creativity.2. Thinking category: Focus on the improvement of critical thinking ability, logical deduction ability, decision ability, organizational integration ability, discussion ability and character practice ability.It is hoped that through the cultivation and training of these two aspects, we will develop a brilliant three lives for the future survival, life and life of students.

description.zh: 提供本校四技學生在本行以外，對其他領域的認識，以彌補其只鑽研專業課程的偏頗，訓練學生整合知識，使不致在知識爆炸的時代中迷失，促進各種專材的溝通，培養共識；培育人文素養，啟發人文關懷，使具有完整的人生觀。
description.en: This course offers a good opportunity for four-year college students in this university to have an easier access to a completely different field of knowledge, in the hope that students can add their individual professional knowledge and broaden their minds. The students will be furnished with integrated knowledge, discovering a better way towards professional communication, developing more common sense and never losing themselves in this information-explosive age. With a solid basis on humanity and liberal ideology, they are sure to find a more complete picture of human life.

description.zh: 提供本校四技學生在本行以外，對其他領域的認識，以彌補其只鑽研專業課程的偏頗，訓練學生整合知識，使不致在知識爆炸的時代中迷失，促進各種專材的溝通，培養共識；培育人文素養，啟發人文關懷，使具有完整的人生觀。
description.en: This course offers a good opportunity for four-year college students in this university to have an easier access to a completely different field of knowledge, in the hope that students can add their individual professional knowledge and broaden their minds. The students will be furnished with integrated knowledge, discovering a better way towards professional communication, developing more common sense and never losing themselves in this information-explosive age. With a solid basis on humanity and liberal ideology, they are sure to find a more complete picture of human life.

description.zh: 本課程講授家具工程製圖技術及相關知識，著重在家具工程製圖與一般工程製圖的主要差別，其能讓學生將所設計的家具產品以圖面表達其細部結構與工程要件
description.en: English Description This is the lecture of furniture engineering drawing technique and related knowledge, It emphases on the main difference between furniture engineering drawing and normal engineering drawing. The aim is for students to present the detailed construction and main parts of their furniture design product by drawing.

description.zh: 探討木材之物理及機械性質對於家具構造與製造品質之影響，並讓學生瞭解材料之組織構造以熟識家具用材之鑑定。終其目標在使學生認識材料進而善用材料。 介紹以木質材料為主之家具材料。內容含蓋木材之外觀特徵，組織構造，材料鑑識及其物理與機械性質對於家具構造和製造品質其間之關係等。
description.en: The macrostructure and microstructure of wood. Identification and uses of common Softwoods and Hardwoods. Physical and mechanical properties in relation to wood processing. Properties of other wood based materials such as particleboard, fiberboard, plywood, laminated wood related to their use in furniture manufacture also included.

description.zh: 讓學生瞭解木材機器加工原理及最新工業用木工機器之種類，並使學生熟悉家具製造技術，特別是製造家具需要用到的各種設備之加工能力，及其作業特性和刀具要件等方面之知識與實務。 介紹家具製造過程中所需之各種機器設備之種類及其加工性能。不論及機器本身之設計問題，而側重於機械之應用；不研究一種機器所能做出之各種巧妙的加工方法，而在討論量產作業時，如何利用最合適之機器及加工方法所應採用之標準操作方式。
description.en: Survey of furniture manufacturing technology emphasizing mass production equipment and its relationship to furniture product engineering. The course is directed toward the efficient use of equipment in the production of large lots. In addition, the course does not concern itself with ingenious ways to do a maximum variety of operations on one machine; however, it is interested in presenting the best machine and method for standard production operations.

notes: 設計館 B02 教室木工廠

description.zh: 介紹人體之形態特徵、心理期望、動作行為等人因知識，研究人因資訊應用於工業設計實務上之設計方法或準則以獲得具安全、效率與舒適之產品或環境設計。
description.en: Basic Knowledge for Ergonomic

description.zh: 教導學生認識色彩之成因及視覺現象、色彩系統之認識及色彩心理之種種現象。
description.en: Basic understanding about color. Including light, visual perception, color names, color order systems.

description.zh: 讓學生習得 3D 材質編修電腦軟體之技能，俾能將工業設計產品進行材質模擬與色彩計劃。
description.en: The study of materials edit computer software which could apply materials simulation and color plan on industrial design products.

description.zh: 本課程提供學生與家具實務界交流的平台，邀請家具相關領域的專家進行專題演講，並提供相互研討交流的機會，藉此使同學瞭解家具產業界現況及未來學習的發展方向。
description.en: This course provides students a platform for interacting with current furniture industry, through giving speeches from furniture relative field of industry experts. And provide opportunities for mutual discussions and exchanges. Thereby enabling students to understand the development of the furniture industry's current status and future direction of learning.

name.en: Practice Forum of Furniture and Design (I)

description.zh: 課程講授家具結構之專業知識與應用技術，理論與實務並重。內容包括開發流程、產品工程、基本力學、木材特性、複合板特性、木材接合、機械扣件、框類家具結構特性、板類家具結構特性、層板家具結構特性等。
description.en: This course is introducing the knowledge and technique of furniture construction, both theory and practicing. The contents include R&D procedure, product engineering, basic mechanics, characteristics of wood, characteristics of composite board, wood joints, mechanical fasteners, characteristics of frame type furniture, characteristics of panel type furniture, characteristics of shell type furniture etc.

description.zh: 創造家具工業新的工業技術並將銷售與產品體驗統合起來，建立具有適應性、資源效率的智慧型工廠，並在商業流程及價值流程中整合客戶以及商業夥伴，提供完善的服務。
description.en: The creation of new industrial technology and sales experience and product integration furniture industry together to build smart factory adaptable, resource efficiency, and integrate customers and business partners in the business process and value stream, to provide better services.

description.zh: 課程重點：(1) 藉由適合其程度的教材加強學生必備的基礎文法觀念和句型結構；(2) 使學生確切把握閱讀要領以及充分瞭解寫作的各種技巧，重心在生字、片語、句法的解釋和基本寫作技巧的分析；(3) 熟悉英語人士日常生活情境及與學生將來就業環境相關之會話及適當之應對方式；(4) 透過練習加強聽、說、讀、寫的知能及表達。

Literature: Focus on the deepening of literary taste, language sensitivity, literary creativity and practical creativity.2. Thinking category: Focus on the improvement of critical thinking ability, logical deduction ability, decision ability, organizational integration ability, discussion ability and character practice ability.It is hoped that through the cultivation and training of these two aspects, we will develop a brilliant three lives for the future survival, life and life of students.

description.zh: 依據提供服務準則，工程師們須以誠實公平公正正當和奉獻保護公共健康，安全及幸福。工程師們必須以專業標準的行為履行最高的倫理準則。本課程以（1）工程倫理概述（2）衝突與抉擇（3）守則與解說（4）個案分析，提供學生瞭解及研析。
description.en: Accordingly, the services provided by engineers require honesty, impartiality, fairness, and equity and must be dedicated to protection of the public health, safety and welfare. Engineers must perform under a standard of professional behavior that require adherence to the highest principles of ethical conduct. This course offers (1).Description of engineering ethics (2).Conflict and selection (3).Rule and explanation (4).Case study for student studied.

description.zh: 提供本校四技學生在本行以外，對其他領域的認識，以彌補其只鑽研專業課程的偏頗，訓練學生整合知識，使不致在知識爆炸的時代中迷失，促進各種專材的溝通，培養共識；培育人文素養，啟發人文關懷，使具有完整的人生觀。
description.en: This course offers a good opportunity for four-year college students in this university to have an easier access to a completely different field of knowledge, in the hope that  students can add their individual professional knowledge and broaden their minds. The students will be furnished with integrated knowledge, discovering a better way towards professional communication, developing more common sense and never losing themselves in this information-explosive age. With a solid basis on humanity and liberal ideology, they are sure to find a more complete picture of human life.

description.zh: 本課程希望在一學年中，能使學生對微分及積分有充分的瞭解、培養邏輯推理、啟發思考創造、強化計算演繹並注重應用與作圖，以建立同學未來學習工程數學及相關專業課程之數學基礎，充分達到學以致用的目的。課程內容包括：1. 極限與連續，2. 導數及其應用，3. 不定積分與定積分，4. 超越函數及其反函數，5. 積分法則，6. 不定型與瑕積分，7. 定積分的應用，8. 空間幾何與向量微積分，9. 偏導數，10. 重積分。
description.en: This course aims at developing comprehension of Derivation and Integral、activating capabilities of Logic Inference and Induction、enlightening confidence and independence、strengthening calculating abilities with an emphasis on its application and diagram、furnishing a sound basis for future specialty. The content includes: 1.Limits and Continuity, 2.Derivative and Application, 3.Indefinite and Definite Integral, 4.Transcendental Functions and their Inverses, 5.Techniques of Integration, 6.Indeterminate Forms and Improper Integral, 7.Application of Integration, 8.Basic Vector Analysis, 9.Partial Derivative, 10.Multiple Integration.

description.zh: 本校之普通物理課程專為工程科系背景之同學設計，主要的目的是鼓勵同學參與大自然運行奧秘、法則之探索，並供給爾後修習專業課程之堅實基礎。本課程之內容包含力學、熱力學、聲學、電磁學、光學及近代物理。教授者可按每週三小時、二個學期的時間設計、再參酌各系不同之需求、加強或節略某些章節。
description.en: The course is designed for the students with engineering background. The theme of this course is to encourage students to participate in the discovery of laws and wonder of nature, and to solidate the foundation for the particular courses of study for different departments. The contents of this course include mechanics, dynamics, thermodynamics, electromagnetics, optics, and foundation of modern physics, etc.. The lecturers will emphasize or abridge certain contents based on the individual needs of departments. For this course, there will be 3 credits for each of two semesters,  and 3 lecture hours per week.

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意力系的平衡，摩擦，面積與質量慣性矩，結構分析，虛功法。
description.en: Equivalent Systems of Forces, Equilibrium, Aera and Mass, Momemts of Inertia, Analysis of Structures of Virtual Work.

description.zh: 計算機系統之基礎觀念介紹及應用。主要內容包括：1. 計算機系統簡介 2 . 資料的表示法、數字系統、邏輯 3. 周邊裝置及儲存體 4. 程式語言與程式設計 5. 作業系統 6. 檔案與資料庫
description.en: This introductory course covers the fundamentals and applications of computers,including, 1.introduction to computer systems, 2.data representation, number systems,and logic 3.peripherals and storage, 4.programming languages and programming 5.operating systems 6..Files and database system

description.zh: 課程重點：(1) 藉由適合其程度的教材加強學生必備的基礎文法觀念和句型結構；(2) 使學生確切把握閱讀要領以及充分瞭解寫作的各種技巧，重心在生字、片語、句法的解釋和基本寫作技巧的分析；(3) 熟悉英語人士日常生活情境及與學生將來就業環境相關之會話及適當之應對方式；(4) 透過練習加強聽、說、讀、寫的知能及表達。

Engineers must perform under a standard of professional behavior that require adherence to the highest principles of ethical conduct. This course offers (1).Description of engineering ethics (2).Conflict and selection (3).Rule and explanation (4).Case study for student studied.

description.zh: 本課程希望在一學年中，能使學生對微分及積分有充分的瞭解、培養邏輯推理、啟發思考創造、強化計算演繹並注重應用與作圖，以建立同學未來學習工程數學及相關專業課程之數學基礎，充分達到學以致用的目的。課程內容包括：1. 極限與連續，2. 導數及其應用，3. 不定積分與定積分，4. 超越函數及其反函數，5. 積分法則，6. 不定型與瑕積分，7. 定積分的應用，8. 空間幾何與向量微積分，9. 偏導數，10. 重積分。
description.en: This course aims at developing comprehension of Derivation and Integral、activating capabilities of Logic Inference and Induction、enlightening confidence and independence、strengthening calculating abilities with an emphasis on its application and diagram、furnishing a sound basis for future specialty. The content includes: 1.Limits and Continuity, 2.Derivative and Application, 3.Indefinite and Definite Integral, 4.Transcendental Functions and their Inverses, 5.Techniques of Integration, 6.Indeterminate Forms and Improper Integral, 7.Application of Integration, 8.Basic Vector Analysis, 9.Partial Derivative, 10.Multiple Integration.

notes: 桃分署上課 僅提供能源系同學上課

description.zh: 本校之普通物理課程專為工程科系背景之同學設計，主要的目的是鼓勵同學參與大自然運行奧秘、法則之探索，並供給爾後修習專業課程之堅實基礎。本課程之內容包含力學、熱力學、聲學、電磁學、光學及近代物理。教授者可按每週三小時、二個學期的時間設計、再參酌各系不同之需求、加強或節略某些章節。
description.en: The course is designed for the students with engineering background. The theme of this course is to encourage students to participate in the discovery of laws and wonder of nature, and to solidate the foundation for the particular courses of study for different departments. The contents of this course include mechanics, dynamics, thermodynamics, electromagnetics, optics, and foundation of modern physics, etc.. The lecturers will emphasize or abridge certain contents based on the individual needs of departments. For this course, there will be 3 credits for each of two semesters,  and 3 lecture hours per week.

notes: 桃分署上課 僅提供能源系同學上課

description.zh: 教授電腦工程繪圖基礎，包括立體三維空間的投影觀念、幾何學製圖方法，訓練繪製草圖、各種物件之三視圖；並能正確標註尺寸，公差與配合，使具備繪製各式管路、鋼架、氣油壓及機械設備之相關標準工程圖的能力。
description.en: Instructing the basis of computer engineering drawing, including the concepts of orthographic projection of 3D space and the methods of geometry graphics. Training the skills to raw sketch, various 3D views. Learning to mark dimensions, tolerance and fittings correctly. This lesson also demands students to able to be familiarized the drawings of steel structures, hydraulic and fluid systems, and related mechanical devices.

description.zh: 內容包括各種能量形式、能源轉換、物質之熱力性質、熱力學第一定律。 冷凍與熱泵系統之熱力循環與實驗。
description.en: Analysis of energy systems, energy forms, energy transformation, properties of substance and first law of thermodynamics. Experiments of refrigeration and heat pump cycles.

description.zh: 管路處理、焊接設備及焊接練習、空氣性質測定、冷媒性質測定、基本冷凍循環實習、冷凍系統處理、基本冷凍機電路實習、基本冷凍系統組件之配置。
description.en: To familiarize students with practice of working with tubing, using with oxyacetylene brazing equipment, air properties measurement, identifying refrigerant by T-P curve, evacuating a system, charging and testing a system, wiring of basic electrical circuit and control circuit.

description.zh: 無塵室的應用、無塵室的基本系統、無塵室的基本設計、無塵室節能技術運用、無塵室廠務系統規劃
description.en: Application of clean room, basic structure of a clean room system, fundamental of clean room design, energy saving techniques for clean rooms, planning of clean room factory affairs.

description.zh: 中央空調系統基本設計理念、空調區之熱舒適理論與應用 、空調負荷計算 、風管系統設計、空調系統節能 、特殊空調系統規劃分析
description.en: Basic design concept for central air conditioning system, theory and application of thermal comfort of air condition zone, capacity calculation of air conditioner, piping system design, energy saving of air conditioning systems, planning and analysis of special air conditioning system.

description.zh: 車床、銑床、刨床、磨床、鉗工、鑄造、鍛造、鈑金、氣焊及電弧焊等實習。
description.en: Machining, Welding, Casting and Forging Shop Practice.

description.zh: 研究生在第一年必須選定指導教授，以決定設計創作或論文寫作的方向，從事設計創作的研究生必須發展創作理念、創作過程與實作說明，最後彙整創作報告形同於研究論文；從事論文寫作的研究生針對互動媒體設計的相關主題進行研究，並將研究成果撰寫成為論文，其內容包含緒論、文獻探討、研究設計與實施、研究結果與討論、結論與建議等。本課程目的旨在培養獨立企劃研究能力，建構研究設計與研究寫作的能力，對設計創作組而言，過程中培養協同合作的能力是必須具備的要項。
description.en: In the first year graduate students are requested to determine design creation and research topic under the supervision of their advisor. Graduate students who are chosen the fields of design creation should be developed creation principle, design process and pr92tical work. The results of design creation are considered as research thesis. Graduate students who are focus on the research of inter92tive media design should be undertaken the results of research as a thesis. The content of thesis includes introduction, literature review, research design and appro92hes, results and discussion, conclusion and suggestions. The aims of this course are to provide students with opportunity to initiate personal research into industrial design related topic. The course includes a training of developing research, writing up and references. To design creation groups. The collaborative capability is in need of the cultivation of ability during the process.

notes: 碩二生需上及下學期各一次選課紀錄

description.zh: 碩士學位論文寫作
description.en: A student must write a thesis to fulfill the partial requirements for the Master degree.

description.zh: 論文寫作。
description.en: Thesis writing.

description.zh: 論文寫作。
description.en: Thesis writing.

description.zh: 論文寫作。
description.en: Thesis writing.

description.zh: 論文寫作。
description.en: Thesis writing.

description.zh: 論文寫作。
description.en: Thesis writing.

description.zh: 論文寫作。
description.en: Thesis writing.

description.zh: 研究生在教授的指導下，針對工業設計相關特定研究主題進行研究，並將研究成果寫成論文。其內容包括研究方法、理論分析及研究結果﹙含結論與建議﹚。本課程主要目的在提供學生開啟個人對於工業設計領域相關議題的獨立研究能力。因此，本課程將包含如何建構研究設計、寫作與參考文獻的能力。
description.en: Graduate students are required to complete specific research topic under the restriction of their advisor. The results should be written as a thesis. The thesis focuses on the fields in "industrial design", and includes research methodology, theory background and conclusive result or findings. The aims of this course are to provide students with opportunity to initiate personal research into industrial design related topic. Therefore, the course includes a training of developing research, writing and bibliographic skills.

notes: 碩二必修 (畢業前須修滿兩門論文)

description.zh: 研究生在教授之個別指導下，針對特定研究主題進行研究，並將研究成果寫成論文。
description.en: Graduate students are required to complete a specific research topic under the instruction of their advisor. The results should be written as a thesis.

notes: 擬 114-1 畢業者，須累計加選 2 門 6 學分論文

description.zh: 人工智慧工具可以提供環境工程與管理領域諸多助益，使用人工智慧工具的主要優勢之一是能夠有效地分析和處理大量數據。環境數據的複雜性是一個具有挑戰性的課題，而人工智慧提供了實現更精確預測、持續監控、風險評估與問題解決方案。本課程將簡要介紹人工智慧技術的發展，以及人工智慧相關物聯網、環境監測、環境品質預測、環境研究等領域應用事例，還有人工智慧工具使用對環境可能的衝擊影響。
description.en: 人工智慧工具可以提供環境工程與管理領域諸多助益，使用人工智慧工具的主要優勢之一是能夠有效地分析和處理大量數據。環境數據的複雜性是一個具有挑戰性的課題，而人工智慧提供了實現更精確預測、持續監控、風險評估與問題解決方案。本課程將簡要介紹人工智慧技術的發展，以及人工智慧相關物聯網、環境監測、環境品質預測、環境研究等領域應用事例，還有人工智慧工具使用對環境可能的衝擊影響。AI tools can provide many benefits in the field of environmental engineering and management, and one of the main advantages of using AI tools is their ability to effectively analyze and process large amounts of data. The complexity of environmental data is a challenging obstacle, and AI provides more accurate predictions, continuous monitoring, risk assessment, and problem solving. This course will briefly introduce the development of AI technology, as well as application cases in the fields of AI-related Internet of Things, environmental monitoring, environmental quality prediction, environmental research, etc., as well as

name.zh: 人工智慧於環境工程與管理之運用
name.en: AI Applications in Environmental Engineering and Management

description.zh: 模糊集合之觀念與數學定理、模糊集合之數學運算、近似推理理論、解模糊化方法之設計、模糊控制器之設計、模糊控制器之數學模式、模糊控制器之理論分析、模糊控制器之應用實例分析。
description.en: Basic concepts and mathematical theories of fuzzy sets, Operations on fuzzy sets, Theory of approximate reasoning, Defuzzification methods, Design of fuzzy controllers, Mathematical models of fuzzy controllers, Theoretical analysis of fuzzy controllers, Practical applications of fuzzy controllers.

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意介紹雷射加工之理論及實務，注重製程參數之研究，教導學生如何掌握製程，以達到精密製造的要求。內容包括雷射輔助製造程序、雷射加工設備、雷射加工原理、系統分析、實驗設計、雷射加工實例。
description.en: Introducing theory and practice of laser material processing. Emphasizing the study of manufacturing factors. Letting the students know how to control manufacturing process, and fulfill the demand of precision manufacturing. The course content is : laser assisted manufacturing processes, facilities for laser material processing, the principles of laser material processing, system analysis, examples of laser material processing.

description.zh: 先修課程：電子軟體系統或相當之課程數位訊號處理簡介，DSP 架構與控制器硬體簡介，計時器、輸入捕捉、輸出比較，波寬調變，類比訊號轉換週邊功能與通訊架構介紹，DSP 訊號處理與控制應用。
description.en: Introduction to Digital Signal Processors, DSP architecture and integration with microcontroller, applications of DSP peripherals and communication protocols, applications of DSP to control and signal processes.

notes: 限 15 人；綜科 327 上課

description.zh: 本課程說明知識的定義、知識的分類、產業知識的產生和移轉，進而探討知識的創新，並利用知識管理提升產業生產及營運的效率，產業應用知識管理的概況和案例
description.en: This course is to explain definition of the knowledge, classification of the knowledge and generation and transfer of the knowledge. Moreover, the innovation of the knowledge will be discussed. Using knowledge management, it will improve the efficiency of the production and operation of the business. The applications and examples of the knowledge management will be included.

description.zh: 本課程以越南語教學為主，培養學生的聽、說、讀、寫能力，以達到溝通的目的，增進學生對越南文化的認識與興趣，提供學生越南語的基礎知識，越南經貿、觀光文化及越語字母拼音教學，讓學生在學習越語的同時，深入了解越南文化，協助學生拓展東南亞的就業版圖。
description.en: This course will help students have basic communication skill, basic knowledge of Vietnamese (including alphabet, phonetic and grammar) and better understanding Vietnam culture.

description.zh: 本課程以全球通史為基礎，以「從史前到古代文明」為主軸：探討人類從史前時代到古代文明的生活型態與設計發展。課程將涵蓋原始社會的生存工具、居住環境、裝飾藝術，進而延伸至美索不達米亞、埃及、印度、中國、希臘與羅馬等古代文明的城市規劃、建築風格、手工藝與社會結構。透過對這些歷史階段的分析，學生將理解不同社會如何運用材料、技術與文化價值觀來塑造其生活環境，並探討這些設計遺產對現代社會的影響。此外，課程將引導學生思考古代設計對現代可持續發展與文化復興的啟發，並透過研究與小組討論，發展歷史與設計的跨領域思維。
description.en: This course is based on A Global History and centers on the theme "From Prehistory to Ancient Civilizations," exploring the development of human lifestyles and design from prehistoric times to early civilizations. The course covers survival tools, living environments, and decorative arts of primitive societies, extending to urban planning, architectural styles, craftsmanship, and social structures of ancient civilizations such as Mesopotamia, Egypt, India, China, Greece, and Rome. Through the analysis of these historical periods, students will understand how different societies utilized materials, technologies, and cultural values to shape their living environments and examine the influence of these design legacies on modern society. Additionally, the course will encourage students to consider how ancient design can inspire modern sustainability and cultural revival. Through research and group discussions, students will develop an interdisciplinary perspective on history and design.

name.zh: 設計與生活型態研究 (一)

description.zh: 包括製作模型所需用之各種機械設備操作、使用工具、紙模型、工業油土等之加工技術。
description.en: English Description	Training students to operate some basically equipment such as bench work, sheet metal, machining, and welding machines safely and correctly, giving them the primary skills in model making.

notes: 設計館 B02 教室木工廠

description.zh: 本課程包含下列課題 1. 空氣清淨機構理論。2. 無塵室構造、建造及確效。3. 空氣過濾理論。4. 無塵室設計專案。5.	論文研讀。
description.en: This course covers the following Topics.1.Theory of air cleaning Mechanism.2.Clean room configuration, construction and         verification.3.Air filtration theory.4.Paper discussion.

description.zh: 系統功能分析，空調系統設計概要，負荷計算理論，送風與風管系統分析，送水系統分析，冷卻水塔熱質傳分析，主機系統性能分析
description.en: System function analysis, introduction to system designs of air-conditioning, theories on cooling load calculation, air moving and duct system analysis, water system analysis, heat and mass transfer in cooling towers, performance analysis of chillers

description.zh: 實驗是進行科學與工程研究不可或缺的工具，實驗方法的設計與實驗數據的分析更是決定實驗結果品質優劣的關鍵，本課程將介紹實驗過程所必須具備的各項知識，以數據的量測與分析為開始，並介紹量測各類物理量的感測元件，如壓力、溫度、流量及聲波等，以建立學生具備實驗量測的基礎。課程主要內容包含有基本量測、量測標準、量測單位、訊號讀取、資料簡報、數據的準確性與變異性、類比訊號量測、數位訊號量測、系統響應、感測器。
description.en: Introduction of Experiment and Measurement MethodExperiment is the essential tool for the research of science and engineering. The design of experiment and the analysis of data are the keys of the high quality of experiment. The course will introduce the materials of experiment and measurement. The procedures of measurement and the analysis method of data will be detailed investigated. And then the sensors to measure the interested physical parameters of pressure, temperature, flow rate and acoustic will be introduced. The technology of measurement and analysis of experiment will be built up in the course. The contents of the course are basic measurement, standards of measurement, dimension of measurement, access data, data presentation, accuracy and uncertainty of data, analog signal measurement, digital signal measurement, system response, and sensors.

description.zh: 熱交換器設計方法、單向對流熱傳計算、壓差計算、冷凝器與蒸發器分析、殼管式熱交換器分析、密集式熱交換器分析、濕盤管理論分析
description.en: Design methods, forced convection correlations for single phase heat exchange, pressure calculation, condensers and evaporators analysis, shell and tube heat exchanger analysis, compact heat exchanger analysis, wet coil analysis.

description.zh: 超低溫冷凍原理，超低溫冷凍系統設計簡介，氣體分離應用，液化氣體應用，低溫儀器，低溫冶金及低溫醫療。
description.en: Principles of cryogenic cooling, introduction to cryogenic cooling system design,gas separation applications, application in liquefied gases, low temperatureinstrumentation, low temperature metallurgy and cryomedical applications.

description.zh: 本課程中包含下列主題：1. 簡介；2. 電子商店的行銷策略；3. 電子商店的建 置；4. 電子商店的經營與管理；5. 電子商店的法律問題；6. 案例介紹；7. 結論。
description.en: In the course, the following topics will be discussed：1.Overview of EC；2.The marketing strategies of EC；3.How to install an EC；4.The management of EC；5.The current problems of EC；6.Cases study；7.Conclusion.

description.zh: 本課程內容包括通風系統基礎，工業通風，排煙設計，空氣過濾、送風系統設計及安裝與測試，以系統設計為重點。
description.en: The contents of this course include the fundamentals of ventilation system, industrial ventilation, exhaust design, air filtration, air moving system design, construction and testing, the focus of this course is on the system design.

description.zh: 物聯網應用介紹、電腦與感測器資訊擷取傳輸、通訊協定與資訊安全
description.en: Introduction to Internet of Things applications, computer and sensor information acquisition and transmission, communication protocols and information security

name.en: Introduction to Internet of Things Applications

description.zh: 邀請校內外學者專家至校針對某一專長領域進行專題演講，讓學生藉由聽講及心得報告之寫作，開展視野，並與時代之脈動相契合。(在職專班)
description.en: Invited speakers from different disciplines give speech in their specialized area. Thus students can broaden their eyesight and also keep updating the technology and its applications of the generation.

description.zh: 邀請校內外學者專家至校針對某一專長領域進行專題演講，讓學生藉由聽講及心得報告之寫作，開展視野，並與時代之脈動相契合。(在職專班)
description.en: Invited speakers from different disciplines give speech in their specialized area. Thus students can broaden their eyesight and also keep updating the technology and its applications of the generation.

description.zh: 本課程主要介紹最佳控制之相關原理與應用，內容包括如下：最佳控制簡介，性能指標，動態規劃法，變分法，變分法在最佳控制之應用，最佳控制之數值解與個案研究等。
description.en: English Description:  This subject is arranged to introduce the principles and applications of optimal control. The subject includes the following subtopics: introduction of optimal control, performance measure, dynamic programming, calculus of variations, variational approach to optimal control problems, numerical solution of optimal control, and case studies.

description.zh: 本課程在使學生認識嵌入式系統，瞭解其系統架構，並學習嵌入式系統之硬體與軟體之設計技術。內容包含：(1) 嵌入式系統介紹 (2) 嵌入式系統應用 (3) 嵌入式系統硬體 (4) 嵌入式系統軟體架構 (5) 中斷處理 (6) 記憶體管理 (7) 週邊應用 (8) 即時作業系統。
description.en: This course let students to understand the embedded system and learn the skill to design the hardware and software of embedded system.  The contents of this course are: (1)Embedded System Introduction, (2)Embedded System Application, (3)Embedded System Hardware, (4)Embedded System Software Architectures, (5)Interrupts, (6)Memory (7) Peripherals, (8)Real-Time Operating System.

name.zh: 嵌入式系統設計與應用

description.zh: 微奈米量測工程技術為是現代科技發展之重要前瞻技術，它將探討有效尺寸在微奈米等級範圍之精密量測儀器與技術。本課程將涵括下列各項現代精密量測主題：1. 近代光電量測系統與技術 2. 量測統計原理 3. 量測信號處理 4. 三次元座標量測系統與技術 5. 雷射干涉系統與技術 6. 影像量測系統與技術 7. 微奈米量測系統與技術 - 干涉術、相位移術、調變術、光共焦 及   自動聚焦術 8. 微奈米量測系統與技術 -- 掃瞄探針顯微鏡 (SPM), STM, AFM 及   SNOM.9. 奈米粉體量測系統與技術 10. 量測實驗 11. 小型量測儀器之專題製作
description.en: This subject is arranged to introduce the advanced systems and technology associated with micro- and nano-scale measurement. The subject includes the following subtopics:1.Modern opto-electro measurement systems and techniques2.Statistic principles for measurement3.Signal processing techniques4.Three-dimensional measurement systems and techniques5.Laser interferometric metrology and systems6.Image processing techniques for metrology7.Micro and nano-measurement systems and techniques (I) -   Moire interferometry, phase shifting, signal modulation,   confocal and auto-focusing techniques.8.Micro- and nano-measurement systems and techniques (II) -   SPM, STM, AFM and SNOM.9.Nano-particle measurement systems and techniques10.Student laboratory/practices11.Team project work for design and fabrication of    small-scaled measurement instrument

name.zh: 微奈米量測系統與技術

description.zh: 先修課程：動態分析與模擬或負責教授同意。  非線性系統現象介紹，參數影響及應用模擬方法，數值分析及案例研究。
description.en: Nonlinear phenomena, Effects of parameters, Simulations and analyses, Case study.

notes: 限 20 人；綜科 110-2 上課

description.zh: 全球化製造體系的形成，使得合約製造商必須以更積極的態度，從策略面出發，藉由各種電腦與網路的技術，整合內部與外部的流程與資訊，打造數位化工廠。數位化製造的目的，是希望藉由資訊透明化，提升整個製造體系的競爭優勢。課程的設計，是以概念介紹的方式，說明數位製造的應用現況與相關技術。本課程的內容包括：數位化製造概論、數位化製造實例說明、商業模型分析、知識管理、企業知識入口網站、產品資料管理、交易系統、資料倉儲、企業資訊入口網站、工作流程管理、最新數位化相關技術介紹。
description.en: Globalization has lead contract manufactures more active on seeking new strategies to survive. To increase competition, new technologies, such as computer and network technology, have applied. Computer and network technology can integrate internal and external information to establish a so-called "e-factory." This course covers different issues related to e-Manufacturing, such as Concept of e-Manufacturing, Case Study, Business Model Analysis, Knowledge Management, Enterprise Knowledge Portal (EKP), Product Data Management (PDM), Concept of Trading Systems, Concept of Data Warehousing, Enterprise Information Portal (EIP), Workflow Management, State of the Art Technologies, etc.

description.zh: 1 設計的基本概念 2 架構、資料型別與運算子 3 組合與循序邏輯 4 函式 / 程序與屬性 / 組態 5 階層式設計 6 功能與時序模擬 7 設計合成 8 狀態機設計 9 管線式處理 10. 記憶體設計 11. 特殊應用積體電路設計與實作
description.en: This course both provides the digital logical concepts and trains the student how to use the computer-aided design tools to simulate and to implement the advanced FPGA system. The contents of this course are listed as following: 1.Design concepts to logic circuits 2.Structure, data type and operator 3.Combinationa-circuit and Sequential-circuit 4.Function/process and task/attribute 5.Architectural design 6.Functional and timing simulation 7.Synthesizer 8.State machine design 9.Pipelined process 10.RAM and ROM 11.ASIC design and implementation.

name.zh: 高等 FPGA 系統設計

description.zh: 研究生須要具有整合、分析資料與創新思維、寫作能力以完成碩博士論文。本課程主要包括：一、 良好研究特質，二、 研究規劃， 三、學習方法， 四、 創新思維方法 五、 寫作方法， 六、 簡報方法， 七、 研究實務練習
description.en: Graduate students need to integrate information and innovative insights to successfully achieve a master or Ph.D degree. The course includes:1. Characteristics of good researchers. 2. Research planning. 3. Learning method. 4. Innovative thinking.5. Writing method. 6. Present method.7. Research design practice

description.zh: 1. 簡介 2. 基本可靠度方法 3. 頻率與區間法 4. 互連系統 5. 備載操作 6. 輸電系統可靠度 7. 配電系統可靠度 8. 變電系統可靠度
description.en: 1. Introduction 2. Basic probability methods 3. Frequency and duration method4. Interconnected systems 5. Operating reserve 6. Composite and transmission systems7. Distribution systems 8. substation and switching stations

notes: 綜科 514, 限職電機所電力組學生修讀。

description.zh: 專題報告、專題演講、研究小組討論
description.en: Literature Study, Seminar, Group meeting.

description.zh: 在現今產業激烈競爭與利潤微薄之階段，落實執行 "突破創新" 以增加競爭力之唯一生存之道，但鮮少有企業真正瞭解與實際地徹底執行它。不僅工程或服務技術要創新，管理思維更要突破創新，以有效迅速解？錯綜複雜的研發、工程與管理之諸多矛盾問題。本課程以創新構思問題解？法 (TRIZ) 為基礎，詳細介紹工程技術如何落實創新與管理實務創新如何執行。本課程適用於自有品牌業者、ODM 或 OEM 製造業者、服務業者與學術單位教學研究，特點如下：完整詳實闡述 TRIZ 理論並輔以大量簡單案例說明 TRIZ 概念、工程 TRIZ 實務案例 10 餘個與 TRIZ 工程與管理之參數與創新原則說明簡例約 800 餘個，管理實務案例 20 餘個，包含研發管理、服務業管理、專案管理與生產管理等。案例與簡例最多，創新執行力可快速上手與實施應用。本課程 TRIZ 研發、工程與管理兼顧，製造業與服務業高層、中層與基層員工皆符合讀者條件，使 "突破創新" 輕易實務執行並成為企業文化，亦適用於大學與研究所之工管、企管 (經營管理)、工商管與工程相關科系，可自行按需求選擇性深入教授講解某些章節，也替產業界事先磨練一群創新思維之活力新血，可長久伴隨您在職場 (或未來進入職場) 解決研發、工程與管理之困難矛盾問題。
description.en: The aim of this course is to show how to implement TRIZ to resolve conflicts in Product R&D, engineering, and management tactic in a innovative thinking manner. TRIZ has been well-known as a creative and innovative thinking theory in solving engineering and technology contradictions in the last two decades. However, few studies and practical usage were proposed in Product R&D, management area. Nearly 30 real cases are discussed to demonstrate the ideas guided by TRIZ in product R&D management, engineering technology, Project management, Service industry management, and Production management. This course is able to pre-train a lot of students creative way and solve contradiction for further applications in real career.

name.zh: 創新思維執行力實務應用
name.en: Practices and applications of TRIZ innovative thinking

description.zh: 本課程將介紹經濟分析之研究方法，不僅探討為何經濟分析之研究方法受到重視外，還會討論以經濟分析之研究方法，來具體檢視著作權、專利權、商標權、營業秘密等相關之智慧財產權，以達成理論與實際並重之教學目的。
description.en: This course will be introductions regarding research methods of economic analyses. This course not only why this research methods of economic analyses are important, but also discusses copyright, patent, trademark, and trade secrets, etc. Purpose of this course is both to put emphasis on theories and practices for teaching.

name.en: Economic Analyses of Intellectual Property Rights

description.zh: 專利攻防已變成產業策略之一，越來越多的訴訟案件逼使廠商進行專利迴避設計。事實上台灣的產業界對於迴避設計、專利策略與專利佈局理論上並不陌生，但在實務上卻很少實際執行，所以每年仍然付出五十億美金的權利金。本課程將從專利範圍解讀開始，熟悉專利的權利範圍，然後介紹專利策略以及佈局的方向，提供專利佈局與專利策略理論及實務經驗。本課程的綱要如下： 1. 專利權利項解讀 2. 專利侵權分析流程 3. 專利迴避設計要件 4. 專利策略分析 5. 專利佈局實務 6. 案例研究
description.en: Patent litigation, either initiation or defense, has become one of the industrial strategies, and more and more patent suit cases have forced the manufacturers to undertake patent design around. In fact, the industrial fields in Taiwan, theoretically, do not feel strange on design around and patent strategies. However, in practice, they perform much less. That is the reason why Taiwan still has to pay more than five billion US dollars each year for royalty. This course will start from patent claim interpretation, getting patent claims well known, then following with introduction on orientation of patent strategies, and providing theory and practice on patent strategies. The outline of this course is given as follows: Patent claim interpretation; Process of patent infringement analysis; Requirements of patent design around; Patent strategy analysis; Practice on patent strategies; and Study on patent cases.

description.zh: 本課程旨在介紹專利檢索及專利地圖的觀念，課程包含以下兩部分：一、為什麼需要進行專利檢索以及如何有效率地找到相關前案，二、如何建構專利地圖及相關資訊的應用。
description.en: The concepts of patent search and patent map will be introduced in this course. The topics of the course includes: 1. Why it is important to do patent search. 2. How to find a related prior art efficiently, 3. How to construct a patent map and exploit related information.

description.zh: 本課程所定義的文化產業包括音樂產業、電視產業、電影產業、劇場產業和其他表演藝術有關的產業。這些產業區塊都存在相關的智慧財產權議題，例如所有權、權利轉讓、合理使用、侵權行為、契約爭議等等。本課程將透過法院判決的選讀與產業案例研究來讓學生認識文化產業的智慧財產權議題。學生將被要求參與討論。評分方式包括課堂參與和報告。
description.en: The scope of the cultural industry covered by this course includes the music industry, film industry, television industry, theatre industry, and other industries related to performing arts. Intellectual property issues do exist in these industrial sectors. The issues include ownership, title transfer, fair use, infringement, contract dispute, and so on. This course is intended to expose students to various IP issues in the cultural industry through studying court decisions and discussing industrial case studies. Students are required to participate in discussion. The grading policy is based on class participation and essay paper.

name.zh: 文化產業與智慧財產權
name.en: Cultural Industry and Intellectual Property Rights

description.zh: 本課程將介紹現今用各種結構系統〔耐震、免震（隔震）、制震（減震）〕的特性及耐震性能原理，由基礎力學理論配合應用實務設計做一統括整理解說。並從地震中建築物實際破壞狀況的解說到耐震診斷及耐震補強技術做一現況的解說與說明。
description.en: The earthquake-proof performance principle and the characteristic of the structural system (1.General structure 2.Base isolation structure 3.Virbration control,Damper) being used well now are introduced at this course, and lectures from the mechanics theory of the base to a aactual design. In addition, the destruction situation and the earthquake-proof diagnosis reinforcement in the building are explained due to the earquake.

name.en: The earthquake-proof performance principle and the character

description.zh: 藉由本課程讓學生了解下列智慧建築之相關事項： 1、智慧建築之發展及構成。2、自動化科技對建築物之影響與效益。3、資訊通信系統與網路技術在建築及工程上之運用。4、台灣地區智慧建築在實施過程中所面臨之問題與應注意之事項。5、智慧建築之系統整合與綜合佈線。6、智慧型建築之設施管理。 7、智慧建築標章之評估指標。8、智慧建築之規劃設計與案例說明。
description.en: To provide students with the knowledge about intelligent buildings, the following topics are taught in this course: 1.The development and composition of intelligent building 2.Influence of automation technology on buildings 3.Application of information communication system and internet technology on buildings4.Problems faced during the course of implementing intelligent building in Taiwan 5.System integration and wiring for intelligent building 6.Facilities management of intelligent building7. Evaluation Index of intelligent building8.Planning, design, and case studies of intelligent building

description.zh: 講授設計相關學術研究的基本特質與科學方法的傳統。本課程之目標在於呈現各種研究方法的特質與限制，進而引導初學者以策略性的思考進行文獻探討並架構適當的設計研究策略，最後得以研擬具可行性的研究計劃。上述設計研究策略包括：文獻探討的方法與策略，蒐集研究資料的方法與策略，抽樣的效用與策略，及資料分析的策略等。
description.en: Lecture on theories of academic research and characteristic of science approaches in design research. This course aims to present learners with a variety of research methods and conduct individuals through the process of (1) strategic literature research, (2) constructing proper research strategies and finally (3) organize feasible research plans.

description.zh: 本課程之內容主要訓練學生獨立思考，培養學生對土木防災之認識，進而學習土木工程在防災上的應用，並進行專題報告、專題演講及研究小組討論。
description.en: This course is trying to train independent thinking, to cultivate understanding precaution of civil engineering for students. This course is also learning the application of precaution of civil engineering. In the class we have case study, seminar, and group meeting.

name.en: Special Topics of Disaster Prevention and Civil Engineering

description.zh: 本課程旨在闡述專案工程規劃與控制之系統架構，主要介紹各種專案規劃與控制之方法及專案管理方法，內容包工程專案管理方法，專案工期規劃與控制，專案成本控制方法，專案資源管理，專案風險整合管理，專案品質管理，及專案人力及目標管理等介紹。
description.en: 英課名：Investigation engineering control        System framework of investigation engineering         control.        Investigation plan and period procedure arrange.        A method that rate of progress control.        Natural resources to allocate and the most suitable         schedule.        Cost accounting and cost control.        Complete cost/System control of time limit for a           project.

description.zh: 本課程主要探討土木工程施工品質的內容，並藉由諸如統計品管，QC 七大手法，ISO9000 等品管技能與精義，探討改進工程品質，防止土木災害的相關技術。
description.en: This course will discuss the construction quality of civil engineering in detail.Form the learning of statistical quality,QC seven tools and ISO 9000,students can understand how to improve the quality and prevent the accident of civil engineering.

description.zh: 由於近年來電腦科技發展迅速，在透過地理資訊系統的幫助下，圖文整合的資料庫型態，已有相當完整成熟的作業方式。本課程將針對地理資訊系統的應用功能方向，分別剖析其主要架構與理論。同時配合相關地理資訊系統軟體，建立學員整體規劃能力。
description.en: In recent years, due to the rapid development of computer technology, Geographic Information System (GIS) that integrates text and graphics has become quite mature in terms of its operational procedures. This course will focus on the application of GIS functionality and analyze its main architecture and theory. It will also use relevant GIS software to help students develop their overall planning capabilities."

description.zh: 引介混凝土材料微巨觀性質、力學行為與新設計觀念。
description.en: (1)Basic Material Porperties-An Overview.(2)Coment Hydration and Microstructure.(3)Concrete Strength Development.(4)Creep and Shrinkage of Plain and Structural Concrete.(5)Durabiltiy.(6)High-Temmperature Effent:Design of Fire Resistance of    Concrete Structural Members.(7)Very Low Temperature Effects:Design of Concrete Vessels    for Cryogenic Liquids.(8)Linear Elastic Fracture Mechanics:tress Approach and    Energy Approach.(9)Special Type of Concrete Materials(High Performance    Concrete).(10)Micromecanics of Fibrous Composites-Elastic Modules and    Stress-Strain Relation Tensile Strength of Fiber    Reinforced Reinforced Composites.

description.zh: 課程介紹雲端資訊計算與運用相關技術，使學生對雲端平台、架構、服務有全面性瞭解。課程內容包括： 1. 雲端運算發展近況及基本概念 2. 資源虛擬化之基本概念與技術，3. 雲端運算相關技術、效能與安全，4. 虛擬化資料中心建置 - 虛擬計算、儲存、網路與應用，6. 雲端服務規劃，7. 雲端之基礎設施服務、平台服務、軟體服務介紹，8. 專題討論。
description.en: Cloud Computing, either private, public or hybrid, is dramatically transforming every aspect of IT. Now it has become ubiquitous these days, and is the key foundation for developing technologies of Big Data and Internet of Things (IoT). Its deployment starts delivering applications with more benefits than the existing legacy infrastructure.Because the terms are broadly quoted and adopted, then by this course, the Cloud Computing core technologies and the associated below will be well introduced:1.Cloud Computing Basic Concept 2.Resources Virtualization & Software Defined Data Center (SDDC)3.Cloud Computing Security 4.Cloud Technologies5.Cloud Service Planning and Deployment 6.Infrastructure as a Service (IaaS)7.Platform as a Service (PaaS)8.Software as a Services (SaaS)9.Cloud Service Operations 10.Case Studies and presentation

name.en: Principles and Practices of  Cloud Computing

description.zh: 本課程是教導學生金融科技的基本概念，使學生能夠建立金融科技的創新應用。內容包括：金融科技概論、金融科技商業模式、P2P 借貸、虛擬貨幣、雲端服務、第三方支付、群眾募資、P2P 匯兌、區塊鏈、跨境電商、程式交易、機器人理財與期末專題製做。
description.en: This course is to instruct students the basic concepts of financial technology and to enable students to develop innovative applications of financial technology.
