The contents include introduction to financial technology, business models of financial technology, P2P lending, virtual money, third-party payment, crowd funding, P2P remittance, blockchain, cross-border e-commerce, program trading, and robotic financial advisory.

description.zh: 資訊安全以全面觀點說明執行完整的資訊與通訊安全管理所需考量的各個層面，課程包括：資訊安全管理國際標準、資訊安全政策與組織、人力資源安全、資產管理、存取控制、密碼學與金鑰管理、實體與環境安全、作業與通訊管理 系統獲取、開發及維護、供應商管理、資訊安全事故管理、營運持續管理之資訊安全層面、制度及法規的遵循
description.en: Information Security provides a comprehensive view of information and communication security. This course content includes as follows: information security management international standards, information security policy and organization, human resource security, asset management, access control, cryptography and key management, physical and environmental security, operations and communication management system acquisition, development and maintenance, supplier management, information security incident management, operational sustainability management, information security aspects, systems and regulatory compliance.

description.zh: 注重環境永續、社會責任與公司治理的 ESG 原則，已成全球風潮，更是決定企業未來是否能順利接到訂單之關鍵，也是維繫企業在產業鏈永續發展之命脈。換言之，落實 ESG 原則，將帶動企業高成長、創造更多的社會福祉。 本課程介紹環境永續、社會責任與公司治理面向的理論與實務及其實踐的能力，結合國內企業推動 ESG 之相關做法與成功發展經驗，進而發掘、陳述、分析 ESG 如何促使企業創造出新的商業經營模式？推動 ESG 創造企業新價值與股東財富以及公司利潤間如何求取平衡？並進而提供解決問題之能力。本課程也會讓學生藉由規劃與實施一項公益活動，以實踐企業倫理與社會責任，並藉以思考在推展企業倫理、企業社會責任與公司治理等理念時，如何能落實於企業的體制之中，以建立一個永續發展的企業價值體系。
description.en: ESG principles focusing on environmental sustainability, social responsibility and corporate governance have become a global trend. It is also the key to determining whether a corporation can successfully receive orders in the future, and it is also the lifeblood of maintaining the sustainable development of the company in the industry supply-chain. In other words, the implementation of ESG principles will drive high growth of corporation and create more social well-being. This course introduces the theory and practice of environmental sustainability. This course is also designed to enable students to implement corporate ethics and social responsibility by planning and implementing a public welfare activity. The students should think about how to implement corporate ethics, corporate social responsibility, and corporate governance concepts. In order to establish a sustainable enterprise value system.

description.zh: 本課程主要在介紹領導與組織管理的理論與實務。課程目的有四個：(1) 了解組織領導與管理的內涵；(2) 討論領導與組織管理的理論與實證發現之間的差異；(3) 對實務界人士提供具體建議；(4) 將領導與管理的技巧應用到生活面。
description.en: This course focuses on the theory and practice of leadership and management in organization. Its purpose is threefold: (1) To gain an understanding of what the content of organizational leadership and management is; (2) to effectively combine the basic concepts of leadership and organization management and empirical findings and discuss the discrepancies and implications; (3) to discuss practical implications for business management and (4) to apply the basic ideas of leadership and management in daily life.

description.zh: 注重環境永續、社會責任與公司治理的 ESG 原則，已成全球風潮，更是決定企業未來是否能順利接到訂單之關鍵，也是維繫企業在產業鏈永續發展之命脈。換言之，落實 ESG 原則，將帶動企業高成長、創造更多的社會福祉。 本課程介紹環境永續、社會責任與公司治理面向的理論與實務及其實踐的能力，結合國內企業推動 ESG 之相關做法與成功發展經驗，進而發掘、陳述、分析 ESG 如何促使企業創造出新的商業經營模式？推動 ESG 創造企業新價值與股東財富以及公司利潤間如何求取平衡？並進而提供解決問題之能力。本課程也會讓學生藉由規劃與實施一項公益活動，以實踐企業倫理與社會責任，並藉以思考在推展企業倫理、企業社會責任與公司治理等理念時，如何能落實於企業的體制之中，以建立一個永續發展的企業價值體系。
description.en: ESG principles focusing on environmental sustainability, social responsibility and corporate governance have become a global trend. It is also the key to determining whether a corporation can successfully receive orders in the future, and it is also the lifeblood of maintaining the sustainable development of the company in the industry supply-chain. In other words, the implementation of ESG principles will drive high growth of corporation and create more social well-being. This course introduces the theory and practice of environmental sustainability. This course is also designed to enable students to implement corporate ethics and social responsibility by planning and implementing a public welfare activity. The students should think about how to implement corporate ethics, corporate social responsibility, and corporate governance concepts. In order to establish a sustainable enterprise value system.

description.zh: 新創事業面臨許多的挑戰，包括：避與大企業競爭，找到存活的依據、從無到創立強勢品牌、創立或擴張自有市場 / 消費者據點等。本課程旨在啟發修課同學創業的興趣並協助修課同學思考新創事業如何平衡有限資源以迎向挑戰。 新創企業已發展成熟的企業是不一樣，主要是因為新創事業的資源有限，創業家必須同時兼顧許多面向並回應顧客所需。本課程旨在協助修課同學思考創建企業應注意的各種面向評估自己的創能力。 課程包含了三大部份，第一部份為創新與創業概念啟發；第二部份在辨別市場機會與發展市場；最後第三部份為新創事業行銷管理。行銷活動能夠將企業的產品及服務傳遞給顧客；並將產品、服務及企業本身的資訊帶到市場上；將顧客資訊回饋給企業。創業行銷管理能夠幫助創業者向潛在投資者及企業夥伴銷售創意以獲得資源，也讓創業家透過創新的商業手法來充分利用稀少的資源。
description.en: Managers must have excellent leadership skills in order to A start-up company has lots of challenges, such as: niche market located and brand diffusion. The course intends to encourage the participant to become an entrepreneur and handle with these challenges. A start-up company is different from well-developed one due to limited resources. Usually, to response customer’s requirement, the entrepreneur must take multiple criteria into consideration simultaneously. The course includes three parts. Part I build students’ concept about innovation and entrepreneurship. Part II is about market identification. Part III is about marketing management of a start-up company. The efficient marketing activities enable business to approach customer’s requirement, to bring their customer product (or services) and get customer’s feedback. Also, the marketing management helps entrepreneur to reach their potential investor to obtain more resources.

description.zh: 注重環境永續、社會責任與公司治理的 ESG 原則，已成全球風潮，更是決定企業未來是否能順利接到訂單之關鍵，也是維繫企業在產業鏈永續發展之命脈。換言之，落實 ESG 原則，將帶動企業高成長、創造更多的社會福祉。 本課程介紹環境永續、社會責任與公司治理面向的理論與實務及其實踐的能力，結合國內企業推動 ESG 之相關做法與成功發展經驗，進而發掘、陳述、分析 ESG 如何促使企業創造出新的商業經營模式？推動 ESG 創造企業新價值與股東財富以及公司利潤間如何求取平衡？並進而提供解決問題之能力。本課程也會讓學生藉由規劃與實施一項公益活動，以實踐企業倫理與社會責任，並藉以思考在推展企業倫理、企業社會責任與公司治理等理念時，如何能落實於企業的體制之中，以建立一個永續發展的企業價值體系。
description.en: ESG principles focusing on environmental sustainability, social responsibility and corporate governance have become a global trend. It is also the key to determining whether a corporation can successfully receive orders in the future, and it is also the lifeblood of maintaining the sustainable development of the company in the industry supply-chain. In other words, the implementation of ESG principles will drive high growth of corporation and create more social well-being. This course introduces the theory and practice of environmental sustainability. This course is also designed to enable students to implement corporate ethics and social responsibility by planning and implementing a public welfare activity. The students should think about how to implement corporate ethics, corporate social responsibility, and corporate governance concepts. In order to establish a sustainable enterprise value system.

description.zh: 隨著科技不斷進步，人工智慧技術逐漸成熟，無論在生產流程、企業管理及分析決策等方面都陸續開始導入生成式 AI 工具，應用場景橫跨企業營運、數據應用以及產品與服務創新等。本課程將介紹生成式人工智慧原理並結合實作方式，透過實際案例和演練來教授生成式 AI 技術和應用。課程內容包括人工智慧的基礎知識，如深度學習、自然語言處理、圖像處理、推薦系統、預測分析等，並導入人工智慧在企業管理和決策、金融、數據分析、智慧製造等領域等應用案例。課程中將結合 Azure OpenAI 雲端服務資源，並以人工智慧跨域應用學習模式來跨域應用至數據分析、智慧運算、智慧製造及物流、商情預測、經營管理、金融等領域，以培育學生具備領先同儕之人工智慧跨域應用專業能力。
description.en: This course introduces the principles of generative artificial intelligence and combines practical exercises regarding the technology and applications of generative AI through real case studies and drills. The course covers fundamental knowledge of AI, such as deep learning, natural language processing, image processing, recommendation systems, predictive analytics, and introduces the application cases of AI in enterprise management and decision-making, finance, data analysis, intelligent manufacturing, among others. The course will also utilize Azure OpenAI cloud service resources and cross-domain application learning mode to cultivate students’ technical abilities in AI cross-domain applications, spanning across data analytics, intelligent computing, intelligent manufacturing and logistics, business forecasting, management, finance, etc., leading them to stand out among their peers.

name.zh: 生成式人工智慧於企業實務之應用
name.en: Application of Generative Artificial Intelligence in Enterprise Practice

description.zh: 1. 結構物劣化形態，介紹.2. 目視檢測與非破性檢測。3. 現況評估與分析。4. 維修與補強設計。
description.en: 1.Reterioration types of concrete structures. 2.Visual an Non-estructive inspection. 3.Conition Evaluation and Analysis. 4.Maintenance and Repair Design.

name.zh: 結構物檢測評估及補強

description.zh: 中文概述：專題報告、專題演講、研究小組討論。
description.en: Case study. Seminar. Group meeting.

description.zh: 線性代數為工程類學科之基礎數學之一，著重於訓練學生矩陣運算及基本數學証明。課程大綱如下：1. 解聯立方程式 2. 矩陣運算 3. 行列式 4. 向量空間 5. 線性轉換 6. 特徵值及特徵向量 7. 選擇性題材，視時間充許教授下列之一：矩陣數值方法，Jordan form , 或線性規劃
description.en: As a basic mathematics in engineering,the course Linear Algebraemphasizes on the subjest of matrix computation(theory) and thetechnique of mathematical proving.The outline of the course includes the following:1.Systems of Linear Equations2.Matrices3.Determinants4.Vector Spaces5.Linear Transformations6.Eigenvalues and Eigenvectors7.Advanced Topics: selet one of the following if time permitted:  Numerical Techniques in Matrix operations,Jordan form,or     Linear Programming.

description.zh: 瞭解程式語言所常用之各種資結構，１. 抽象資料類別及運算複雜度之概念，２. 靜態結構及其儲存法，３. 遞迴、堆疊、前序、中序、後序運算式，４. 佇列，５. 串列、鏈結串列，６. 樹、二元樹、平衡樹、堆積，７. 圖形，８. 排序，９. 搜尋、雜湊。
description.en: This course is mainly aimed at introducing the data  structures commonly used in programming languages, including: (1) the concept of ADT (abstract data type) and computational complexity, (2) static structures and their storage representations , (3) recursion, stacks, and prefix, infix, and posfix expressions, (4) queues, (5) lists and linked lists, (6) trees, binary trees, height balanced trees, and heaps,  (7) graphs, (8) soring, and (9) searching and hashing.

description.zh: 本課程之教學目標在使學生瞭解訊號與系統之基本概念及分析方法，以作為通訊、控制、電子電路、濾波器設計及數位信號處理等課程修習之基礎。課程內容包含：(1) 標準訊號及訊號表示法 (2) 連續系統的數學分析 (3) 離散系統的數學分析 (4) 拉氏轉換分析 (5) Z - 轉換分析 (6) 傅立葉分析 (7) 工程應用。
description.en: This course contains the properties of signals, systems, LTI systems, and basis linear transforms. This is a basic course in the field of communication and control.

description.zh: 可穿戴式應用已成了全球科技產業的新寵兒之一。因此，漸漸地，穿戴式裝置已成為人們生活用品的一部分。本課程討論可穿戴式系統導論、無線感測網路導論、生醫資訊模組設計、可穿戴式教學平台之設計、情境感知遠距監控與定位救援手仗之設計、非視覺型之不穩步態偵測分析設計、自行車玩家生醫資訊守護神設計、遠距醫療照護系統設計、與客製化谷歌智慧型眼鏡設計。本課程主要達成跨領域的高度整合應用訓練課程。
description.en: Wearable applications have been become one new darling of the global technology industries. Hence, gradually, the wearable devices have become part of people's daily necessities. This course will discuss the topics of “Introduction of wearable system, Introduction of wireless sensor network, Design of Bio-information module, Design of wearable teaching platform, Design of Context-Aware Tele-monitor and Position-rescue Staff, Detection Analysis and Design for Unstable Gait with Non-vision Base, Bicycler-Player Bio-information Guardian, Design of Tele-Medicine care system, and Design of customized Google Smart-glass”. This course is highly integrated applications to achieve interdisciplinary training.

description.zh: 1. 傳輸線 2. 散射參數 3. 微波主動元件 4. 寬頻放大電路 5. 低雜訊放大電路 6. 功率放大器 7. 高穩定振盪器 8. 壓控振盪器 9. 鎖相迴路 10. 混波器
description.en: 1.Transmission line2.Scattering parameters3.Microwave active components4.Wideband amplifier5. Low noise Amplifier 6.Power amplifier 7.Highly-stable oscillator8.Voltage-controlled oscillators9. Phase-locked loop10. Mixers

description.zh: 本課程主要係介紹資料壓縮的原理以及當前幾項重要的壓縮標準。本課程內容將涵蓋以下主題 01. 霍夫曼編碼 02. 算數編碼 03. 純量量化與向量量化 04. 線性預測與預測編碼法（DPCM，ADPCM，JPEG-LS）05. 轉換編碼（KLT，DFT，DCT，DST 以及 Walsh-Hadamard 轉換）06. 分頻編碼法（G.722 Speech coding，MPEG audio coding）07. 小波編碼法（SPIHT，JPEG2000）08. 字典模式編碼法 09. 跑長編碼法 10. 主題探討
description.en: This course is mainly focused on the principles of data compression techniques as well as the state-of-the-art compression standards. The course content includes01. Huffman codes02. Arithmetic codes03. Scalar quantization and Vector quantization04. Linear prediction and Predictive coding（DPCM，ADPCM，JPEG-LS）05. Transform coding（KLT, DFT, DCT, DST, and WHT）06. Subband coding（G.722 Speech coding，MPEG audio coding）07. Wavelet-Based Compression（SPIHT, JPEG2000）08. Dictionary techniques09. Runlength coding10. Selected topics

description.zh: (1) 資料庫系統簡介，(2) 關聯式與實體關係資料模型，(3) 資料表正規化，(4) 結構化查詢語言，(5) 交易管理與並時控制 (6) 分散式資料庫管理系統 (7) 物件導向式資料庫 (8) 電子商務中之資料庫 (9) 資料庫管理 (10) 網路式資料庫專題－規劃與實作。
description.en: (1)Introduction to database systems,(2)Relational and E-R database models,(3)Normalization of database tables,(4)SQL (Structure Query Language),(5)Transaction management and concurrence control,(6)Distributed database management systems,(7)Object oriented databases,(8)Databases in electronic commerce,(9)Database Administration,(10)Web-based database project-design and implementation.

description.zh: 本課程在訓練學生如何使用硬體描述語言來分析與設計數位積體電路及系統，進而能培養學生具有設計積體電路的能力，課程內容包括： 1. 電腦輔助設計積體電路介紹 2. 硬體描述語言程式設計與模擬介紹 3. 積體電路設計軟體之介紹及使用 (Verilog) 4.FPGA ( Xilinx ) 的設計 5. 專題設計
description.en: This course is trained the student to use hardware-description language tools for the analysis and simulation of integrated circuits(digital & analysis) .Therefore, the student have the design capability of integrated circuit. The contents of this course: 1.Introduction to the Computer-aided IC design 2.System design using hardware description language 3.Introduction to the computer-aided design of digital integrated circuits (Verilog) and computer-exercise 4.FPGA(XILINX)design and computer-exercise 5.Project

name.zh: 硬體描述語言程式設計與模擬
name.en: System Design Using Hardware Description Language

notes: 訓練場代開課，上學期限 B 組選

description.zh: 1. 各種感測器結構、特性及工作原理簡介。2. 各種感測器之測量系統及轉換界面電路設計。3. 監控系統及感測器應用設計。
description.en: 1.Introduction of sensors.2.Measurement system of sensors.3.Application and design of sensors.

notes: 訓練場代開課，上學期限 A 組選

description.zh: 西藥及中草藥是中華民族的傳統藥，也是中國藥學寶庫的重組成成分，中草藥包括中藥、草藥（即民間藥）以及少數民族地區使用的民族藥，在中國，使用中草藥防病治病已有數千年之歷史，寶鑑證明，中草藥療效確切，副作用較合成中藥少，力來深受群眾喜愛。當前，人類健康需要傳統醫藥之觀點正為越來越多之國家和人民接受，開發傳統要已成為當今藥物發展的潮流。同時，近年來科學研究成果表明，從中草藥發展出療效好，毒性低的新藥是一條成功的捷徑。因此，學習中草藥之人員日漸增加。本課程共分：西藥概論、中草藥概論、內科中草藥、兒科中草藥、男科中草藥、婦科中草藥、美容養生中草藥等。
description.en: The Drugs on Life is a two credit hours course and design especially for technology students. This curriculum emphasizes on the clinical applications and action mechanisms of various western and Chinese drugs. The curriculum trends will start from more details and bring a completely concepts. The subjects include neuropharmacology, autacoids, cardiovascular drugs, analgesics, anaethesia and drugs actiong on the central nervous system, chemotherapy of microbial disease and neoplastic disease, hormones and hormone antagonists, drugs acting on the blood and some Chinese drugs.

description.zh: 這 e 世紀時代的資訊交流是一個廣泛、多樣化與複雜的；究竟人們如何透過溝通表達意識與行為，卻變成非常重要。有效的溝通程度常視為學習溝通的指標，須視事實、竟見、感覺、嗜好和經驗進行徹底地交融與分享的結果。因此，本課程重視現代社會學習「溝通管理」的二項關鍵技術包括：有效溝通結合自我學習技巧和方法：商業知識與科技結合促成人的系統互動能力，配合多媒體傳輸工具完成學習個人與團體溝通效益。課程涵概主題：1. 溝通管理定義與本質元素。2. 溝通管理內涵分析。3. 學習個人溝通能力。4. 學習溝通程序。5.e 化自我學習技巧、方法與表達能力。6. 學習全球化溝通科技工具。7. 團隊溝通的策略與協同戰術。8. 塑造整體溝通文化。
description.en: The information exchange is wide, variety, and complicated in the e-era; how do people express their consciousness and behavior turn to become very important. Effective communication degrees usually are seen as the index of learning communication. It depends on thoroughly melting and sharing with fact, opinion, feeling, interesting and experience. Therefore, "Communication Management," in this course we emphasize on two key techniques of modern society learning including: effective communication with self-learning skill and method; Business knowledge and technology with interactive ability of human system. By using multimedia transmitting tools to complete self and group learning communication and get benefit.

description.zh: 本課程以培養學生尊重與欣賞不同族群、不同時空、不同價值觀所產生的音樂而設。藉由對音樂元素、本質的認知及介紹，欣賞各時期作曲家之代表作品，培養西方音樂的基本常識，建立音樂欣賞的專業態度。教學目標：1. 提高學生音樂欣賞的素養，充實其音樂生活的內涵，2. 激發學生對音樂的興趣，培育愛樂人口，增進社會祥和的原動力，3. 介紹古今中外音樂名家名作，啟發學生對音樂創作的認知與敬重，4. 建立學生對古典音樂、民族音樂、應用音樂及通俗音樂等不同類型音樂的正確認知與包容力，培養世界性的音樂觀。授課內容：1. 概論，2. 歌樂，3. 器樂，4. 儀式音樂，5. 舞蹈音樂，6. 戲劇音樂。
description.en: This course aims to cultivate students' ability to appreciate music of different ethnic groups, different time and place, different value systems. Through the introduction of basic music elements as well as the appreciation of the masterpieces of various composers, it is hoped that students will build up basic music knowledge about music and enhance professional music appreciation potentiality in music. The goals include: 1. Elevating students' capability in music appreciation 2. Inspiring students' interest in music with a view to improving our society into a harmonious world. 3. Introducing domestic and international famous composers' pieces 4. Touring of various forms of music: classical, ethnic, applied and popular music. Contents of this course include: 1.Introduction 2. Vocal music 3. Instrumental music 4. Ritual music 5. Dance music 6. Theatre music

description.zh: 環境保護是廿世紀的新課題，也是人類目前及未來所面臨的最大考驗。因為環境問題是超越國界的，因此環境的保護是每個人都必須瞭解的，也是每個人應盡的責任。本課程首先在了解環境與生活素質的關係，並了解環境問題的產生及其分類，再就台灣環境問題之所在分析其根源，最後了解台灣環境實施之現況後，並共同研究解決之道。
description.en: Introduction to Environmental Protection is a brand new issue of the 20th century; also, it is the biggest challenge of all human beings and our offspring. Because environmental protection is an international issue, everyone got to realize it's importance and take some action. This lesson is designed to help students understand: 1. the connection between our environment and our living condition; 2.the cause of environmental problems and their classification; 3.the cause of environmental problems in Taiwan; and 4.the solution to Taiwan's environmental problems.

description.zh: 生命科學概論，重心放在人體生命科學，並強化醫學的角色。此外，中西醫結合的觀點，詮釋抗老、防癌。以身心靈養生的方式，強化預防醫學。並從人類疾病的本源性病因，根本探討。當然，如何增強免疫力，袪除自由基是主軸。在探究人體潛能、身心靈養生或疾病的本源性原因時，都必須重視「經絡」系統。總之生命是非常奧妙的，不僅只物質面，更要重視心靈層面，中西醫整合方向，必是廿一世紀的主流。
description.en: This course focuses on human life science and emphasizes the roles of medicine on improving the life quality of human beings. It also uses the point of view of integration traditional Chinese and western medicine to interpret how to prevent the aging of body and occurrence of cancers. This course also focuses on how to keep the body, mind and spirit in the best conditon in order to prevent the occurrence of human diseases. In addition, it deeply discusses the eseential etiology of human disease and teaches audiences how to enhance the body immunity and how to get rid of free radicals. The importance of meridian system of the human body and its relationships to human potentiality, body, mind spirit and diseses are also discussed. Life is marvelous. The completeness of life depends on the saisfaction of not only the material but also menetal and spiritual needs. Integration of the traditional Chinese and western medicine to improve the life quality of human beings is the main issue.

description.zh: 因是在大專教藝術欣賞的課程，我在設計課程上，即考慮雖同學們不是藝術本科學生，但秉持 "雖創作，但會欣賞的原則"，我的課程安排將從上古時代人類的美術創作活動進而引導解釋什麼是人類的美感經驗。讓他們明瞭東方藝術之同與不同，再介紹東西方的繪畫潮流，如西方：從文藝復興至寫實主義，印象主義，至超印象主義，東方：從漢的畫象磚開始至中國畫，書法之演進，中西繪畫之比較，內容是繁而多的。但我將用簡潔扼要的 "重點教學法", 寓教於樂的方式，讓同學不再懼怕 "Art'，甚至可以簡單的分辨出藝術品的年代，作者，及欣賞藝術作品的要領，這是我給此門課所訂的目標。另一個教學重點是：" 理論和實際併重 "。在每一單元中，我將設計一項簡的 [自己動手做] 大概祇花 20-30 分鐘讓學生體會和真正看見，明白，藝術家製造藝術品的過程。很希望能帶學生至博物院或美術館一趟，或至鶯砍參觀陶工廠。總之，一切課程計劃，乃配合學生之程度與興趣。
description.en: Because most students taking this course are not art major; therefore, I adhere to the principle of "Although not creation, appreciation will be instructed."  On course design, my class starts from the artistic creation of human beings in prehistoric time and further introduces the experience of beauty sensed by man and understand the similiar and difference of eastern and western art.  Moreover, I will introduce the fashion of priniting of eastern and western culture.  For example, the western culture: from the Renaissance to realism, impressionism and super impressionism.  Western culture: from a portrait stone of Han Dynasty to Chinese painting, the develpment of calligraphy and comparison of Chinese and western paintings. The teaching content is complicated, but I will simply it and highlight teaching way to let my students enjoy it.

description.zh: 投資是有報酬和風險的，不同金融產品有不同的報酬率和風險，例如：存款報酬低風險低，期貨報酬高風險高。如何將資金做一個妥善分配，選擇合適的一組金融商品，就能避不必要的風險而得到不錯的報酬率。投資學課程可以使學習者了解如何以投資學理論評估各種金融商品的可能風險和報酬率，再依投資者經濟能力選擇合適的金融商品進行投資。對於理工科系人員，了解投資學課程是增強理工科系人員理財素養的重要課程之一。
description.en: Investment has its rewards and risks; different financial products have different rates of return and risk. For example: deposits have low rewards with low risks; futures have high rewards with high risks. With making a proper allocation of funds and choosing the right set of financial products, one can avoid unnecessary risks and get a good rate of return. Investment courses make students understand how to apply financial instruments theory to assess possible risks and returns in various financial instruments, and then invest the suitable financial products according to the economic capacity of investors. For science and engineering personnel, understanding the investment in science and engineering courses is one of the important programs to enhance financial literacy personnel.

description.zh: 新經濟與舊經濟的分野不是在有『e』還是沒有『e』，而是在有『i』還是沒有『i』，而『i』就是『Innovation，創新』。二十一世紀的『腦力經濟』最重要的戲規則就是『智慧財產權』，同時也是 WTO 會員國必須遵守的重要規範之一。課程內容主要包括三個最基本的智慧財產權課題：專利權，商標權，以及著作權；而為配合本校學生學科背景，本課程將較著重於『專利』方面的實務知識，並且講授『如何激發創意，以培養學生日後能好好應用『智慧財產權』的保護。
description.en: The difference between New-economy and Old-economy is not caused by having "e" or not having "e", but caused by owining "i" or not owning "i". where "I" means "Innovation:.  Intellectual Property is not only the most importance business rule of the :Brain economy era:, but also one of the most important agreements among WTO members.  This course includes the basic three subjects of Intellectual Property:Patent, Trademark, and Copyright.  In order to accommodate the learning background for most of NTUT students, the contents of this course will focus more on the practical practice of the Patennt.  In addition, it also includes the subject of "how to activate your creativeness:so as to make students can use what they learn, "Intellectual Property:, to protect their intellectual work.

description.zh: 電腦軟體專利授予已歷經多年，然而不同於其它技術領域，於我國有一特定的審查標準。而近年來人工智慧技術飛猛進，雖奠基於電腦軟體，但其生成又牽涉到不同的概念與技術。人工智慧專利權的授予，如何適用電腦軟體發明的審查標準、或須另行適用一套新的標準，將是本課程之重點。本課程將提供學生相關近年來的專利審查趨勢與標準，以了解電腦軟體發明與人工智慧發明，其特定的專利審查標準，以及其間之異同。
description.en: For years, computer software has been eligible for patent protection, but it faces unique rules and standards compared to other technical fields. The rise of artificial intelligence (AI) has added new challenges, as AI technologies, while built on software, involve innovative concepts like machine learning and data-driven systems. This course explores how patents are granted for computer software and AI inventions, examining whether traditional software patent rules apply to AI or if new standards are needed. Students will gain a clear understanding of patent examination trends, learn the specific requirements for software and AI patents, and analyze the similarities and differences between them.

name.zh: 電腦軟體暨 AI 專利

description.zh: 專題報告專題演講 研究小組討論
description.en: Case Study.Seminar.Group meeting.

description.zh: 本課程將結合理論說明與示範實習，使同學對雷射基本原理及光電科技應用有一完整的認識，內容包括：1. 光電工程概論，2. 基礎光學，3. 電射發光原理，4. 雷射光的調製，5. 光電科技應用概論。
description.en: The course covers bath lectures and lab exercise1.Introduction 2.Fundamentals of optics3.Laser principles4.Electrooptic modulation of laser beams5.Applications of electrooptic techniques

description.zh: 瞭解微算機之基本組織架構及應用，內容包含：1.PC 之使用，2. 微電腦學習機之使用，3. 邏輯分析儀之使用，4. 組合語言之設計與除錯，5. 記憶體設計 ROM/RAM，6. 輸出入埠設計及程式控制，7. 輸出入埠應用 (鍵盤介面、LED 顯示介面)，8.A/D、D/A 介面設計，9. 簡單 PC 介面卡設計 (PIO 及 SIO) 介面，單晶片之設計與應用。
description.en: The experiment covers the basic architecture and application of microcomputer.The lab. work includes:1.The usage of PC2.The usage of microcomputer training machine3.Logic analysis4.The design and debug of assembly language5.ROM/RAM design6.I/O design and control 7.A/D, D/A design8.PC interfacing design9.Single-chip microcomputer system design

name.zh: 微算機原理及應用實習

notes: 訓練場代開課，上學期限 B 組選

description.zh: 瞭解電路元件之基本特性及其組合電路之分析方法，內容包含：1. 電路元件：電壓及電流源，主動元件，2. 電路特性：歐姆定律，柯希荷夫電壓與電流定律等，3. 一階及二階電路：電路之微分方程描述及各種輸入信號之響應，4. 穩態分析與頻率響應：分析電路之頻域，5. 電腦輔助電路分析：如使用 SPICE 工具。
description.en: 1.Introduction to linear circuit analysis2.Resistve circuit 3.Kirchhoff laws4.Thevenin and Norton theorem5.First and second order circuit6.Node and loop analysis7.Steady state response and analysis8.SPICE tool

notes: 訓練場代開課，上學期限 A 組選

description.zh: (1) 半導體二極體特性曲線；(2) 半導體二極體之應用：整流器，濾波器，剪波器，箝位器，倍壓器；(3) 發光二極體驅動電路；(4) 齊納二極體穩壓電路；(5) 雙極接合面電晶體之辨別與參數量測；(6) 雙極接合面電晶體輸入及輸出特性曲線；(7) 雙極接合面電晶體直流偏壓電路；(8) 共射極放大電路；(9) 射極隨耦電路；(10) 共基極定電流源電路；(11) 場效電晶體之辨別與參數量測；(12) 場效電晶體轉移及輸出特性曲線；(13) 場效電晶體直流偏壓電路；(14) 場效電晶體放大電路；(15) 整流及濾波電路；(16) 偏壓分析與設計；(17) 基本放大器 (共射，共基，共集模式，共源，共汲，共閘等); (18) 串級放大器；(19) 差動放大器。
description.en: (1)The characteristic curve of PN diode; (2)The applications of PN diode : Rectifier, Filter, Clipper, Clamper, and Voltage-doubler; (3)Light Emitting Diode drivers; (4)Zener diode for voltage regulation; (5)The identification of BJT's leads and the measurement of b parameter; (6)The input and output characteristic curves of BJTs; (7)DC biasing circuits for BJTs; (8)Common-Emitter(CE) amplifiers; (9)Emitter-follower(EF) circuits; (10)Common-Base(CB) constant current sources; (11)The identification of FET's leads and the measurement of device parameters; (12)The transfer and output characteristic curves of FETs; (13)DC biasing circuits for FETs; (14)The amplifying circuits of FETs; (15)Retifier circuit and Filter; (16)Bias analysis and design; (17)Common Emitter amplifier, Common base amplifier, Common collector amplifier; (18)Differential amplifier.

notes: 訓練場代開課，上學期限 A 組選

description.zh: 本課程內容包括邏輯閘的特性與功能測試，能利用積體電路完成各種基礎邏輯電路的組裝及設計，並能利用電子儀器進行量測、檢修。探討最佳化組合邏輯之演算法，可規劃邏輯元件，組合邏輯之 VLSI 設計，使用 MSI 與標準電路元件設計多層邏輯，使用閘陣列設計，循序邏輯之元件，循序邏輯之分析與合成，VLSI 之設計與測試技巧，各種 CAD 軟體工具介紹。基礎邏輯閘實驗、組合邏輯實驗、加法器及減法器實驗、組合邏輯應用實驗、正反器邏輯實驗、循序邏輯電路應用實驗。
description.en: 1.Properties and function tests of logic gates. 2. Implementations of and designs of basic logic circuits using ICs. 3.Algorithms for the optimization of combinational logic circuits. 4.Programmable logic devices. 5.VLSI design of combinational logic circuits. 6.Multi-layer logic circuits using MSI and standard circuit  elements. 7.Gate array design. 8.Sequential Logic components. 9.Analysis and synthesis of sequential Logic circuits. 10. Technologies of VLSI design and test. 11. CAD software tools. 12.Basic logic gate experiments. 13.Combinational logic experiments. 14. Adder and subtractor experiments. 15. Combinational logic application experiments. 16. Flip-flop experiments. 17. Sequential circuit application experiments.

notes: 訓練場代開課，上學期限 B 組選

description.zh: 使學生熟悉，應用程式設計之環境、方法、及原則，內容含：（１）作業系統與應用程式之關係（２）視窗環境（３）網路環境（４）整合設計學生將窗撰寫完整之應用程式
description.en: To familiarize the student with the environments,methodologies,and principles of application softwaredesign.Topics include :1.Run-time environments2.Window environments3.Networking environments4.Integrated designThe student will write application programs with actual function.

notes: 訓練場代開課，上學期限 A 組選

description.zh: 本課程之目標在於介紹使用者經驗設計之理論與研究方法。藉由本課程的學習，學生能習得互動設計過程中所需要之關鍵概念 - 以使用者經驗為中心之設計。課程以人 - 機 - 境之架構為基礎進行相關知識之講授，並透過相關研究案例之研討、方法之操作以及設計研究之進行了解其原理。課程內容包含人物誌、使用者經驗與需求、互動環境、使用者研究以及認知心理基礎等。教學將以課堂講授、文獻閱讀以及研究方法操作等方式進行，並以報告繳交、分組討論與發表為評量方式。
description.en: This course is focused on introducing the theories and research methods of User Experience Design (UXD). In this course, students can understand the key element, UX, of interactive design. This course is set up under the structure of Human-Machine-Scenario theory, and executed through research case studies, method simulation and design research. The contents include personas, user experience and requirements, interactive scenario, user research and cognitive psychology. The course is preceded by means of lecturing, literature review and research conducting. Students are evaluated by reports, group discussion and presentation.

notes: 排進修部教室，職互動所與職創新所合開，限 40 人

description.zh: 「新興支付應用暨產業發展」是一門探討現今支付產業趨勢的課程，課程內容包括了第三方電子支付、行動支付、跨領域支付應用、先買後付（Buy Now Pay Later, BNPL）及加密貨幣支付等。同時課程也會探討其產業發展脈絡、業者策略及監管等相關議題
description.en: This course explores current payment industry trends. The course content includes third-party electronic payments, mobile payments, cross-domain payment applications, Buy Now Pay Later (BNPL), and encrypted currency payments. At the same time, the course will also explore related issues such as industry development context, operator strategies, and regulation.

name.zh: 新興支付應用暨產業發展
name.en: Emerging Payment Applications and Industry Development

description.zh: 本課程讓學生了解國內車輛產業的背景、現況和當前所面臨的課題，同時介紹車輛產業的分野，包括其架構、職掌、功能 和任務。最後論述未來國內車輛產業的動向和國際分工。
description.en: The aims of the course are to take on comprehension for learners that the background of vehicle industry, current situation developing and the issues we have been faced. Additionally, the demarcation of vehicle industry is introduced, including the structure, responsibility, function and its mission. Finally, the future trend, international uniting cooperation for domestic vehicle industry is discussed.

description.zh: 本課程的授課目標為培育新一代之交通工具設計工程師所需要之基礎知識與實務技能。交通工具設計是一門跨領域先進知識與技術整合的工程，也是進階的專業設計學問。因此本課程將以實作為基礎，訓練學生如何從無中生有、工程藍圖之計畫及工程上的執行，以完全符合交通工具設計實務上國際要求之標準。學生可從中學習如何設計並實現自己的創作，並培養時程掌握、執行藍圖與油土工程、模具開發技術養成以及部品組裝之能力。
description.en: This course aims to train students to be capable of transportation design practice. Transportation design is a cross-discipline engineering which integrates advanced technology and knowledge. This practice based course allows students to learn and execute all the tasks involved in the professional to meet the international standard, through creative concept development, blueprint drawing, clay modeling and mold making.

description.zh: 介紹汽機車上各控制系統之硬體及控制策略，包含引擎系統之空燃比、怠速、冷起動、爆震、廢氣，傳動系統之變速、傳動，煞車系統之 ABS、TCS、SRS，懸吊系統之半主動及主動式懸吊，智慧型道路系統之頭燈、環境、巡航、跟隨、夜視等控制系統。
description.en: This course introduces hardware and control strategies used in each control systems in a vehicle.  These control systems include engine system (AF ratio, idle speed, cold start, knocking, exhaust), transmission system, brake system (ABS, TCS, SRS), suspension system (semi-active and active), intelligent transportation system (headlight, environment, cruise, following, night vision) etc..

description.zh: 運動方程式，一維振動（自由及強制），振動量測，二維振動，多維振動及機械應用說明。
description.en: Equation of Motion, Single-Degree-of-Freedom Vibration (Free and Forced), Measurement of Vibrations, Two-Degree-of-Freedom Vibration, Multiple- Degree-of-Freedom Vibration and its Applications in Mechanical Engineering.

description.zh: 本課程論述中古車之車況鑑定技術，包含車身結構鑑定、VIN 鑑定、泡水車鑑定及相關中古車車況技術鑑定。
description.en: This course discusses the vehicle condition appraisal technology of used cars, including car body structure appraisal, VIN appraisal, water-damaged car appraisal and related technical appraisal of used car condition.

name.en: Vehicle Condition Appraisal Technology of Used Cars

description.zh: 本研究所課程從認知語用學視角，探知語言如何造成框架效應 (framing effects) 影響人們對事件的感知、詮釋與決策。課程內容含括概念隱喻	(conceptual metaphor)、詞彙選擇 (lexical selection)、文體結構 (discourse structure) 等核心語言學議題，並檢視這些語言要素如何影響個人與社會對概念的建構。語料分析涉及廣告、政治語言及日常溝通中的框架現象，探討語言如何被用來說服受眾、強化意識形態、塑造公眾輿論。課程關注框架背後的基本認知機制，包括心理模型 (mental	models) 與語言理解偏誤	(biases)。透過開放式討論、實證案例研究與話語分析實作，本課程將幫助學生深入理解語言與認知如何交互作用，進而影響人們對現實的建構與詮釋。本課程適合對語言學、認知科學、傳播學及媒體 (廣告) 語言分析感興趣的同學。
description.en: Cognitive Pragmatics in Media Communication is a graduate course that examines how language shapes perception, interpretation, and decision-making through framing effects, drawing insights from cognitive pragmatics. It explores how linguistic choices—such as conceptual metaphor, lexical selection, and discourse structure—influence how individuals and societies construct meaning. Students will analyze framing effects in advertising, political discourse, media narratives, and everyday communication, investigating how language is used to persuade, reinforce ideologies, and shape public opinion. The course also considers the cognitive mechanisms behind framing, including mental models and biases in language comprehension. Through open discussions, empirical case studies, and hands-on discourse analysis, students will develop a deeper understanding of how language interacts with cognition to frame reality. This course is ideal for students in linguistics, cognitive science, communicatio

description.zh: 組織行為是採用分析的方法，了解研究解個體行為在個人、團體、組織三個層次中的行為表現，並應用相關學理知識提高組織效能，尤其將焦點放在如何提高員工的生產力、降低離職率與曠職率，增加滿意度等四個變項上。
description.en: Organizational behavior (OB) is a field of research that investigates the impact that individuals, groups, and structure have on behavior within an organization, and then it applies that knowledge to make organizations work more effectively.  Specifically, OB focuses on how to improve productivity, reduce absenteeism and turnover, and increase employee citizenship and job satisfaction.

description.zh: 本課程將透過每週專題演講方式，讓學生了解有機材料之最新開發成品或最先進之研究成果。演講者之安排將以校外知名專家學者及校內各計畫執行者為主。
description.en: This course will provide important information regarding to the latest development or application on the organic materials. Speakers being invited are well-known scholars in organic area.  Graduate students or thesis advisors will also be invited to report any in interesting result from their graduate studies.

description.zh: 染顏料 (色料) 雖已發展百餘年，唯部分現象與實驗結果仍須進一步的研究以獲得完整正確的解釋。本課程主要探討染料的吸收光譜與其分子結構式的關係，是為具有色料化學與有機化學基礎的同學所設計的。
description.en: Although studies on synthetic colourants have been performed for more than 100 years, their detailed elucidation requires further extensive research.This course reviews the absorption features of organic dyes and recent progress in their explanation in terms of molecular structure. This course is mainly intended for organic chemists and colour chemists which are interested in the spectral characteristics of dyes and their conceptual understanding.

description.zh: 本課程旨在對非工程類科出身之研究生，做有系統基礎材料科學之建立。課程包括 (1) 原子鍵結與配位 (2) 晶體 [原子規律性](3) 固相中之不規律性 (4) 相平衡 (5) 材料微結構 (6) 反應速率 (7) 材料破壞學 (8) 導電材與半導材料 (9) 陶瓷材料 (10) 聚合物及複合材料
description.en: This course is aimed at systematically introducing some important concepts of material engineering for students who were not an engineer training in their BS. The course covers (1)Atomic Bonding and Coordination (2)Crystal Structure (3)Disorder in Solid Phase (4)Phase Equilibria (5)Microstructures (6)Reaction Rate (7)Deformation and Fracture (8)Conducting and Semi-conducting Materials (9)Ceramic Materials (10)Polymer and Composites.

description.zh: C 語言為開發作業系統、嵌入式系統、通訊協定等程式最常使用的程式語言，本課程主要教導 C 程式語言於實務上之應用，課程內容主要包括：進階指標使用、指標與陣列、指標與資料結構、Pointer-to-pointer、指標函式、Callback function、Bitwise operation 應用等，除了於 PC 上撰寫程式練習之外，亦會有 case study 來輔助教學以及了解 C 語言的使用技巧，期末亦會要求學生利用所學習到之技巧來模擬 CPU 排程與記憶體管理等相關作業系統底層程式。
description.en: The C programming language is commonly used to implement operation systems, embedded systems, and communication protocols. The object of this course is to teach how to apply the C programming language to develop real application systems. The contents of this course include advanced pointer usage, pointer and array, pointer and data structure, pointer-to-pointer, function pointer, callback functions, bitwise operations, and so on. In addition to practice on PC, this course also offers case studies for better understanding. Students will also be required to implement emulators to simulate OS lower level operations, e.g., CPU scheduling and memory management.

name.zh: 進階 C 語言實務

description.zh: 此課程之目標為多媒體系統整介紹，包含介紹所有影像和視訊的標準格式、視訊的壓縮基本原理，目前主流的視訊壓所標準格式，讓學生了解到 1. 多媒體簡介 2. 多媒體發展平台 3. 多媒體資訊系統設計 4. 多媒體資訊系統實體建置。課程內容包含: 1. 多媒體資料簡介 2. 多媒體發展平台 3. 多媒體資料處理 4. 多媒體壓縮技術 5. 多媒體標準架構 6. 多媒體系統設計 7. 多媒體實體建置
description.en: This course is mainly aimed at introducing the Multimedia Systems, including: (1) Introduction to Multimedia Systems (2)Multimedia Platforms for developers (3)Digital Signal Processing for Multimedia Systems (4) Data and Image Compression for Multimedia Systems (5) Multimedia Frameworks (6) Design of Multimedia Systems (7) Develop and Manage Multimedia Systems

description.zh: 介紹電子零組件之組成，特性以及其應用，使學生具有實用電路之分析模擬與設計應用之能力，內容涵蓋：1. 半導体物理，2. 基本主動元件 (二極体，雙極性電晶体，場效電晶体)，3. 放大器電路，4. 邏輯 (數位) 電路，5. 積体電路。
description.en: 1.Semiconductor physics 2.Diode 3.Bipolar Junction transistor 4.Field-efferct 5.Operatonal amplifier 6.Digital logic circuit 7.Integrated circuit

description.zh: 本課程教授人工智慧技術的基礎理論與實務技巧，並對於人工智慧在製造業、服務業、金融業的應用，提供啟發性的基本認知與創意，以激發學生在人工智慧領域的創新應用。課程內容包括：人工智慧基礎、機器學習、大數據技術、深度學習、生成對抗網路、創業家思維、設計思考、商業模式、人工智慧與現代科技、工業 4.0、人工智慧的製造業應用個案、人工智慧的服務業應用個案、人工智慧的金融應用個案。
description.en: This course aims to teach students the basic concepts and practical techniques of artificial intelligence and to introduce its applications on manufacturing, service, and finance industries. The course focuses on inspring students for innovative artificial intelligence applications. The course includes: artificial intelligence basics, machine learn-ing, big data, deep learning, generative adversarial network, entrepreneurial thoughts, design thinking, business models, artificial intelligence and modern technologies, industry 4.0, real case applications on manufacturing, service, finance industries.

notes: (群組 3) 工業與科技管理 (關聯群 7)

description.zh: 論文寫作。
description.en: Thesis writing.

description.zh: 本課程主要在讓學生藉由規劃與實施一項公益活動，以實踐企業倫理與社會責任，並藉以思考在推展企業倫理、企業社會責任與公司治理等理念時，如何能落實於企業的體制之中，以建立一個永續發展的企業價值體系。
description.en: This course is designed to enable students to implement corporate ethics and social responsibility by planning and implementing a public welfare activity. The students should think about how to implement corporate ethics, corporate social responsibility, and corporate governance concepts. In order to establish a sustainable enterprise value system.

name.zh: 企業倫理與社會責任實踐
name.en: Corporate Ethics and Social Responsibility Practice

notes: 碩二必修，六 234，台北集中上課，USR 計畫，國際會議廳

description.zh: 本課程主要在讓學生藉由規劃與實施一項公益活動，以實踐企業倫理與社會責任，並藉以思考在推展企業倫理、企業社會責任與公司治理等理念時，如何能落實於企業的體制之中，以建立一個永續發展的企業價值體系。
description.en: This course is designed to enable students to implement corporate ethics and social responsibility by planning and implementing a public welfare activity. The students should think about how to implement corporate ethics, corporate social responsibility, and corporate governance concepts. In order to establish a sustainable enterprise value system.

name.zh: 企業倫理與社會責任實踐
name.en: Corporate Ethics and Social Responsibility Practice

notes: 碩二必修，六 234，台北集中上課，USR

description.zh: 1. 學習診斷輔導方法 2. 培養學生現場診斷與輔導 3. 提升學生企業經營管理改善能力
description.en: 1. Learn diagnostic counseling methods2. Train students on-site diagnosis and counseling3. Enhance students' ability to improve business management

notes: (群組 6) 財金管理 (聯輔會) 修畢企業管理和經營策略實務

description.zh: 玄奘之路商學院戈壁挑戰賽緣起於 2006 年，秉承「玄奘之路」精神，倡導「理想、行動、堅持、超越」之理念，通過浸入式的身心體驗和團隊協作來達成個人心靈突破，並鼓勵參賽戈友相互扶持、共同進退，弘揚團隊合作、永不放棄的正向能量。
description.en: The Business Schools Xuanzang Road Gobi Challenge originated in 2006.This event adheres to the spirit of "Xuan Zang Road", advocates the concept of "idealism, action, persistence, and transcendence" to achieve personal spiritual breakthrough through immersive physical and mental experience and teamwork; Gobi challenge also promotes teamwork by encouraging all participants to support each other, to advance and retreat together, and be positive, never give up!

name.zh: 運動與休閒管理 - 戈壁挑戰賽
name.en: Sports and Leisure activity Management -Gobi Challenge

notes: (群組 8) 社會人文藝術與其他領域

description.zh: 此課程旨在說明決策理論之基本觀念，及其在真實世界裡相關決策問題之分析。使學生具備了解並建構決策問題，建構並推估決策之不確定性，以及建構並評估效用模式之能力。
description.en: This course provides an overview of the basic concepts of decision theory and their applications on the real-world decision problems. Students will learn about the problem identification and modeling, the modeling and estimation of the associated uncertainty, and modeling and evaluation of the utility function.

description.zh: 本課程旨在針對營運模式與供應鏈管理作探討，其中包含: 1. 電子化企業概論 2. 經營模式 3. 企業再造 4. 企業資源管理 5. 中小企業電子化 6. 商業電子化 7. 供應鏈管理 8. 需求鏈管理 9. 協同預測管理 10. 個案研究。
description.en: The purpose of the course is to discuss the business model and supply chain management. The contents of this course will include: 1. General concept of e-business management 2.The business model3. Business reengineering 4.Enterprise resource planning 5.Small enterprise e-business management6. Channel e-business 7.Supply chain management 8.Demand chain manage-ment9.Collaborative management10. Case Study.

name.zh: 營運模式與供應鏈管理
name.en: Business Model and Supply Chain Management

description.zh: 碩士學位論文寫作
description.en: A student must write a thesis to fulfill the partial requirements for the Master degree.

description.zh: 當企業在邁向資訊化與自動化的同時，智慧生產工程師需考量如何整合智慧製造與精實生產。本課程的目標在幫助學生瞭解智慧製造在工廠上的應用，學習建構所謂精實導向的企業。
description.en: Since business are moving toward information and automation, smart production engineers need to consider how to integrate smart manufacturing and lean production. The goal of this course is to help students understand the application of smart manufacturing in the factory and to learn to build a so-called lean-oriented enterprise.

description.zh: 本課程適用於一般大專之決策分析課程。其目的在說明決策理論之基本觀念，及其在真實世界裡相關決策問題之分析。本課程授課主題包括：不考慮機率之決策問題、與機率有關之決策問題、獲取額外資訊之決策分析、效益分析、遊戲理論。相關之授課內容包括：機率分配、期望值方法、貝氏分析、完全資訊與額外資訊之期望值。
description.en: This is an undergraduate course dealing with decison making and analysis.The objective of this course is to interpret the basic concepts of decision theory and its applications on some real world decision analysis problims.The main topics of this course include decision making without probability,decision making with probability,decison analysis with additional information,utility theory,gametheory.The related studies includes prlbability distribution,expected value approach,Bayesian analysis,expected value of perfect informatin and sample information.

notes: 工管三甲乙丙合開，英語授課

description.zh: 本課程大量的個案來說明企業管理的理論觀念以及分析方法，讓學生對企業管理有一定程度的了解，課程內容將以國內與國外著名案例為基礎，主題包括策略管理，行銷管理，組織領導，科技管理等。課程將採用參與式個案為教學方法，個案來源為哈佛商學院以及光華管理個案資料庫。
description.en: This course uses Harvard style case method to enhance MBA students' business concepts and theories. The topics include: strategy management, marketing management, leadership, and technology management. The case materials will be adapted from Harvard Business School and KMCC center.

description.zh: 本課程論述新能源車輛產業趨勢及了解各新能源車輛核心系統基礎，透過漸進式的課題讓參加學習者了解包含電動車電池、馬達、充電系統等內容，進而掌握維修要領。
description.en: This course discusses the industry trends of new energy vehicles and helps students understand the basics of the core systems of new energy vehicles. Through progressive topics, students can understand electric vehicle batteries, motors, charging systems, etc., and then master the essentials of maintenance.

description.zh: 本課程在使學生藉由瞭解市場定位與策略跟科技產品發展與運用的領域有著密不可分的關係。課程內容主要藉由當前科技產品發展的相關課題，以及整體環境的概述，讓同學對於產業或企業之科技產品市場定位與策略有一基本的認知，提供同學從科技產品、市場定位、管理策略的不同角度瞭解科技產品於市場上定位及推動發展策略。
description.en: This course is closely related to the field of technology product development and application through understanding market positioning and strategies. The course content mainly provides students with a basic understanding of the market positioning and strategies of technology products in industries or enterprises through the current topics related to the development of technology products and an overview of the overall environment, and provides students with different perspectives on technology products, market positioning, and management strategies. Understand the positioning of technology products in the market and promote development strategies.

name.zh: 科技產品市場定位與策略
name.en: Technology Products Market Positioning and Strategy

description.zh: 本課程介紹如何應用數值分析理論求解工程問題。包含數值方法基本觀念，數值方法之誤差及穩定性，非線性代數方程式之數值解法，聯立代數方程式之數值解法，矩陣特徵值求法，非線性聯立方程式之數值解法，多項式插值法及曲線嵌合，數值微分與積分，常微分方程式及偏微分方程式之數值解法 。
description.en: Introduction of using numerical methods to solve practical engineering problems. Topics include Solving nonlinear equations, Solving sets of equations, interpolation and curve fitting, numerical differentiation and integration, numerical solution of ODE and PDE.

description.zh: 「鐵道車輛設計分析」課程，乃為培養具有鐵路車輛分析設計能力之人員，本課程初期將從規範面瞭解車輛設計要求，進而從結構面進行車輛設計與分析，過程中將引導學生採用主流分析軟體進行車輛穩定性與行車舒適度探討。最後將探討與台灣既有鐵道系統的相容性，進行駕駛室與機電設備配置等設計。期望透過本課程，能培植鐵道車輛設計分析人才，厚植本土鐵道車輛設計能力。
description.en: This aim of the course of "Railway Vehicle Design and Analysis" is to cultivate personnel on railway vehicle field. At the beginning of this course, the design requirement and criteria will be given as basic knowledge. Then students will be ask to perform structural design and analysis for railway vehicles. Passenger comfortable index and vehicle dynamic response will be taken into consideration during the process of design and analysis. Finally, the compatibility of the new design with the existing railway system will be discussed.

description.zh: 本課程介紹有限元素分析法基本原理及其在各種工程問題上之應用。包含有限元素分析法之基本觀念，利用變分原理建立有限元素模式，形狀函數及等參數元素，一維問題：桿、桁架、樑及骨架等，二維問題：平面應力應變及板殼問題。三維問題：一般實體，有限元素分析之計算機程式處理，有限元素分析於動態問題之應用，相關有限元素分析套裝軟體簡介
description.en: Introduction to the finite element method and its application to engineering problems.  Topics include Variational Formulation and Finite Element Formulations, 1-D, 2-D and 3-D Element Shapes, Numerical Integration, Applications to dynamic problem and Introduction to Commercial Finite Element Programs.

notes: 綜科館 610，與日車碩合開，英文授課

description.zh: 本課程將以車輛之傳動系統設計與分析為主要內容，傳動系統之定義為從動力源至驅動輪間之各項組合，其中包括離合器、加力箱、變速箱、差速箱、傳動軸與最終傳動等組合，由於每種車輛行車特性之不同，因此前述之各項組合有不同之排列方式，傳動系統設計之優劣往往影響到車輛之行車性能。本課程將從車輛行駛阻力推演出傳統系統設計之理念及方法，並針對如何發揮動力源之最佳特性，搭配良好之傳動系統設計以達到較佳之行車性能為主要教學之目的。
description.en: Introduction to the vehicle drive-train design and analysis. Topics include definition for drive-train system、clutches、transfer case、manual transmission、automatic transmission、differential gear、transmission shaft  and final driver.  Fundamentals of vehicle tractive resistance will deduce the methodology of drive-train design.  The good drive-train design will result in optimal vehicle tractive performance.

description.zh: 本門課之目的是讓學生熟悉質與量研究方法的設計。主題涵蓋研究計劃之準備及撰擬；主要研究方法，如調查研究法、相關研究法、實驗研究法、行動研究法；質性和量化資料之搜集與分析；敘述統計和推論統計。
description.en: This course familiarizes students with qualitative and quantitative research procedures and the statistical design involved in education and applied linguistics research. Topics will include the nature and process of research; survey research; experimental research; correlational research; action research; data collection and data analysis; descriptive statistics; and sampling and inferential statistics.

name.zh: 研究方法 - 語言實務應用
name.en: Research Methods in Applied Language Studies

description.zh: 本課程將引領學生將閱讀及寫作技巧運用到課堂中的文字研究。學生可藉本課程獨力完成知識性創意、評論式及論證式的文體，並可藉此學習其中批判式閱讀及思考的應用及價值。
description.en: In this course students will learn to apply their reading and writing skills to the study of texts from a variety of sources. The course is geared to teach the student the use and value of critical reading and thinking in the production their own independent, intellectually creative, and critically structured and argued essays intended for an educated audience.

name.zh: 研究方法 - 文學文化應用
name.en: Research Methods in Applied Cultural Studies

description.zh: 數位化設計專案包含研究與設計。設計專案透過工業設計的理論、方法及程序，以研究的手段形成設計決策，或以實證的方式將研究成果應用於設計實務。設計專案之設計成果必須建立在相關的研究基礎上。
description.en: This course is directed toward an approved digitized design project withresearch and design completed under supervision of the director. Theory andpractice in research and development dealing with the design project isreviewed in the study. Projects must represent a meaningful contribution tothe field of design base on supportive research.

name.zh: 數位化設計專案研究 (一)

description.zh: 防疫型建築專題課程主要針對 COVID-19 後疫情時代，防疫理念如何融入建築領域，結合病毒控制技術理論和防制病毒擴散的設計方法，分析國內外建築案例，探討病毒特性、學習抗病毒材料與設備、壓差控制技術、通風換氣效益、行政管理措施等相關技術應用，系統性地探討如何在建築設計、材料選擇與建築全生命周期管理中，實現日常生活建築如何建構防疫應急的關聯措施，並運用環境評估工具量化建築的防疫效益，引導學生多元領域學習，在建築設計中提出因應疫情的創新設計思維，兼具環境、社會與經濟平衡之構想，以及建築設計的防疫解決方案，最終培養其在人居健康環境下的永續建築設計能力。
description.en: The specialized course on epidemic prevention architecture focuses on how to incorporate epidemic prevention concepts into the field of architecture in the post-COVID-19 era. It integrates theories of virus control technologies with design strategies aimed at preventing the spread of infectious diseases. Through the analysis of domestic and international architectural cases, the course examines the characteristics of viruses and explores the application of antiviral materials and equipment, pressure differential control, ventilation efficiency, and administrative management measures.It systematically investigates how epidemic prevention and emergency response strategies can be embedded into architectural design, material selection, and the entire building lifecycle. Students will learn to utilize environmental assessment tools to quantify the epidemic prevention performance of buildings, and will be guided to engage in interdisciplinary learning. The course encourages the development o

name.en: Special Topics on Epidemic Prevention  Architecture

description.zh: 本課程是在講述建築生命週期碳足跡的評估法。藉由標準化、透明化的建築資訊，一步步剖析建築生命週期各階段對環境的影響。本課程得評估整棟建築生命週期的碳足跡、甚進一步提出減碳熱點，了解建築物的節碳潛力所在。
description.en: This course evaluates the carbon footprint of a building's life cycle. Through standardized and transparent building information, the impact of various stages of the building life cycle on the environment is analyzed step by step. This course not only evaluates the carbon footprint of the entire building life cycle but also further identifies carbon hotspots and provides carbon reduction strategies, hence understanding carbon savings potential of buildings.

name.en: THE EVALUATION FOR BUILDING'S CARBON FOOTPRINT

description.zh: 本課程之主要目的介紹深度學習於影像處領域之基本理論、架構及應用，包括: Classifier (CNN、Transformer)、Object detection (Yolo)、Anomaly Detection (EfficientAD、GLASS)、GAN 及 Image-To-Text (CLIP) 相關網路之架構及應用，更藉由專題製作方式讓同學了解現有之類神經網路於工業工程領域內之相關運用。
description.en: The main objective of this course is to introduce the fundamental theories, architectures, and applications of deep learning in the field of computer vision. Topics include classifiers (CNN, Transformer), object detection (YOLO), anomaly detection (EfficientAD, GLASS), GANs, and image-to-text models (CLIP). Through project-based learning, students will also gain an understanding of how existing neural network models are applied in the field of industrial engineering.

notes: 工管所 工管 4 甲乙丙合開，科研 640

description.zh: 世界各區域經濟快速發展，面對高度競爭的趨勢，數位轉型是項關鍵議題。本課程的目的是教授學生數位轉型的基本概念與應用，並介紹成功案例使學生可以將案例經驗及所學應用於所屬公司或企業，以激發學生在數位轉型領域的創新應用。
description.en: The rapid economic development across various regions of the world, coupled with the trend of intense competition, makes digital transformation a key issue. The goal of this course is to teach students the fundamental concepts and applications of digital transformation, while also introducing successful case studies. This will enable students to apply the knowledge and experiences from these cases to their own companies or organizations, inspiring innovative applications in the field of digital transformation.
